story:
Note

This project is practically NON-PROFIT in nature, as most of your contributions will be spent on the actual development of these items, including tooling, manufacturing and assembling costs, purchasing parts and paying taxes/duties. Please keep this in mind.

 

Customization

As a gift, the first 1000 contributors will have a chance to send us their custom graphics and have them laser marked on the backplate.

 

Goods

We are developing 2 versions of this product to fit a broader range of the fans' needs and budgets.

 

HEV Charge Monitor

A "pass-through" charge monitoring system which must be connected both to your wall charger and your phone.

The charging current will be monitored and displayed when a device is attached. Using the menu system, it is possible to assign various sound and visual effects to various events.

If you're looking for a noisy and geeky accessory with lights and stuff and/or you're low on budget, this is your choice. It can be used with the docking station (included) standing on your desk, or can be wall mounted with adhesive transfer tape (also included).

 

HEV Power Bank

This version will also be equipped with a high quality 10.000 mAh Li-Po battery, and it can deliver power to any of your USB devices, including your phone. Being a stand-alone power bank, it is probably more suitable for everyday use and carrying it around.

It will share the same enclosure and most of the functionality and properties of the Charge Monitor, but the presence of the battery makes it possible to define far more events and assign visual and sound effects to them. Fast charging (QC 2.0) will be supported in both directions. Over-current and thermal protection will guarantee your safety.

Although a mini-USB port was shown in the video, many of you have been concerned about it, therefore both versions will be shipped with USB-C type input ports. This won't affect any other functionality of the device, it still can be used with all USB chargers and all phone types.

 

Comparison

 

Milestones

  • August: 3D modeling and enclosure design for manufacturability, showcase video
  • September: promotion
  • October: end of funding phase, start of prototype circuit design
  • November: firmware prototyping, evaluation of the enclosure
  • December: testing prototypes, proposing revisions, preparation of mass-production
  • January 2020:  mass-production, thorough testing
  • February 2020: assembling, quality check and boxing items
  • March 2020: Shipment of pre-ordered items

 

Special thanks for support to:

  • PCGamesN - pcgamesn.com
  • GameStar - gamestar.hu
  • LambdaGeneration - lambdageneration.com
  • GameReactor - gamereactor.eu
  • GameByte - gamebyte.com
  • TheGamer - thegamer.com
  • Player.it - player.it

 

About us

We are a Hungarian team consisting of 3 members. One thing that we have in common is that we're all passionate about our profession and we all admire everything that is related or connected to Half-Life. If it hadn't been for Half-Life we would probably never have met.

Kornel Demeter - 3D Artist, Animator and Texture Artist: 41 years old, being in 3D industry for 17 years now. In the past few years, he has worked on several major video game titles (Ride, MXGP, MotoGP, Gravel, Monster Energy Supercross). On top of that, he has many years of experience in product design which he can utilize to create eye-catching, yet easy to use and ergonomic accessories. As a Half-Life fan, he knows that our target audience tend to prefer high-quality products over lame ones, and he would not dare to make them angry.

Andras Gajdacs - Hardware and Software Developer: 30 years old electrical engineer specialized in embedded hardware and firmware design. Currently establishing a startup company which offers motion capture and other indoor positioning solutions that utilize wideband ultrasound. With 9 years of experience in electronic circuit design, this project should be a piece of cake according to him.

Krisztian Szabo - Team Manager, Media Consultant: 41 years old, leading a Hungarian game modding team as a dubbing director and a sound engineer for more than 10 years. One of his team's major project is a fully localized Half-Life 2, so the game in question is near and dear to his heart. His roles will include organizing and fine-tuning the several work phases, dealing with the suppliers, manufacturing and also the media presence.

Half-Life is a trademark of Valve Corporation.

story:
Enabling development for older devices

Developers are an important part of the success for opensource projects. Jolla have made good progress.

Nokia, on the other hand,  have left the building, leaving the fabulous devices N900 and N9 doomed to death.

I am an avid developer that contributes a lot (100+ applications) for SailfishOS. But also in achieving the impossible on N9 and N900 (all of the basically up-to-date features, beyond what the manufacturers provided).

To support further development I need assistance to obtain new devices and applications & hardware to support development.

This will help exisiting developers, as well as consumers obtaining the devices, to enable their device in the future.

What We Need & What You Get

I need funding to cover the costs of obtaing hardware for development.

I have contributed to exisiting device (Jolla Phone) with 100+ applications and application updates

I have enabled newer SSL support for Meego, Harmattan and SailfishOS .

I have achieved more functionality on existing hardware ( for example packet injection on WiFi HW) and developed kernels for Jolla/ and Nokia Devices.

To mention the most widely used: 

bash, Imagemagick, mosh, nmap, p7zip, postgresql, sudo, tor, transmission (bittorrent) and tor network connectivity.

But also interresting projects that can be further developed like newer SSL support.

Other Ways You Can Help

Post link to my startup on any social media or forums, spread the word, if you have already enjoyed my work, or would like to

story:
Introducing Unuiga S905

Powered by 64bit Amlogic S905 Quad-core ARM Cortex-A53 with 5-core Mali-450 GPU, runs Remix OS 2.0, based on Android optimized for productivity and good also for entertainment.

Remix OS is Android for productivity, it supports all Android apps, especially the ones that work well with keyboard and mouse.

It comes with a User Interface for productivity, perfect for Multi-tasking, Multi-window operations, best for running multiple apps at the same time.  

Unuiga S905 works great for Microsoft Office, supports the core PC functions like e-mail, document creation with Word, Excel, PowerPoint etc.
Capacitive button on top of Unuiga S905/Unuiga S905+ is perfect to put the device in standby, to resume, and hold it in 5 seconds to force power off.

We're being talked about in the media:


 Hardware Specs

Connectors:


Optional Full Sized wireless Keyboard/Mousepad ($15 extra perk):

We recommend Logitech K400 at: http://amzn.to/1Tkvoa6 ($39) or Logitech K400 Plus at: http://amzn.to/1Tkvtul ($26). Logitech makes the best Keyboard/Mousepads for being productive on the couch/sofa.

We offer you the option to get a cheaper alternative to the Logitech K400 below that is nearly as good, simply select the perk for $15 more that include the RF Keyboard/mousepad. Shipping price is also slightly higher if you select the Keyboard.

You can use any USB Keyboard and Mouse that you like. Unuiga S905/Unuiga S905+ comes with a very basic wireless remote control which is only good for the Entertainment mode UI, selecting videos and etc. You need to use a real keyboard and mouse for the real Remix OS Desktop PC experience.


About the software:

Remix OS 2.0 is an Android-based operating system built for productivity, for people to use as a full desktop.


Open any Android App in Multiple resizable Windows, perfect for multi-tasking, perfect for productivity. As more Android apps will be designed for mouse/keyboard productivity, Android Remix OS will keep getting better:

Start Menu, find all the apps there. You can drag your favorite app shortcuts also to the desktop.

Task Bar, all the running apps show their icon here, you can switch between them, even shut down the apps you don't need running in the background.

Notifications, all your Android notifications show here on the right side.

Multi-Window File Manager, supports copy/paste move/open files easily: 

Android and thus Remix OS supports Microsoft Office perfectly, for document editing with Word, Excel and PowerPoint. There are also many other great Office apps on Android that work perfectly.

Gaming is actually great also using the 5-core Mali-450 GPU, hundreds of thousands of games work awesome! You can even connect a USB or Bluetooth Gamepad controller for gaming.

Movies playback, watch any video format up to 4K resolution H265! Output up to 4K at 60fps using HDMI 2.0 to your 4K TV.

Supports all Android application, especially those that function well with keyboard and mouse. Probably that millions of apps work fine today and when more software engineers  develop Android apps for productivity, this will only improve the usability of this product.

Settings

Automatic and easy upgrades provided by Remix OS team by One-click OTA, software updates show up automatically and ask if you want to update.

Bootloader will be open, developers can install other OSes on Unuiga S905/S905+!

Any Android, Chrome OS, Debian or Ubuntu will possibly also work on this box, if third party developers support it. Unuiga cannot guarantee support for alternative operating systems, but it should be possible to flash other OSes on the box, you might be able to find out more about it in the comments section or on XDA forum or elsewhere online. Amlogic has already published open source materials for their Amlogic S905 platform, you can read more here:
http://www.cnx-software.com/2015/12/06/how-to-run-headless-linux-on-amlogic-s905-devices-such-as-mini-mx-or-k1-plus/
http://www.cnx-software.com/2015/11/19/amlogic-s905-source-code-published-linux-u-boot-mali-450-gpu-and-other-drivers/


Countries we are shipping to:

Worldwide with DHL registered parcel (very reliable shipping from China), shipping price vary depending on your country. Please check the shipping price at checkout. Unuiga S905+ (2GB RAM) costs a bit more for shipping because Unuiga is working hard to ship it 1 month earlier than Unuiga S905 (1GB RAM).

We also have the *cheap shipping* options which provide you with a cheaper shipping method. For some countries the *cheap shipping* method is below half the price compared to the DHL shipping method above! The *cheap shipping* method can take up to 3-4 weeks to arrive though after we ship it from China! To save a bit of weight with the shipping, the *cheap shipping* option does not include a HDMI cable nor an AV cable.

There may be import customs fees in your country, you have to pay for those yourself upon receiving your package.

Videos showing the Unuiga Factory, SMT Line, PCB Design House and Company Philosophy:

Unuiga Factory Tour in Huizhou China, introducing Steven Ching, CEO of Unuiga

Unuiga SMT line tour in Shenzhen China, where the electronics on the PCB for Unuiga S905/S905+ are being manufactured

Timeline

story:
Frustrating audio problems in our daily lives

How often have you wanted to view videoclips off social media or look up data on your phone during a call, only to find your headphones annoyingly tangled up in your pocket or your Bluetooth headset missing?  It happened to us all the time, so we began designing a solution.

 

Introducing Klipfone: The Detachable Audio for Your Smartphone

It's an ultra-thin headset that stores directly on your phone, making it instantly available for handsfree use.  

 

The Klipfone stays well-secured on your phone whether it’s in use or stowed away.


 

Discover a whole new side of your smartphone

Under the Hood

After two years of researching various form-factors, we arrived at this incredible design. The flexible unit, has a smooth outside and a padded underside. When this is combined with the unique shape, we get a one-of-a-kind combination of features: a headset that can securely clip onto certain smartphones, and can comfortably fit into an ear.

 

 

Klipfone Headset Specifications

  • Shape: Concept headset clips securely on a phone and comfortably in an ear. 
  • Exterior: Smooth outside - secure on phone. Padded underside - comfortable in the ear.
  • Size: 0.15” thick and 0.5” wide strip curves back to a 1.5” length. Weight: 3 oz.
  • Fits: devices having 6 to 8 mm total thickness with or without case, such as iPhone 6, 7, and Plus models. Similar thickness Android devices.
  • Processor: CSR chip set based.
  • Wireless: Bluetooth version 4.1 with A2DP. NFC assisted auto pairing.
  • Audio: Dual mic with noise reduction and audio enhancement.
  • Power: 50 mAh Lithium Baaery. Charge in 2 hours. Talk 4 hours. Standby 160 hours.
  • Built-in USB charger: directly plugs into a USB port of a laptop or adapter.
  • Wall Adapter/Charger: with dual USB ports.

What You Get

We will put all the funds from your backing toward the product engineering and production.
You can be one of the first to own this breakthrough innovation.  Each individual perk includes One Klipfone Headset and one USB/AC adapter/charger.

 

The Company

At Klipfone LLC, we are a diverse group of independent professionals from a wide array of industries: graphic design, music, consumer packaged goods, and electronics. While our backgrounds vary, we share a common mission – solve problems that consumers face everyday with their mobile experiences. Our unique perspectives and experiences allow us to approach problem solving holistically and design simple but effective solutions. 

We are grateful for your interest in our product, and we are committed to delivering on our Indiegogo campaign promise. Because of your support, we will create and produce this exciting headset that will become an essential part of your smartphone experience.

Risks & Challenges

Engineering and production of electronic innovations bring their share of risks and challenges but the industry has developed well known solutions and remedies for them. To further minimize risks, we are taking a more predictable approach of repackaging, into the new Klipfone shape, the proven technology from state-of-the-art in wireless headphones and headsets.

We have already done initial validation of the Klipfone concept, and design, through the exact sized models we assembled with the 3D printed housing parts. Additional and final validation before production will come from units assembled with production parts from injection mold tooling. We have factored in time following the pilot production, for design fine-tuning and corrections, before going to full production.

COMMON QUESTIONS ABOUT THE KLIPFONE CONCEPT

HOW IS KLIPFONE DIFFERENT FROM A TRADITIONAL WIRELESS HEADSET?

A traditional wireless headset often gets lost, forcing some users to wear it all day long. As a result, the user experience of enjoying content on the smartphone is compromised by not turning on the sound or playing the sound, and annoying other people. By clipping directly to your phone, Klipfone becomes an always-available Bluetooth headset that allows the user to stop compromising on her content experience.

DO I REALLY NEED KLIPFONE IN ADDITION TO MY STEREO HEADPHONE?

We have found that there’s certainly room for both in our lives! The Klipfone headset complements conventional headphones, which are ideal for prolonged use such as listening to music or watching long videos. Klipfone is great for impromptu use such as watching video clips, video calls, or having to look up information on the phone screen during a call.

DO I NEED KLIPFONE EVEN IF I WEAR A HEADPHONE OR A HEADSET ALL DAY?

If you are such a user, you can still take a break from your headset or the headphone without having the fear of not finding them when you need them on a moment’s notice. This is so because you can always depend on the Klipfone headset being handy right on your smartphone.

FOR IMPROMPTU NEED, WHY CAN’T I USE THE SPEAKERPHONE? 

Unless you are alone, the sound from a speakerphone will annoy those around you. Also, sound from the speakerphone can be hard to hear if you are in a noisy public place. In such conditions, the Klipfone headset provides a simple elegant solution.

WILL KLIPFONE SUPPORT MY PHONE AS WELL AS ADDITIONAL DEVICES?

The Klipfone headset will pair with up to two devices simultaneously - a phone, and a tablet or a laptop that support wireless capability. Once paired with your phone and one additional device, the Klipfone headset will play the audio from either device seamlessly, one at a time.

ARE THERE DIFFERENT SIZES OF EARBUDS TO FIT DIFFERENT EARS?

With the Klipfone headset, one size actually does fit all. Its unique shape allows it to securely clip into your ear without trying to squeeze an ear-bud into your ear canal as done by conventional headsets.

ARE THERE PLANS FOR FOLLOW ON FUTURE PRODUCTS

We plan to develop and bring to market various Klipfone headset versions that will fit a wide variety of devices. In addition, we are planning several add-on modules and cases to complement the Klipfone headset. These peripherals will provide added battery power, charging, and protection for the Klipfone headset and the phone itself. 

We are planning an upgrade path for Klipfone backers to future models and accessories.

 

 

Patents

THE KLIPFONE PRODUCT IS LICENSED UNDER US PATENTS 6,952,617 & 7,149,543, AND CHINA PATENT ZL00801959.2, AND RELATED US AND INTERNATIONAL PENDING PATENTS.

HOW IS KLIPFONE DIFFERENT FROM A TRADITIONAL WIRELESS HEADSET?
A traditional wireless headset often gets lost, forcing some users to wear it all day long. As a result, the user experience of enjoying content on the smartphone is compromised by not turning on the sound or playing the sound, and annoying other people. By clipping directly to your phone, Klipfone becomes an always-available Bluetooth headset that allows the user to stop compromising on her content experience.
DO I REALLY NEED KLIPFONE IN ADDITION TO MY STEREO HEADPHONE?
We have found that there’s certainly room for both in our lives! The Klipfone headset complements conventional headphones, which are ideal for prolonged use such as listening to music or watching long videos. Klipfone is great for impromptu use such as watching video clips, video calls, or having to look up information on the phone screen during a call.
DO I NEED KLIPFONE EVEN IF I WEAR A HEADPHONE OR A HEADSET ALL DAY?
If you are such a user, you can still take a break from your headset or the headphone without having the fear of not finding them when you need them on a moment’s notice. This is so because you can always depend on the Klipfone headset being handy right on your smartphone.
FOR IMPROMPTU NEED, WHY CAN’T I USE THE SPEAKERPHONE? 
Unless you are alone, the sound from a speakerphone will annoy those around you. Also, sound from the speakerphone can be hard to hear if you are in a noisy public place. In such conditions, the Klipfone headset provides a simple elegant solution.
WILL KLIPFONE SUPPORT MY PHONE AS WELL AS ADDITIONAL DEVICES?
The Klipfone headset will pair with up to two devices simultaneously - a phone, and a tablet or a laptop that support wireless capability. Once paired with your phone and one additional device, the Klipfone headset will play the audio from either device seamlessly, one at a time.
ARE THERE DIFFERENT SIZES OF EARBUDS TO FIT DIFFERENT EARS?
With the Klipfone headset, one size actually does fit all. Its unique shape allows it to securely clip into your ear without trying to squeeze an ear-bud into your ear canal as done by conventional headsets.
ARE THERE PLANS FOR FOLLOW ON FUTURE PRODUCTS
We plan to develop and bring to market various Klipfone headset versions that will fit a wide variety of devices. In addition, we are planning several add-on modules and cases to complement the Klipfone headset. These peripherals will provide added battery power, charging, and protection for the Klipfone headset and the phone itself. 
We are planning an upgrade path for Klipfone backers to future models and accessories.
 
 
Patents

THE KLIPFONE PRODUCT IS LICENSED UNDER US PATENTS 6,952,617 & 7,149,543, AND CHINA PATENT ZL00801959.2, AND RELATED US AND INTERNATIONAL PENDING PATENTS.
campaign_city: San Francisco Bay Area, United States

story:
USB CHARGERS NEED TO BE SAFER 

Recent major recalls by Apple, Microsoft

and others prove this.

 

THE AVERT USB SAFETY ADAPTOR, WILL PROTECT YOU, YOUR FAMILY & FRIENDS 


What is the Problem?

USB Charger's have no built-in electrical protection which means that if an electrical fault occurs, in or downstream of the charging unit, the electricity can not be isolated or cut-off.

Many homes and commercial buildings have Safety devices (RCD's Residual Current Devices & GFCI's Ground Fault Current Interrupters) installed in the switchboard, however they do not provide protection against DC (Direct Current) ELV (Extra Low Voltage) electrical faults, which can occur with USB charged products.

Why Are USB Chargers Dangerous?

The voltage these USB chargers produce (typically 3 Volts to 9 Volts DC) is not the issue, the up to 3 Amps of current they produce, is the safety problem and can do serious damage with an unfortunate circumstance.

Fibrillation of the heart occurs at 50 to 100milli-amps and 3 amps is 30 times greater than 100milli-amps.  Fire can also start from as low 100milli-amps.

                

The Avert USB Safety Adaptor 

The Avert USB Safety Adaptor, incorporates a unique ‘Blu-Chip’ technology, that detects and cuts-off the power when an electrical fault is detected, at DC ELV levels, when charging or using electronic devices, safe-guarding the lives of individuals when needed most.

We all use USB Rechargeable Products Everyday - yet none of them has 'Built-in Electrical Protection' to guard against an electrical fault condition, product misuse or electrical safety complacency.

Just like surge control devices, which are commonly used to protect computers and electronic goods from voltage surges, the Avert USB Safety Adapter protects you and your family from a potentially dangerous electrical fault conditions.

                                     

Why are manufacturers of USB chargers & products               not providing electrical protection?

Manufacturers of electronic products are using USB Charger-Adaptors to recharge their products, but these USB Chargers are not as SAFE as they should be... Electrically. 

There is a perception that there is no danger when using USB chargeable products because of the ELV and Double Insulation, however there can be up to 3 amps of current & no electrical protection on these low voltage DC chargers.

                          

Global Product Safety Recalls 

Recently, even trusted manufacturers such as Apple and Microsoft have been forced to carry out major recalls of some of their charging products due to some users receiving electrical shocks or resultant fires.
There are also large numbers of other manufacturers that have had products banned or recalled over the last few years, due to serious electrical safety incidents or fires.
Many Documented Cases 
There are many documented cases of injuries or electrocutions caused by USB chargers, highlighting these SAFETY concerns. These range from phones being accidently dropped into water while charging, to infants sucking on an electrically connected USB cord. 

USB Rechargeable Products – Reported Electrical Incident Case Studies

Case 1 – USA (5 November 2015) Girl killed in her sleep while wearing ear-buds.....

Case 2 - USA (8 January 2010) Toddler sucks on USB cord, receives third degree burns on her tongue, palate and lips and possible neurological damage....

Case 3 - Russia (13 February 2015) Charging smartphone electrocutes woman while In bath.....

Case 4 – CHINA (16 July, 2013) Woman in China electrocuted after answering a call on her smartphone while the device was recharging....

Case 5 – UK (10 June, 2015) Phone charger started fire that killed five members of a family died in a horrific house fire started by a faulty phone charger.....

Case 6 – UK (10 December, 2013) A Smartphone charging overnight, catches fire and leaves burn mark on bedside table. Phone is burnt out and destroyed- fortunately no one was hurt....

Case 7 – Australia (27 June 2014) A Woman is electrocuted by a faulty USB phone charger was wearing headphones and holding her laptop was found dead with burns on her ears and chest…

All of these incidents could have been prevented 

using the Avert USB Safety Adaptor

                                                

                       

                            


        How many will die or be seriously injured before manufacturers include electrical protection?


Key Features: Avert USB Safety Adapter

  • Located near the user and detects/isolates electrical faults very quickly.
  • Provides electrical isolation/cut-off, not currently available in USB chargeable products.
  • Enhanced protection, mitigating electrical fire risk.
  • Compatible with any device using a USB port for charging.
  • Suitable for 110V or 230V/240V electrical distribution systems.
  • Electrical protection for USB charged products in houses with no RCD or GFCI.
  • Does not slow down the rate of charging.
  • Incorporated re-set button
  • Multiple USB Port Outlets

If you would like to be one of the first to own the AVERT– USB Safety Adaptor and be part of making the WORLD A SAFER PLACE ... ELECTRICALLY,  invest in this project.

For more information please email us:  info@Wwestech.com

Critical Next Step

The world is now at a critical phase in the evolution of electrical safety and the emergence of battery powered power distribution, off-grid and unearthed applications has meant that electrical safety can be compromised in many areas.

As mankind comes to depend more on the use of electrical products, it is paramount that electrical safety evolves to keep pace with these developments as safety switches do not always provide electrical protection.

Project Timeline

             

Risks and Challenges

We have an experienced technical & creative team to ensure a smooth pathway during the development and manufacture of large volumes of the Avert USB Safety Adapter and ‘Blu-Chip’. Quality control will be a priority.

Our team includes Doctor of Electronics, Electronics Designer, Electrical Engineers, Electrical Technicians, Industrial Designers & Business Development Personnel thus we have the skills within our core team to solve any problem that arise during the design & manufacturing phases.

Our team is very experienced in attaining Certifications and Regulatory Approvals.

Future Direction

In the future our unique Blu-chip technology will be incorporated into OEM (Original Equipment Manufacturer) and other third party products such as existing electrical systems and consumer appliances such as toasters, hairdryers, white-goods, computers, laptops and tablets etc.

                     

Other Ways You Can Help

Send this link to your family & friends; 

http://igg.me/at/The-Avert-USB/x/13065732

If you want a Safer USB Charger Adaptor please support this project, it may SAVE someone’s Life …… It Might Be Yours !!!

        Your Support is greatly appreciated

story:
15.6” e-DP IPS Full HD display for  Raspberry Pi, Android’s, Google Chromecast, Win 8 ,  Modularized PC Dream!! 

One open hardware platform  for 4 OS  & 5 more applications. 


One Full HD 15.6” display.  Any OS and Application  by your design from       $ 199 …….

     This is first modular AIO concept in the world, you can  be free to choose 4 different OS and 5 applications as you wish. That device can fully support Raspberry Pi, Android’s, Google Chromecast, Windows under 1080P very high definition, and the application for AIO PC, Tablet, Small TV and many innovative idea by your imagination.      

Equipped advanced e-DP IPS 1920*1080 wide view angel LCD display, stunning 1080P 2K full HD picture and movie, best visual sensation  whichever OS and application you choose. 


Fulfill Modularized Computer Dream.  

About 10~15 years ago. users can define equipment device yourselves. Presently hardware makers provide one set computer under sole OS & application, therefore, we always purchase different computers with different purposes. Today we give you cellular concept PC, ONE device can perfectly match 4~5 different OS and transform to many applications.  


Environment Friendly !!  

Currently PC and tablet design waste many resources, people own more than 3 sets PC devices due to technology advancement. We believe that open hardware platform concept can help you make the most of  Raspberry Pi, Android & cloud technologies, and furthermore, reduce hardware duplicates but colorize your lives.    

New Generation Display -15.6” e-DP IPS  1920*1080  TFT-LCD.  

e-DP IPS 1920*1080 LCD is normally designed for very high end Notebook, special advantages of low power consumption, high definition and wide view angle, we supply top of the line display to meet all of your needs efficiently.    

Achieve Simple & Innovation life  

We think people can build own character PC device under unlimited crazy ideas.  

This unprecedented multi-functional open hardware platform breaks divide between PC, tablet and TV.  

People can use single device for multiple OS & application.  

Creativity, Education &  Environment. 

For user, the modular PC concept will inspire young people & user to have chance to know more  different OS,  and to build more efficiency hardware with limited cost, most important concept is Environment friendly. 


Project schedule and timeline :  

2014. Aug e-DP AD Board design  

2014. Dec e-DP AD Board Testing  

2015. Feb e-DP LCD & AD BOARD turning.  

2015. Mar. Making tooling of Casing.  

2015. Apr. Display turning with kinds of HDMI devices  

2015. May Start Campaign.  

2015. Jun. New AD Board mass production.  

2015. Aug.  Casing Mass Production.  

2015. Sep. Module PC display platform assembly & package 

2015. Oct. Shipping by EMS about 5~8 days.



RISKS & CHALENGES

Before coming to Indiegogo we wanted to ensure that our display could be a reality. We started over 9 months ago developing this display. At current stage, we are still trying to make it better, but even we fail to make it on time, you still could get a working one as you see in the video or pictures if you want to get the whole product earlier. And such modification would not influence the cost. There are still some minor parts such as the tripod or other accessories not shown in the perk list, but it would be easier to make it on time.

We are confident our 4 month production timeline is achievable. Since in the major parts, like LCD or casing, there is no design out of manufacturing ability. What we need to do is to keep everything on schedule. And we would update you here and twitter to keep everyone informed. 


If you have any question besides below FAQ, you may contact us through Indiegogo, Twitter, or our email, jonathan@celltechtw.com, thank you!

FAQ

1. Where do you ship to?

We use EMS service. According to their list of destinations, they could cover every countries on the world.

2. Is shipping fee included?

No, considering the size and weight of package, we could not give only one fee for every countries. So please adding below extra fee per perk while making payment.

Shipping to USA, Canada and Europe is $70;

shipping to Asia is $50;

shipping to other countries is $100.

The only exception is it is free to ship to Taiwan, where factory locates.

3. Is VAT included?

No, you would be responsible for any VAT or customs duties levied by your own countries.

4. Is there a product spec sheet available ?

Yes, we would provide it online when every spec is confirmed and fixed. The basic product specification could be find in above article.

5. Do you have a warranty?

No, at current stage we do not have such resources to maintain the repair system, and it would be considered when we move to next stage to offer more service. To ensure the quality, every parts, including LCD, would be 100% inspected  before delivery. And we would still offer help online to help you make it right.

6. Can I return my perk?

Unfortunately no, all of our sales here on Indiegogo are final. But, if you are having any problem or unhappy with your perk, you can always contact us and we will try our best to work something out.

7. Why touch panel is not a standard part?

First, the cost of touch panel with good performance on big size LCD is a little high. Second, according to our understanding, such touch function, especially multi touch could not work well on Raspberry yet because of the driver issue. So we decide not to make it as a standard part. Keyboard and mouse should be enough to work with this display. However you still could choose the set including touch panel if you are interested in that.

story:
MagicHome is a smart home starter package utilizing the world's largest open-sourced IoT framework, AllSeen Alliance’s AllJoyn.

Existing smart home packages are focused on home security or home energy savings. However, there are numerous parts to install and difficult to setup. This is why a lot of people are reluctant to start using IoT products for the home. MagicHome’s starter package is an easy to use smart home solution that utilizes IoT in an efficient manner.

Most smart bulbs use a standard E26 base. If you have a lamp that supports this type, just plug it in and connect it to your wi-fi network. Our smart plug can be plugged into any existing outlet and connected to your home appliances.

Simply plug in our MagicCast device into your TV's or monitor's HDMI port to enjoy instant smart home solutions as well as other various media services.

Smart plugs and light bulbs can easily be controlled by connecting them to your home’s wi-fi network and controlled via either our UI through your TV or our app.

Plug in any of your home appliances or devices into our MagicHome Smart Power Plug to obtain instant control through the MagicHome app. MagicHome also utilizes multiple media services that will help create scenarios that users want and control other smart tools.

Through the MagicCast HDMI stick, you can control your smart plugs and bulbs using the provided UI through your TV/monitor as well as the app that we have developed. The MagicCast device is the core of our package and is extremely smart and customizable.

You can enjoy a smarter lifestyle with various media services and convenience features.

Customize your home settings when watching a movie or playing a game. Once setup, it'll activate automatically.

You can see the amount of electricity you’re using in real-time and also the rates so you can plan the amount you wish to use and help save energy.

Information is delivered effectively through our user interface to your TV or monitor.

If you don’t like coming into a dark home, turn on the lights before coming in. If you’re worried about theft while on vacation, you can control your bulbs and other devices like your TV or stereo to dissuade robbers. Customize your own scenarios and control your home from wherever, whenever.

Media/Game Mode: Select Game mode to enjoy various effects while playing a game with our bulbs. You can select Media mode to set the lighting for when watching videos or looking through your digital photo albums.


Welcome Mode: You can set up a customized Welcome mode to turn on appliances and have your smartphone connect to your wi-fi network when you return home. Through Call Mode, a user can be notified that he or she is getting a call with an on-screen alert via your TV or monitor as well as your smart bulbs blinking to notify you.

Remote Control Mode: Using LTE or 3G Networks, you can control your smart peripherals from anywhere at anytime.

MagicHome's smart power plug is currently produced to match the standards for South Korea, France, Germany, Austria, Greece, Turkey, and many other countries utilizing a Type C plug.

We are currently developing and testing plugs to be compatible with Type A, B, and G plugs to support the United States, Canada, Japan, England, Malaysia, Singapore, etc. For a complete list of plug types and the supported countries, please check the following link here.


Delivery of Perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed.

With the Early Bird and Basic Pack you'll receive one MagicCast HDMI stick, one Smart Power Plug, and one Smart LED Bulb.


We have strong expertise in HW&SW: Most AllJoyn based IoT manufacturers develop hardware and software separately. Thus, a lot of those solutions companies have compatibility issues with other devices. However, Innopia developed the hardware and software in conjunction to guarantee compatibility.

Our team consists of Linux & Android SW Specialists: A lot of developers have experience in developing embedded software. We developed our platform using Linux  and Android based software that's proven to be consistent and stable.

Design House Experience: Based on various SoC manufacturers’ design house experience, we offer the optimal AllJoyn device.

Media as IoT: Based on our field experience in broadcasting and communication service, we see media service as one IoT system. Develop and offer various services based on this.

AllSeen Alliance is the biggest open IoT consortium that includes Qualcomm, LG, Microsoft, SONY, Cannon and 180 other corporations as members. It can be categorized into a solutions company, broadcasting services operator, as well as a CE manufacturing group. With AllSeen’s IoT platform and AllJoyn’s wi-fi based framework, they have been actively building a corporate ecosystem for IoT using various software that is not only limited to big home appliances.

Innopia was the second Korean company to join AllSeen Alliance in 2014 following LG’s entry and we are developing various other products other than MagicHome’s Starter Package.
story_txt:
MagicHome is a smart home starter package
utilizing the world's largest open-sourced IoT framework, AllSeen Alliance’s AllJoyn.Existing smart home packages are focused on home security or
home energy savings. However, there are numerous parts to install and difficult
to setup. This is why a lot of people are reluctant to start using IoT products
for the home. MagicHome’s starter package is an easy to use smart home solution
that utilizes IoT in an efficient manner. 
Most smart bulbs use a standard E26 base. If you have a lamp that
supports this type, just plug it in and connect it to your wi-fi network. Our smart
plug can be plugged into any existing outlet and connected to your home
appliances. 
Simply plug in our MagicCast device into your TV's or monitor's HDMI
port to enjoy instant smart home solutions as well as other
various media services. 

Smart plugs and light bulbs can easily be controlled by connecting
them to your home’s wi-fi network and controlled via either our UI through your TV or our app. 

Plug in any of your home appliances or devices into our MagicHome Smart Power Plug to obtain instant control through the MagicHome app. MagicHome also utilizes multiple media services that will help
create scenarios that users want and control other smart tools. 


Through the MagicCast HDMI stick, you can control your smart plugs and bulbs using the provided UI through your TV/monitor as well as the app that we have developed. The MagicCast device is the core of our package and is extremely smart and customizable. 


You can enjoy a smarter lifestyle with various media
services and convenience features.Customize your home settings when watching a movie or playing a game. Once setup, it'll activate automatically.You can see the amount of
electricity you’re using in real-time and also the rates so you can plan the
amount you wish to use and help save energy.Information is delivered effectively through our user
interface to your TV or monitor.



If you don’t
like coming into a dark home, turn on the lights before coming in. If you’re
worried about theft while on vacation, you can control your bulbs and other
devices like your TV or stereo to dissuade robbers. Customize your own scenarios and control your home from wherever, whenever. 
Media/Game Mode: Select Game mode to enjoy various
effects while playing a game with our bulbs. You can select Media mode to set
the lighting for when watching videos or looking through your digital photo
albums. 
Welcome Mode: You can set up a customized Welcome mode to
turn on appliances and have your smartphone connect to your wi-fi network when
you return home. Through Call Mode, a user can be notified that he or she is
getting a call with an on-screen alert via your TV or monitor as well as your
smart bulbs blinking to notify you. 
Remote Control Mode: Using LTE or 3G Networks, you can control
your smart peripherals from anywhere at anytime. 


MagicHome's smart power plug is currently produced to match the standards for South Korea, France, 
              Germany, Austria, Greece, Turkey, and many other countries utilizing a Type C plug.We are currently developing and testing plugs to be compatible with Type A, B, and G plugs to support the United States, Canada, Japan, England, Malaysia, Singapore, etc. For a complete list of plug types and the supported countries, please check the following link here.Delivery of Perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed.With the Early Bird and Basic Pack you'll receive one MagicCast HDMI stick, one Smart Power Plug, and one Smart LED Bulb.We have strong
expertise in HW&SW: Most AllJoyn based IoT manufacturers develop hardware
and software separately. Thus, a lot of those solutions companies have
compatibility issues with other devices. However, Innopia developed the
hardware and software in conjunction to guarantee compatibility.
Our team consists of Linux
& Android SW Specialists: A lot of developers have experience in developing
embedded software. We developed our platform using Linux  and Android based software that's proven to be consistent and stable. 
Design
House Experience: Based on various SoC manufacturers’ design house experience,
we offer the optimal AllJoyn device. 
Media
as IoT: Based on our field experience in broadcasting and communication
service, we see media service as one IoT system. Develop and offer various services
based on this. AllSeen Alliance is the biggest open IoT consortium that
includes Qualcomm, LG, Microsoft, SONY, Cannon and 180 other corporations as
members. It can be categorized into a solutions company, broadcasting services
operator, as well as a CE manufacturing group. With AllSeen’s IoT platform and
AllJoyn’s wi-fi based framework, they have been actively building a corporate
ecosystem for IoT using various software that is not only limited to big home
appliances. Innopia was the second Korean company to join AllSeen Alliance in 2014
following LG’s entry and we are developing various other products other than
MagicHome’s Starter Package.

story:
The world's most powerful modular case



AS FEATURED ON


THIS IS THE ANDROID DEVICE YOU WERE LOOKING FOR

Introducing a revolutionary mobile device case made to be customized to your needs. MODR allows you to personalize your smartphone and tablet with interchangeable modules and camera lenses. Multiple expansion options are made possible by a patent-pending built-in USB hub. 


LIST OF SUPPORTED DEVICES

Samsung Galaxy S4

Samsung Galaxy S5

Samsung Galaxy S6

Apple iPhone 6

Apple iPhone 6+

Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge (Unlocked with stretch goal #1)

Samsung Galaxy Note 4 (Unlocked with stretch goal #2)

Stretch Goal Support: 
LG G3
LG G4
OnePlus One
Droid Turbo
Moto X
Moto G
HTC One M7
HTC One M8
HTC One M9
Note 4 Edge

& More… Please let us know which models you want supported!

MODR is the last protective mobile device case you'll ever need. 


WIRELESS CHARGING

Built-in Qi-compatible wireless charging capabilities allow you to charge your device simply by placing it down on our MODR Charge Mat.


SWAPPABLE reMODULES

Tiny reModules can be selected and swapped to completely customize your smartphone or tablet. All reModules will be available at launch, with more devices available if we reach our stretch goals. The reModules will work on all versions of MODR, so you can keep them for your next smart device, and share them between your smartphone and tablet.

X-PAND X-PONENTIALLY
WITH THE X-PORT


Connect larger expansion modules to the rear X-Port, with a 2500mAh battery pack available at launch. Battery powered bluetooth speakers, Pico projector and solar charger X-Port accessories will be available if stretch goals are achieved. These accessories will extend the functionality of your smart device even further, into the realm of a portable theater and beyond.

USB ON-THE-GO HUB

  


MODR makes astonishing expandability possible by being the world’s first smart device case containing a patent-pending built-in USB hub. Taking advantage of the amazing USB On-The-Go technology integrated in Android’s operating system, MODR can connect multiple devices while simultaneously charging your smart device. With the ability to switch between acting as a USB host and peripheral, On-The-Go is the most advanced way to connect external devices to your smartphone or tablet.

LENS MOUNT


MODR enables a variety of beautiful and versatile images to be captured on a tiny smart device camera, thanks to powerful lenses. Macro, wide angle, zoom and fisheye lenses can be quickly attached and removed via a strong magnet, with no power or software required.


KICKSTAND

Work or play for hours in comfort with MODR’s sturdy kickstand, which allows you to enjoy all your new functionality without having to hold the phone all day.

PROTECTIVE CASING

A soft, shock absorbent interior is encased within a hard external shell to protect your valuable devices and their internal circuitry from impact and scratches. Everything is held together with a heat transfer adhesive to keep things cool. Super-slim and flexible circuitry allows us to keep the form factor of the case slim and trim, helping make MODR less bulky than the leading technological smartphone cases.

CHARGE/SYNC MODES

Power the MODR and its accessories directly by your smart device, or via external power, such as wireless charging, an external battery or a USB charge cable. Syncing is also possible via USB cable. 

APP CONTROL

MODR can be controlled by our app, which is in development.



No other smart device case on planet Earth can boast the type of functionality that MODR can, right out of the box. MODR has been in development for over 2 years, and is currently in a prototype phase, ready for the production phase. At launch, the Samsung Galaxy S4, S5 and S6 will be supported, with more devices added if our stretch goals are reached. 

PERKS & STRETCH GOALS

We will confirm the model you want via email

REFERRAL PROGRAM


PRODUCT TIMELINE


May 19th, 2015 – Launch campaign.

June 22nd, 2015 – Campaign funding period ends.

July 8th , 2015 – Funds transferred production can begin.

-  Tooling begins to get manufactured.

-  Order components in bulk.

-  Establish manufacturing process

Sep 15th , 2015 – Manufacturing assembly complete.

Oct 1th , 2015 – First shipments to funders go out.

Oct 15th , 2015 – Shipments to funders complete.

MEET THE MODR TEAM


Vlad Ivanovski

Co-Founder
Chief Executive Officer
Award-Winning Entrepreneur, Electrical Engineer, Creative Media Consultant
@whosyourvladi

Oliver Sandovski

Co-Founder
Chief Operating Officer
Experienced in Industrial Engineering, 3D Modelling, Prototyping, Production & Logistics
@oliverskii

We have known each other for over 20 years, and have developed complementary abilities that, when combined, give us a complete skill set to ensure we can take MODR to the store shelves and beyond. Our experience with developing a sports entertainment product allowed us to battle the Dragons on CBC's Dragon's Den (unfortunately, the episode never aired), be featured in Popular Mechanics as the top gadget of the NY Toy Fair, win the 2009 Design Exchange Award for Engineering, and be featured on the CTV morning show. We have the entrepreneurship experience to take an idea from idea to consumer, plain and simple.

JOIN THE SMARTPHONE REVOLUTION

We have the ability and the ingenuity to make MODR happen, and we come to you, our backers, for the cash to help us realize our goals. With your contributions, we will change the way people approach their smartphones, tablets and laptops forever. No longer will we be satisfied with paying exorbitant prices for only the most basic functionality in our smart devices and their cases.With MODR, you can upgrade your current phone without breaking the bank, and enjoy functionality not found anywhere else.


With the money raised by this campaign, we plan to create the molds for the Samsung Galaxy S4, S5 and S6 versions of our case, as well as for the reModules and X-Port accessories. We will purchase components in bulk to keep the costs down, and ensure that we will have short lead times while maintaining quality control. We will also use funds for app support, advertising, certifications, taxes, as well as any fees associated with crowdfunding. 

RISKS & CHALLENGES

Our challenges include the uncertainty of entering an untapped market, as well as competing against multi-million dollar companies. We are confident in our market research, and there is a massive untapped market that will now be served by MODR. Our experience in creating successful and unique electronics products will give us the tools needed to ensure we get the job done.

Comments, Questions, Ideas?

Please leave comments to leave questions or comments, and share our campaign on social media using the share links above to receive valuable Referral bonuses. 

Find This Campaign On Facebook, Twitter, and at GoMODR.com

story:
A bit "About Me" and "Background Check"

Hi. I am Gurudatt from India (you may call me Crypto Guru or just Guru) and started my first venture in 1991 with my buddies writing software for airports and saving water in factories in India.

Post that, I worked with small and big (the largest in India) companies in India for about 20 years. In 2009, I started my own project, invested all my savings and started on the path to making online users secure, protecting their identity and information from hackers and marketeers or just people who want to steal and sell your data. With (when you agree to the terms of use of a website) or without your permission. 

Initially I though I could create something and sell it to the banks, make a lot of money and then develop "My" project.

However, that did not happen as Banks did not want a secure system but a solution where they can make a lot more money by charging customers. 

The out of band password-less authentication developed by me (which was a finalist at the Global Security Challenge in 2011 and vetted by Lockheed Martin/IC2 of Texas University) was considered ahead of its time by banks in India and quite low tech (as compared to Biometric authentication)  by western markets.

I had to close down the venture as quickly as it started. However, the idea did not close down and you can see the tech in action on my latest project InviSocial.com

Now Building "Your" Network

From being a "My" project, I want to make it a "Your" project. The current name is "InviSocial" which means Invi(sible) Social.  It is free to sign up and test it.

The world's most secure and private network. Be it for Social or Business, Community or Enterprise, the goal is to get online users taste, use and host their own encrypted network.

The Beta version is here. When I say "Beta" it means the product is not without bugs. So it will stay that way till the code is re-written from bottom up by a bunch of cool cat coders and designers.

Until then, this is the best out there. If you check the comparison of self hosted social networking services at https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Comparison_of_social_networking_software

For the moment, to keep the project live and kicking, I seek your interest foremost and financial contribution.

What is InviSocial, What can you do with it!

Invisocial is not one thing but two things. The website www.invisocial.com is a free social networking service that even businesses can use to create their own internal private network.

Using this FREE service, you can create an online profile such as the one I have created at Invisocial.com/gurudatt and keep blogging and turn your account into a blog.

If you are the social type,  you can invite your friends to Invisocial.com and use the service to privately share updates, pictures, files, contacts, online identities, bookmarks, etc All of which is secure and encrypted.

However, all of your data is resident on InviSocial.com's server which is very limited and cannot handle more than a few hundred users for now.  Which through your contribution the number can be bumped up to a few thousand users. Maybe more.

Now the second thing that InviSocial offers is the platform for create your own social network, blog, website on your own website or server using the very same features or with some customization. All in one working day. This is called the hosted version of Invisocial and which is a paid version and starts with $24.99 as the basic price. More about this is available on Invisocial.com/about

How is InviSocial different from other Social Networks!

For one, InviSocial is the only platform/service where all of the user data is encrypted. This is not just the password or email address but everything you post, your chat, your personal messages, contact lists, Everything.

This ensures that InviSocial offers the maximum privacy and security for your identity and information.

Second, InviSocial is completely advertisement free. There will and not be any advertisements. Putting third party advertisements not only is irritating but also can bring in viruses and thus there is no chance of such thing happening on InviSocial.com

There are no backdoors. There is no password recovery option. This means though we store your password in encrypted form, the encryption method used is so strong that even we cannot retrieve it if you forget it. You will have no option but to create a new account. However, we provide the option of exporting all your encrypted data and files and you can then import it to your new account. So better not forget your password.

Besides logging in using UserName/Password, Invisocial.com is the only website that offers Secure T-Pin password less authentication that works exactly like how you withdraw cash from an ATM machine. This T-Pin is registered by you and you can login to your account from only your computer. Your T-Pin will not work on another computer and allow them to access your account even if they come to know about it. Thus this offers hack proof protection from viruses that steal your login credentials. Using T-Pin secure login ensures that you do not have to use the normal username/password and can use it only for sign in from a computer where the T-Pin will not work. Using and Remembering T-Pin is more easy than a lengthy password. And locking it to your computer makes it highly secure.

Besides using InviSocial as a social network, you can create a internal network for your organization that is hidden or invisible to the rest of the members.

And finally unlike other mainstream social networks, InviSocial offers to host your own network on your own website and transfer the data from InviSocial.com whenever you decide to make the change.


What is needed to keep the ball rolling.

The amount of money requested here ($50,000 in all) is required primarily for the following activities:

  • Incorporate a company some place where Government will not shut it down.
  • Host the service on a server that is protected and cannot be influenced by two or three letter agencies.
  • Provide a running service and a support team that gives 24x7 delight.
  • Hire bunch of coders and people to spread the word. Interns are welcome.
  • Get some expert designer to make sure people keep visiting and joining.
  • Legally Protect the technology by way of patent, copyright, etc with the company. Or better open source it.
What do you as a contributor get in return?
For one, you will be part of a project that could be the next big thing. And not something that you will be on the sidelines but in it with your fingers in the pie. 
Your voice will be important for the project and you will use "Your" network to contribute as this will not be one giant network with one founder but millions of smaller networks empowering each owner.
Encouraged by the response I have thus far received on the project, I have decided to make the current service hosted on InviSocial.com as a free service and help others to create similar networks using the InviSocial platform.
Your contribution will be immortalized and will always remain part of the service.

What is the target and what if?

Having worked with other start-ups and having seen most of them fail including my own in 2011, I have learned some lessons in managing a start-up.

  • Spend money on activities that generates more money.
  • Use innovative marketing not waste money on consultants.
  • Brainstorm, Revise, Brainstorm and Re-Revise the marketing plan.
  • Get 50,000 users sign up in the first year. The 5 million in the second.
  • Have everyone join and taste it for Free. Charge for the hosted version.
  • There are millions of small business that need a website, blog or network.
  • Free hosting for human rights groups and those in service of humanity and the planets welfare.
  • Create the app version.
The sinking feeling is that the project is too ambitious especially with Billion user giants in the social and business networking sphere with huge advertising and marketing muscle. 
But the good feeling is that these very giants once started like "Your" network. So why not take the risk to be the next one! Though a more humble giant.
Other Ways You Can Help

Yes. Not everyone has money but there are many with talent. So if you are one of them you can contribute in any of the following ways:

  • You can help us with the software coding, bug support, etc
  • We would like to translate the project in as many different languages so maybe you can help here.
  • Spread the word, get people to sign up for Free on Invisocial.com
  • Any other help that can take the project from "My" to "Yours"

And finally unlike other mainstream social networks, InviSocial offers to host your own network on your own website and transfer the data from InviSocial.com whenever you decide to make the change.What is needed to keep the ball rolling.
  
The amount of money requested here ($50,000 in all) is required primarily for the following activities:
  Incorporate a company some place where Government will not shut it down.
 Host the service on a server that is protected and cannot be influenced by two or three letter agencies. Provide a running service and a support team that gives 24x7 delight.
Hire bunch of coders and people to spread the word. Interns are welcome.
Get some expert designer to make sure people keep visiting and joining.
Legally Protect the technology by way of patent, copyright, etc with the company. Or better open source it.


What do you as a contributor get in return?
For one, you will be part of a project that could be the next big thing. And not something that you will be on the sidelines but in it with your fingers in the pie. 
Your voice will be important for the project and you will use "Your" network to contribute as this will not be one giant network with one founder but millions of smaller networks empowering each owner.
Encouraged by the response I have thus far received on the project, I have decided to make the current service hosted on InviSocial.com as a free service and help others to create similar networks using the InviSocial platform. 

Your contribution will be immortalized and will always remain part of the service.   What is the target and what if?  Having worked with other start-ups and having seen most of them fail including my own in 2011, I have learned some lessons in managing a start-up.  Spend money on activities that generates more money. Use innovative marketing not waste money on consultants.
Brainstorm, Revise, Brainstorm and Re-Revise the marketing plan.
Get 50,000 users sign up in the first year. The 5 million in the second.
Have everyone join and taste it for Free. Charge for the hosted version.
There are millions of small business that need a website, blog or network.
Free hosting for human rights groups and those in service of humanity and the planets welfare.
Create the app version. 
The sinking feeling is that the project is too ambitious especially with Billion user giants in the social and business networking sphere with huge advertising and marketing muscle. 
But the good feeling is that these very giants once started like "Your" network. So why not take the risk to be the next one! Though a more humble giant.

Other Ways You Can Help

 Yes. Not everyone has money but there are many with talent. So if you are one of them you can contribute in any of the following ways:  You can help us with the software coding, bug support, etc We would like to translate the project in as many different languages so maybe you can help here.
Spread the word, get people to sign up for Free on Invisocial.com
Any other help that can take the project from "My" to "Yours"

story:
Why need this mobile phone cooler
Nowadays people are more and more rely on mobile phone. From a lot of investigations we found that people face varied problems while using mobile phone, such as phone fever, no gamepad while playing games,no holder while watching movie and make a video call, phone battery out of juice at crucial moment. All of these problems lead people feel inconvenient and uncomfortable. THEFEIYONG team designed a multi-function mobile phone cooler with the functions of cooler, holder, and gamepad and power charger to solve all above problems.

It is adopt high intensity design, and can protect your phone when it falling or collision. You are no more afraid during watching movie and playing phone game.

Mobile Phone cooler It is adopt high quality aluminum alloy with high-end fan, not only cool the phone fast but also can protect phone refrain from performance reduction, crash or electronic component damage. Gives your phone multiple protections.

Mobile Phone holder, free your hands  It is basis on human sitting posture angle when watching movie and making video call.
After numerous tests, our team research out three angles which could fit human body posture during watch movie and make video calls, make you enjoy the visual feast, at the same time free your hands. You can choose the proper angle in your own way.

Gamepad  Multifunction phone cooler is convenient to carry and you can enjoy games wherever you want. Don't worry about phone drop and you must hold phone by hands when you are play mobile phone games. On both ends of the Multi-function phone cooler holders uses the food grade silica gel let you have baby skin touch feelings, and bring you a better game experience.

Mobile Phone charger  Our team cooperates with professional power bank manufacturer and produced Multi-function phone cooler dedicated battery. Make you no more troubled by battery died at crucial moment.If your phones battery died during using, just take out data cable charge for phone and continue to use it. This data cable has double-ends, can support different brands of mobile phones on the market.

Mobile phone fixed This phone cooler using Nano micro absorbing material, The suction is strong, easy to disassembly, spot free, it also can scrub with water and repeated use.


Outstanding performance

THEFEIYONG Team introduction

Li Fei  - Founder & Executive Director

Fei has worked in a famous Japanese company as R&D engineer for ten years. Invented more than ten patented products, and has rich experience on products invent and design.

Jiang Quanyong  - Founder & CTO

Yong has worked in a computer peripherals company as design development engineer for seven years. He is responsible for product technical development and technical support.

Susan Tan - Founder & CSO

Susan has worked in a large-scale computer peripherals company as international CSO for seven years, during her tenure, she successfully planning many business activities.

He Hu  - Production Supervisor

He has many years experience on production management.

Hou Tao  - QC Supervisor

He has worked in a mobile accessories facotory for five years,has rich experience on quality control.


Frequently Asked Questions(FAQ)

Q: How to use the funds?
A: We have invested in design, mold and trial production costs; INDIEGOGO all funds raised will help us to find the first order. Promote the project starting.


Q: When do your products deliver?
A: According to our plan, we will deliver products in one and a half months after receiving INDIEGOGO funs. Delivery is expected in beginning of May.

Q: Whether my phone apply your products or not?
A: THEFEIYONG Multifunction mobile phone cooler available for all mobile phones in the market.

Q: How big does the battery capacity?
A: 3000MAH.

Q: How can I check the use of battery?
A: There are four indicators show battery condition; Tip: battery indicator light is only 25%, please charge.

Q: How to use nano micro absorbing?
A: Torn micro absorbing surface protection film, mobile phone back stick to plane directly. Available to use wet tissue to clean the surface.

Q: How to contact us?
A: There are any problems, please send email to sales@taihe-tech.com.

story:
We live in a flood of electronic devices, and when we run out of batteries, we become nervous
Especially smartphones.
And there is convenient wireless charging these days.

 

 

"

By the way
Are you satisfied

with

Wireless charging?

"

 

 

Wireless charging is obviously convenient, but there are a few inconveniences
1. It is not easy to use it at the same time as charging.
2. Charging speed and efficiency are lower than wired charging.

In times when we need the points mentioned above, we eventually use wired charging.
But the long cable is bothersome and makes the space more massy

 

 

                                                          

"

Then we thought,
what if the cable came out of the wireless charger?
In a very neat way

"

 

 

 

 

That's why we bundled a retractable cable to organize the cable right within the fast wireless charger.
It uses a wireless charging and retractable cable to charge with cable easily
 when you need faster wired charging during wireless charging

 

 


Let us introduce the THINGS Hybrid Charger!,
capable of charging both wireless and wired at the same time

World’s first wireless/wired charger [THINGS Hybrid Charger]
A fusion of fast wireless charging and fast wired charging!

 

Be the first in the world through the Indiegogo campaign.

 

 

*Advantages of the THINGS Hybrid Charger

 

-All in one

fast wireless charger + adapter, fast wired charger, and two cables
now All you need is THINGS hybrid charger.

 

-Clean charging environment

In general, when you use the wireless charger, you will also use the cable.
Now, keep your trim and clean charging environment!

 

 

-How to use various charging methods


< Example of THINGS Hybrid Charger Usage >

 

The power bank, Bluetooth speaker, portable fan, etc. used in daily life can be used conveniently while charging your phone at the same time

 

-Situational usefulness 


<When a call comes in when you are out of battery>

 

<When you want to play games while charging wirelessly>

 


<If you do not have battery when using smartphone before sleeping, use wireless charging after using wired charging>

 

There are many times when you need to use a smartphone when there is no time and you need to charge quickly or have no battery.
In such cases, it is difficult to use the smartphone while using the wireless charger.
At that time, pull the built-in reel cable lightly and adjust the length as you want, so you can use and charge it conveniently and cleanly.

 

 

-Dual coil

Two coils allow for fast wireless charging in both horizontal and vertical directions.
Charge it with ease, whether it is vertical or horizontal

 

-Up to 4mm thick case available for wireless charging

Plastic, leather, silicone and other non-metal case thickness less than 4mm can be charged.

* Remove metal attachments and credit cards from the backside of your smartphone.
* Even if the case thickness is less than 4mm, it may not be charged depending on the position of the smartphone.

 

-Retractable cable details

Compatible with all three types of cables

Please select the Retractable cable according to your smartphone or various devices. (Select 1)
If the Retractable cable malfunctions, or if you get a new smartphone or device, simply replace the Retractable cable to use.

 


< Easily replace with the desired Retractable cable >

 


<How to replace Retractable cable>

You can remove the Retractable cable by pushing the bottom button as shown in the picture, and can also easily attach by pushing it in

 


<Magnet cover and cable length of 80CM>

The length of the inner retractable cable can be freely adjusted up to 80cm.The retractable cable cover is equipped with a magnet so that the cover can be fixed at the top when using retractable cable.

 

-Ergonomic angle

Check on your smartphone easier with the most efficient stationary design on your desk

 

 

-Beautiful LED light


<Please check the light of smoothly moving LED>

The finishing touch of THINGS Hybrid Charger! Soft and lively LED light adds to the product's styling.

 

-You can check the charge status with soft and beautifully glittering LED light.

o Start of wireless charge - 3 smooth blinks

o Start of wired charge - 1 smooth blink

o Charging – No light (not to disturb with sleeping)

o In case of foreign materials in between the smartphone and the charger – Blinks quickly

o Charge complete – Stays on at low brightness

 

 

 

*THINGS Hybrid Charger Features

Qualcomm Quick Charge 3.0 and qi certification to be applied

We are planning to implement Qualcomm Quick Charge 3.0, which is a wireless certification system of wireless power consortium, and an international standard qi certification of wireless charging interface that charges up to four times faster than conventional charging.

 

THINGS Hybrid Charger is about 1.5 times faster than a typical 5V wireless charging with its 9V output.

 

A smartphone that is compatible with Quick Charge 3.0 is able to be charged from 0 to 80% in approximately 35 minutes.

This is four times faster than regular chargers and is twice as fast as Quick Charge 1.0.

* This data may vary depending on the model of smartphone, shipping date, and cable condition

 
 
 
THINGS Hybrid Charger is based on technologies such as metal detection, overheat protection, and overcurrent protection.
It safeguards the charging smartphone safely.
 
 
 
The lower exhaust port provides a smooth heat dissipation to lower the temperature of the product.
 
 
 

<THINGS hybrid charger fast wireless charging >

 

<THINGS hybrid charger fast wired charging >

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

-THINGS Hybrid Charger image

 

 

-Production process

About 10 months ago we started making products that could change the charging environment in the office and at home.
Through various design, agony and product mock-ups, we are now in the final stages of development.
We hope that supporters will be able to start the production of the THINGS Hybrid Charger.
I hope you will enjoy a clean and easy charging life with a new charging method.

 

-Product specifications

 

 

-Components

Components
- 1 THINGS Hybrid Charger
- 1 retractable cable (select one out of three)
- 1 power adapter

 

 

-Perk composition

 

-Plan

story:
2 WIRELESS DOCKS, charging 2 phones at once 

TWIST and turn, it becomes a phone stand

 

 

 

MATCH your lifestyle

 

Say BYE to your messy desk

Safe and practical

  •  no overcharging or heating will occur 
  •  can be used for all phones that are compatible with wireless chargers

 

SPECIFICATIONS

  • Product size: 18.5 x 8.5 x 1.7 cm
  • 2 setsof 5W , Qi V1.2.3 and backwards compatible
  • Charging distance : less or under 5mm
  • Input Voltage : DC 5V ( 4.6 - 5.5V )
  • Input current : 2A ( less or equal 1.5A power source is recommended )
  • Charging efficiency : Average less or equal = 66%
  • Operating temperature : 0-40 degree C
  • Relative humidity : 45 - 85%

 

DEVELOPMENT

We find out that in that location has no small and flexible wireless charging panel with mobile base which is in a smaller size and less in transportation price. So that, we create a wireless charging panel, which could make it twist to maintain it in flat and double features once user uses for billing the phone device or keep it as a viewpoint for entertainment.

 

We serve the market research and do a heap of trials for the strength of the structure, how to prevent it in minimizing size and clear in conception of the overall application for this product outcome.

 

 

ABOUT our team

We are PSL, who specializes in innovative and design items. Our team designs lifestyle items that make our life easier. Over these few years, the passionate work and unique skills of our items have resulted in acknowledgements all over the world.  Over 40 items have been awarded for being truly innovative and proved to be real profit generators.

 

FAQs:

1) What type of smartphone does Double Twist compatible with?

It’s compatible with all phones that is Qi-certified. For example, iPhone X, iPhone 8, iPhone 8 plus, Samsung Galaxy Note 8, Samsung S8, Samsung S8+, Samsung Galaxy Note 7, Samsung Galaxy S7, Samsung Galaxy S7 edge etc.

2) Is wireless charging safe for my device?

Yes but please kindly put your device in the right place of the wireless charger to avoid overheat.

3) What does it come with the Double Twist?

It will come in with a USB cable that connects Double Twist with electricity.

4) When will the Double Twisted be shipped?

September, 2018.

5) Can I get more than one perk at once?

According to Indiegogo rules, you can only purchase one perk at a time. If you want more than one perks, you need to purchase them separately. 

6) Why do you need to sell Double Twist on crowdfunding platform?

Crowdfunding is a great start to market a new product, and an opportunity to sell our product at a special price, come and get 1 now.

story:
Table of content

  • Meet your enCardroiD
  • Join to us to make enCardroiD better and smarter
  • What is in the box?
  • How much?
  • Where we are?
  • Who we are?
  • Frequently asked question

Meet your enCardroiD
enCardroiD is the future for your old car. It is the box like car radio with embedded motherboard. You can assemble it to almost every vehicle or you can use one of our universal boxes and put it anywhere, for example to your kitchen, just connect it to the power and connect corresponding module to the motherboard. And your old vehicle in few moments has media player, radio, weather station, parking sensor, infrared camera, radar, telemetry measurement, car diagnostic, is secured and connected with your mobile device. enCardroiD knows much more, is


Modular
Consists of modules. Some modules in various kinds. Pay only for that module/feature what you need
 
Safety
Parking sensors, Night Camera, Heads-up display, Sign recognition, Blind spot tracking, Anti-collision system, Traffic awareness, Alcohol tester
 
Security
RFID, Motion sensor, Shock sensor, Alarm siren, Mobile device present, GPS tracker
 
Diagnostic
OBD II diagnostic, various temperatures, exhaust, gas and many more
 
Economy & Ecology
Based on car, fuel consumption, speed, torque, gradient of the road and car exhaust learns to drive economy to save world ecology
 
Telemetry
Collects data as the GPS position, speed, RPM, acceleration in three axes, temperature, lap time, engine load value, prints graphs
 
Media player
FM radio, plays music or video files from USB, SD card, through bluetooth
 
Time & Date
Time, date, calendar and alarm functions
 
Weather station
Temperature, atmospheric pressure and humidity & weather prediction
 
Interaction
Communicates with mobile devices, through internet, SMS messages, recognize voice and your gestures or remote controller
 
Universal
Primary designed for cars, but usable in many other ways. For example you can build own weather station, home alarm, alarm clock with synchronization with mobile device and many more.
 
Customizable & Upgradable
Change/upgrade enCardroiD's features any time. Just change or connect new module or upgrade firmware/software
 
Open source
Firmware, hardware design and software for mobile devices will be released as the open source
 
More
Rain, frost and tyre pressure sensors, rechargeable flashlight, automatic back-light, infra-red camera for recognition people and animals...

Join to us to make enCardroiD better and smarter
We have a bigger vision what features enCardroiD could have and we need your help to improve it's skills.

$30,000
Welcome to the world, enCardroiD!

  • DIN2 and DIN1 cases for build into the cars
  • OBDII module to display realtime and diagnostic information of the car
  • Back wireless ultrasonic parking module with sound signalisation
  • 2.4, 3.2 display's modules
  • Battery level voltage module
  • Software for Android to display the data from enCardroiD

$40,000
First touch

  • 3.5", 5" and 7" touch display modules
  • Two new cases similar size to DIN1 & DIN2 to put enCardroiD anywhere
  • Universal holder for mobile devices designed special for enCardroiD DIN1 & DIN2 cases with micro USB connector for charging
  • Improved software to manage enCardroiD from android devices
  • Temperature modules with inside, outside and device's sensors
  • Automatic back-light control

$45,000
First word

  • Media player module with Video, MP3, WMA, FM Radio and support for play media from bluetooth, USB and SD card
  • 4x15W amplifier module
  • RFID module for secure enCardroid & car, siren's module
  • Improved holder with Qi wireless charging
  • Remote controller
  • Improved software for Android to work with new modules (next only Improved software for Android)

$50,000
Mum, it's cold!

  • Atmospheric pressure and humidity module
  • Rain and snow module
  • Weather prediction
  • Improved software for Android

$55,000
Protect your child

  • Motion, shock and mobile device present alarm modules
  • Alcohol tester module
  • Flashlight module
  • Wireless ultrasonic parking module with displaying length and wireless electromagnetic parking module
  • Improved software for Android

$60,000

  • Time, date, calendar and alarm functions synchronized with android device
  • Improved software for Android

$65,000
