  • GSM module to calling and managing the enCardroiD remotely with SMS message
  • Improved software for Android

$75,000
Where is my son?

  • GPS module with maps and track analyzing
  • GPS tracker controlled by SMS
  • Improved software for Android

$85,000
First sentences

  • DVB-T and DVB-S module to watch digital and satellite TV
  • More amplifier modules: 200W 2.1 & 4x40W and maybe more
  • Improved software for Android

$95,000
Father, look, I am running!

  • Telemetry module
  • Improved software for Android

$110,000
I want to be a conservationist

  • LPG sensor module
  • CNG sensor module
  • Carbon Monoxide CO sensor module
  • Carbon Dioxide CO2 sensor module
  • Air quality sensor module
  • Smog sensor module
  • Economy drive helper
  • Improved telemetry
  • Improved software for Android

$150,000
Safety comes first

  • Heads-up display
  • Sign recognition
  • Night camera with automatic warning on living animal and people
  • Anti-collision system
  • Blind spot tracking
  • Tyres pressure sensor module
  • Improved GSM module to make calls
  • Improved software for Android

$175,000
I am online

  • 3G module
  • Wi-fi module
  • Web server for control enCardroiD and upgrade it's firmware from internet
  • Traffic awareness
  • Improved software for Android

$200,000
I know new foreign languages

  • Software for IOS
  • Software for Windows mobile
  • Software for Windows

$250,000
Not child more

  • Voice control module
  • Gesture control module
  • Special edition. For more information see perks

What is in the box?
enCardroiD and most of it's modules are based on the popular open-source electronics platform Arduino and credit-card sized computer Raspberry PI.
For communication between modules we are using wire, 433 MHz radio, bluetooth or Wifi.
Due to absence of some worthwhile Arduino's mudules and sensors, we use the freely available commercial products. We choose this way to keep price on the acceptable level but you are this is the chance for other developers to make open source alternatives.


How much?
Market-price will range from $60 - $1,200* depending on equipment of the modules. Estimated module's prices are in the table.

Area Modules price range**
Mainboards $40 - $80*
Cases $10 - $30*
Safety $10 - $300*
LCD display's $15 - $90
Wire chemical sensors $5 - $30
Wireless chemical sensors $13 - $40
Wire non-chemical sensors $2 - $5
Wireless non-chemical sensors $10 - $13
Security $15 - $50*
Diagnostic $15 - $100*
Telemetry $50*
Media player $20
Time & Date $5
Weather station $15
Interaction $50 - $150*
* Prices may not be final due to ongoing development
** Prices do not include VAT and shipping fee. Price in other currencies will be calculated according to the current exchange rate.

Where we are?

We are bringing you the current status of the development of the modules.

Who we are?

We are not the company, We are three amateurs, that have the big dream and many hobbies like cars, computers, mobiles, new technologies, electric gadgets... We have a idea, some experiences with programming and making little electric gadget for us at home. Maybe someone helps us to make our dream real and do it to you too.

Frequently asked question

Is enCardroiD suitable for my car?

Almost always YES! You need a car with power supply range from 6V to 24V. For unlock all functions you also need OBD-II connector. All cars sold in USA from 01.01.1996 must be fitted with the OBD-II interface. In Europe, all new cars with a petrol engine sold from 01.01.2001 that comply with the EURO-3 standard must have the OBD-II interface. Diesel vehicles sold from 01.01.2003 support OBD-II. For trucks, OBD-II support began on 1. January 2005 If your car does not meet specification, don't worry. We can adapt enCardroid for your car.

Why there is no image/render image of enCardroiD?

We are still working on it. We have some design and if the campaign will be successfull, we planning to used it and let the peaople vote, what design is the best.

Is enCardroiD suitable only for the cars?

NO! You can grab mainboard and any module, connect it to suitable power supply and you can use it almost anywhere. For example as the home weather station, secure your home with a security module, a night vision experiments with night vision camera module and many more.

Are the future upgrades possible?

enCardroiD is fully modular and with new future modules firmware upgrade is needed. So yes, uprade is possible. You only need to download new firmware, copy it to the micro SD card and follow the upgrade procedure. Some modules has it's own firmware, that is too upgradable.

Do I have to use the enCardroiD App?

Yes and No. enCardroiD can work indipendently, but for full functionality you need android (IOS/Windows) device with bluetooth.

Does enCardroiD support my phone?

You can use any android device with bluetooth. If we collect more money, we are planning to release apps for IOS and Windows too.

Will it be difficult to install or setup?

We have designed enCardroid to be as easy to setup and install as possible, but some people may prefer to ask professional to install it in the car. In these cases, we recommend finding a reputable contractor or motor mechanic in your area who might be able to assist.

When will be the enCardroiD release as the open source

All schemes and sources will be released after shipping the package for the last contributor.

Do I need some special aknowledge to connect enCardroiD to the vehicle?

It depends on modules. Some modules need the intervetion of the motor mechanic but most of them not.

I am the contributor. When I can choose the modules and get the product?

All information about status of the development of every module will be on our webpage. We will contact you as soon as we finished the whole development or you can contact us anytime, when you think that all modules, that you need are available.

What happens if you do not meet your all goal and not all modules will be released?

We will contact each contributor to ask him if he wants to refund the money or choose some other configuration.

Why crowdfunding?

We start to work on it in our free time as a hobby. But with time it starts to grow and the crowdfinding is the way to find out, if it can be interesting for other people too as for us.

Why the shipping costs are not included in the perks?

Shipping costs may vary depending on the location, country and size of package. It is easier to handle shipping separately.

Can I upgrade my Perk at a later stage?

Please, see the this information

My shipping address is not correct, can I change it?

Yes, you can! Before shipping the perks, we will contact each contributor to verify their address.

I don't find the answer on my question.

Please do not hesitate to contact us and ask any question.

Table of content

Meet your enCardroiD
Join to us to make enCardroiD better and smarter
What is in the box?
How much?
Where we are?
Who we are?
Frequently asked question


 

Meet your enCardroiD
enCardroiD is the future for your old car. It is the box like car radio with embedded motherboard. You can assemble it to almost every vehicle or you can use one of our universal boxes and put it anywhere, for example to your kitchen, just connect it to the power and connect corresponding module to the motherboard. And your old vehicle in few moments has media player, radio, weather station, parking sensor, infrared camera, radar, telemetry measurement, car diagnostic, is secured and connected with your mobile device. enCardroiD knows much more, is





Modular



Consists of modules. Some modules in various kinds. Pay only for that module/feature what you need

 





Safety



Parking sensors, Night Camera, Heads-up display, Sign recognition, Blind spot tracking, Anti-collision system, Traffic awareness, Alcohol tester

 





Security



RFID, Motion sensor, Shock sensor, Alarm siren, Mobile device present, GPS tracker

 





Diagnostic



OBD II diagnostic, various temperatures, exhaust, gas and many more

 





Economy & Ecology



Based on car, fuel consumption, speed, torque, gradient of the road and car exhaust learns to drive economy to save world ecology

 





Telemetry



Collects data as the GPS position, speed, RPM, acceleration in three axes, temperature, lap time, engine load value, prints graphs

 





Media player



FM radio, plays music or video files from USB, SD card, through bluetooth

 





Time & Date



Time, date, calendar and alarm functions

 





Weather station



Temperature, atmospheric pressure and humidity & weather prediction

 





Interaction



Communicates with mobile devices, through internet, SMS messages, recognize voice and your gestures or remote controller

 





Universal



Primary designed for cars, but usable in many other ways. For example you can build own weather station, home alarm, alarm clock with synchronization with mobile device and many more.

 





Customizable & Upgradable



Change/upgrade enCardroiD's features any time. Just change or connect new module or upgrade firmware/software

 





Open source



Firmware, hardware design and software for mobile devices will be released as the open source

 





More



Rain, frost and tyre pressure sensors, rechargeable flashlight, automatic back-light, infra-red camera for recognition people and animals...

story:
You lock the doors to your apartment, house, office, and car, but how to you protect the doors to your online home?

Our lives are increasingly dependent on the Internet. It’s not just about your computer or a smartphone anymore—even your thermostat, light bulbs, TV, and kitchen appliances can be “smart.” Because of this, we are becoming more vulnerable: every device is a potential window of opportunity for hackers. 

You probably know someone who was the victim of identity or credit card theft, and you understand that children are any scammer’s favorite targets.  We like to think we’re ok, but all it takes is leaving one device unprotected.

Common ‘solutions’ to Internet security problems are either too complicated or too expensive, so most people leave the default settings on their routers and just go with the basic programs, and don’t give it a second thought until disaster strikes.

THOSE DEFAULT SETTINGS AND PROGRAMS AREN’T ENOUGH TO SOLVE THE PROBLEM. 

This is where DropAP comes in.

The DropAP solution

DropAP is a Smart and Secure Internet Access Solution.  This solution integrates Cloud Technology, Router Functionalities, and Mobile App Controls to provide overall family based protection at home and away.

Most Advanced Router Technology

The DropAP Router is an advanced and high performance Wireless Router that you can easily setup and manage from your mobile devices, no installation required. Everything is managed by the App communicating with the DropAP device. It can function as a router, a Wi-Fi Wireless Router, or an extender.  Still, DropAP is even more than that: it’s the easiest, safest, and most cost-effective way to keep your family’s Internet usage monitored, safe, and protected. 

Unparalleled Parental Control Features

The DropAP offers an affordable, comprehensive solution for parents. We know that there are plenty of products that claim to have parental control features, but they don’t come close to what DropAP offers parents:  a way to set up parental controls for every device to monitor your child’s Internet usage in real time from wherever you are and wherever your child’s devices are in the world thanks to DropAP’s cloud-based infrastructure.  If that weren’t enough, DropAP also gives parents a way to block site visits by simply listing the categories and keywords you want to prevent your children from accessing. You can also limit device usage by schedule or time limit—and it can all be done through the cloud. 

Efficiency with Economy

Traditionally, establishing a home Wi-Fi network involved buying a router, buying additional software for each device, and then updating software again and again to continue protection against malware. To protect every device in your home, you’d have to spend hundreds of dollars—not to mention hours—every year. If you didn’t do this, you’d just have to pray that just hackers and scammers wouldn’t be interested in your data.

DropAP eliminates all of that extra cost, time, and hassle by combining the best-in-class home Wi-Fi router, PLUS protection for ALL your mobile family devices, existing and new. No need to purchase new security apps and programs ever again!

ZAP: One-Click-Connect

DropAP believes the Internet should be quick and easy to access.  Imagine with one click, you can connect to the Internet, instantly and securely. No need for passwords but secured.

Your guests can enjoy an easy, secure connection too. The DropAP one-click-connect feature allows them to join your Wi-Fi network by simply pressing a button on the DropAP. Their device will automatically connect to your home network as soon as you approve it. With DropAP, there’s no need to write down and hide passwords or share sensitive information with others. 

The DropAP Difference

Simply stated, DropAP is the most complete solution on the market for a family. 

The package lets you:

  • Use the APP Dashboard to review real-time online status of all your family devices (especially your children’s devices)
  • Benefit from the Self-learning Cloud Server technology
  • Manage and monitor up to 30 Internet-connected devices, home and away
  • Receive alerts if someone is trying to access your router without proper authorization
  • Prioritize network traffic to deliver smooth audio and video streaming experiences
  • Store your profile and security settings in the cloud database, allowing you access and manage the home network from anywhere
  • Control all devices using your home network in real time, from everywhere
  • Easily switch on and connect—no costly third-party apps or browser tweaks required to use DropAP

If that weren’t enough, the hardware comes with everything you need to get started—you don’t have to make a single other purchase to ‘upgrade.’ When you buy DropAP, all of the ‘upgrades’ are already included.

The DropAP Solution Features

  • Parental Control 
  • Speed Performance 
  • Anti­-phishing Protection 
  • Anti-virus Protection for mobile devices that have installed the APP
  • Monitor Each  Client Usage 
  • Guest Network
  • Smart QoS
  • Control your Router with the APP easily
  • Supports Notification to parents when the child attempts to access blocked sites
  • Supports Different Router Mode with Access Point/Router/Extender
  • Supports Static IP, DHCP client and PPPoE for WAN type
  • Concurrent Dual Band 802.11b/g/n/ac
  • Supports IPSec, L2TP and PPTP VPN Pass-Through
  • Enhanced Security Management Functions: MAC and IP Address Filtering and NAT Technology
  • Supports OPEN/WEP/WPA-PSK/WPA2-PSK/WPA-PSK&WPA2-PSK MIXED encryption in wireless 802.11b/g/n/ac
  • Administrators can block specific internal users’ Internet access with filtering
  • Upgrade your device Over-The-Air (OTA)  
  • Supports for NTP (Network Time Protocol) for Synchronizing with a Real-Time Server
  • Supports Traffic and Event Logging
  • Supports 11 channels for North America

DropAP - Making The Internet Feel As Safe As Home

In a nutshell, DropAP:

  • Protects the entire family’s online space, both indoor and even when they are outside
  • Offers a combination of a next generation Wi-Fi router, an app and a secure cloud service
  • Provides a simple and economic solution to manage the whole home network and mobile devices, any time, from everywhere and wherever the mobile devices are
  • Delivers unlimited app downloads for all devices for your family
  • Puts you in control to customize individual secure access settings for each device and monitor each device’s bandwidth usage
  • Gives peace of mind to parents by helping them protect their children online from harmful websites and phishing attacks
  • Overall, saves you time and money

Smart Solution for your Smart Home

According to the latest forecast from CISCO, we will be using 20 BILLION Internet of Things devices within next 5 years. Security experts are very concerned about the vulnerability level it can create for the customers. Smart appliances have been a focus of security threats already.

Last year, a security firm Proofpoint, Inc. discovered a hack used 100,000 connected household items (like smart fridges) as entry points to send virus-ridden e-mails. Then, The US Federal Trade Commission initiated a case against TRENDnet, a firm that makes Internet-enabled security cameras and baby monitors. The cameras had faulty software that left them open for online viewing, and in some instances listening, by anyone with the cameras’ IP address. As a result, hundreds of consumers’ private video feeds were made public.  Finally, earlier Wink Home Automation Hub outage left the users powerless as a result of a bad security update.

Choose A Reward For Your Peace Of Mind

With our rewards, you can choose the best option for your home, small office or make sure your living alone parents will be protected from cyber criminals.

Specifications & Design




Choose your Color

Timeline


Risk and Challenges

we have a core team that comes from the the Networking and Communications sector.  Tremendous experience in designing and developing Internet related technologies.  Therefore, our difficulty is not on building the Router device.  Rather, the challenge is the integration of the Cloud Technology, the Router Device, and the Mobile App Control which makes up the DropAP Solution as a whole.

Therefore, a lot of our time has been and will continue to be invested in the System Integration Test.  We believe that stress testing is the key factor to a secure and robust Internet access solution.

Moving forward, we intend to add many new and innovative features to the DropAP solution, such as Filtering Timer, Keyword Blocking, and others.  Needless to say, we welcome everyone to provide their ideas and suggestions to us so as to help us make DropAP a more secure as well as convenient solution for the everyone in return.

We will make a best effort to provide the perk but delivery is not guaranteed.

www.dropap.com

you buy DropAP, all of the ‘upgrades’ are already included.The DropAP Solution Features


Parental Control 


Speed Performance 


Anti­-phishing Protection 


Anti-virus Protection for mobile devices that
have installed the APP


Monitor Each  Client
Usage 


Guest Network


Smart QoS


Control
your Router with the APP easily


Supports Notification
to parents when the child attempts to access blocked sites


Supports Different Router Mode with Access
Point/Router/Extender


Supports Static IP, DHCP client and PPPoE for
WAN type


Concurrent Dual Band 802.11b/g/n/ac


Supports IPSec, L2TP and PPTP VPN Pass-Through


Enhanced Security Management Functions: MAC and
IP Address Filtering and NAT Technology


Supports OPEN/WEP/WPA-PSK/WPA2-PSK/WPA-PSK&WPA2-PSK
MIXED encryption in wireless
802.11b/g/n/ac


Administrators can block specific internal
users’ Internet access with filtering


Upgrade
your device Over-The-Air (OTA)  


Supports for NTP (Network Time Protocol) for
Synchronizing with a Real-Time Server


Supports Traffic and Event Logging


Supports 11 channels for North America

DropAP - Making The Internet Feel As Safe As HomeIn a nutshell, DropAP:



Protects the entire
family’s online space, both indoor and even when they are outside


Offers a
combination of a next generation Wi-Fi router, an app and a secure cloud
service


Provides a simple
and economic solution to manage the whole home network and mobile devices, any
time, from everywhere and wherever the mobile devices are


Delivers
unlimited app downloads for all devices for your family


Puts you in
control to customize individual secure access settings for each device and
monitor each device’s bandwidth usage


Gives peace of
mind to parents by helping them protect their children online from harmful
websites and phishing attacks


Overall, saves you
time and money


Smart Solution for your Smart Home
According to the latest forecast from
CISCO, we will be using 20 BILLION Internet of Things devices within next 5
years. Security experts are very concerned about the vulnerability level it can
create for the customers. Smart appliances have been a focus of security
threats already. 
Last year, a security firm Proofpoint,
Inc. discovered a hack used 100,000 connected household items (like smart
fridges) as entry points to send virus-ridden e-mails. Then, The US Federal
Trade Commission initiated a case against TRENDnet, a firm that makes
Internet-enabled security cameras and baby monitors. The cameras had faulty
software that left them open for online viewing, and in some instances
listening, by anyone with the cameras’ IP address. As a result, hundreds of consumers’
private video feeds were made public. 
Finally, earlier Wink Home Automation Hub outage left the users
powerless as a result of a bad security update.Choose A Reward For Your Peace Of Mind
With our rewards, you can choose the best
option for your home, small office or make sure your living alone parents will
be protected from cyber criminals.Specifications & Design













Choose your Color




Timeline


Risk and Challenges
we have a core team that comes from the the Networking and
Communications sector.  Tremendous experience in designing and developing
Internet related technologies.  Therefore, our difficulty is not on
building the Router device.  Rather, the challenge is the integration of
the Cloud Technology, the Router Device, and the Mobile App Control which makes
up the DropAP Solution as a whole.
Therefore, a lot of our time has been and will continue to
be invested in the System Integration Test.  We believe that stress
testing is the key factor to a secure and robust Internet access solution.
Moving forward, we intend to add many new and innovative
features to the DropAP solution, such as Filtering Timer, Keyword Blocking, and
others.  Needless to say, we welcome everyone to provide their ideas and
suggestions to us so as to help us make DropAP a more secure as well as
convenient solution for the everyone in return.We will make a best effort to provide the perk but delivery is not guaranteed.www.dropap.com

story:
If you are a user of iPhone 5 / 5c / 5s , iPhone 6 / 6 Plus or iPhone 6s / 6s Plus, Hedge™ works great for you. Take it and make your iPhone better than ever!





We’ll send you a survey after the campaign closes. The survey system will collect your shipping address and your Hedge™ screen protector style.



How can it be smart without charging?


We lead current  

For Hedge™, we add a circuit layer to traditional glass screen protector. It helps to lead current when you press lower left or right corner of the screen, so that the back button works.


Nothing change to original operation. Just one more choice for you.

     




Earn a free Hedge screen protector by referring friends

Help us by spreading the word via email and social media. You can earn $1.5 in credit toward our campaign every time one of your referrals purchases a Hedge. The amount of credit you can earn is limitless!  Once the campaign is over, we will apply this credit to your account, giving you a refund on your purchase or credit on the purchase of a new Hedge.  Please note that contributors cannot receive referral credit for referring themselves.  Of two contributors, only one can be the 'referrer' and receive campaign credit for the other's contribution.

How to participate in the referral program:It’s simple. Log in to your Indiegogo account . Be sure to use the same account you used when you claimed your Hedge. Then, look below our main video at the top of this page for buttons to share and copy your unique URL. Start sharing!



When will you ship Hedge™ Screen Protectors?
4-6 weeks after the campaign ends.

How do I know if I get the correct Hedge™ Protector?
A few days after the campaign ends we sent out a survey asking for your specific choices.

I forgot to buy shipping. What shall I do?
No problem. You can always buy the shipping Perk.
When campaign ends we will go through all contributions, and send out information to backers who couldn't find the correct way to add shipping costs.


Will Hedge™ Screen Protector stop my case from fitting?

Probably not, our smart screen protector works with almost all cases.
              

Will it work with 3D Touch?

YES, it works perfectly with 3D Touch.


Do you ship Worldwide?

YES

story:
Short Summary

     

Laptop,  video phone, TV, smart projector, gaming  machine, smart phone...

All in your pocket ? 

Imagine wearable all-in-one device small enough to get in your pocket !

At  home,  you  probably  have  a  lot  of  electronic  devices, such  as  a  computer,  TV,   smart projector,  and a  gaming  machine.  When  you  leave  home,  you  only carry  your  smart phone.

How  would  you  feel, what  would  it  be like, if  your  phone  could  provide  all   the  benefits of your computer, TV, video phone, smart projector and gaming machine  in one device?

 

Your smart phone + Masterkey =  TV, video phone,  smart projector,   gaming  machine and a computer!

We  present  to you  a  light  and  powerful  adapter called Masterkey 2.0. Connect  it  with  your  smart phone  and  you  can  enjoy  watching  your  favorite  TV  shows,  play  games,  make  presentations  and  work. 

 

Laptop In Your Pocket.  Light And Easy To Use.

Simply  affix  the  Masterkey 2.0 adapter to  your  phone and start computing. Say goodbye to heavy stuff.

    

Quick  Facts

The  Masterkey  2.0  adapter  is  a  small,  light  and  helpful  device

You  can  carry  it  wherever  you  go.  Your  smart  phone  immediately  turns into a computer, video phone, tablet, TV  screen, projector, or device for  playing  computer  games  anytime  and  anywhere. 

Take away

You  can  use  it  at  home,  at  work,  on  the  road,  for business,  when  travelling  or just  for  fun. With  the  Masterkey  2.0  adapter  you  will  get  5  devices  all  in  one.  This  device  has  a  built-in  laser  and  pico  projector.  The  size of the screen  can  be  adjusted  to meet  your  needs. 

Draw The Attention Of Your Audience. Wow them.

Masterkey 2.0 adapter is designed to draw the attention of your audience. Give awesome presentations on giant screen up to 120 " without any trouble in an instant at affordable price.  Take presentations on the go. Do it with big screen when you sell products or services to engage your customers. No more tech troubles.  Furthermore, Masterkey 2.0  can be used for video conferences.

Are You in Business? Masterkey 2.0  BE is the Easiest Way to Define Your Prospect's Hot Button.

Masterkey 2.0  Business Edition (BE) is designed for sales teams and businesses. Let's say you have a presentation in front of six people and you try to present your service or product which is too big or too small or maybe too complicated.

What you need is a wearable smart projector. Masterkey 2.0  BE has a built in kinesthetic sensor and software that recognizes the interest in your presentation on the faces of your prospects.

How it works (Business Edition)?

We developed software that recognizes facial patterns (interested in, or not interested in), facial features, face recognition, gender and age recognition, detection of hand gestures, analysis and registration of images.

While you're running your presentation, Masterkey 2.0  BE observes all prospects. Later, software analyzes the facial patterns of those prospects. Results are presented for each prospect in combination with a time line of your presentation.

That way you can see what attracts each prospect and what doesn’t attract them so you can make much more effective presentations.  You can also connect (as a sales manager) to the live presentation of your coworker no matter where you are.

 You can take Masterkey 2.0  with you and use it anywhere you go. It can be used while traveling on business or on holidays.

 

Testimonials from our testers

 

Very impressive product  Nice job......John, 43

I Have to admit , I was sceptical. But Masterkey is actually an awesome product.  George, 35

Masterkey 2.0 is a great product. Andrew, 37

All in one... really cool and useful. Nick, 31

 

Video Phone. Big Size.

Keep in touch with family and friends. Easy and user-friendly.

You can talk to your children, grandchildren, wife, husband, parents, friends or business partner on  giant screen as they are beside you. You can use it at home or on travel. It's simple and in  most   cases free. With Masterkey 2.0  you are always with your dearest  ones. Nurture relationships with your loved ones.

 

Turn  Your  Car  Into  a  Smart  Car

You  can  have  a  smart  car,  too.   The  Masterkey  2.0  enables  you  to have  access  to  your  favorite  applications  in  your  car. 

 

Let's Play

We love computer games & movies or AR on a GIANT SCREEN anywhere.

Wish you'd play your favorite game on giant screen or be a part of  a movie? Let's do it. Also your kids can now play or  watch cartoons  wherever you are.

Stay In Good Shape

Let's be honest. A gym can be boring and sometimes you don't have time. Why wouldn't you watch your favorite show or breaking news during your gym ? With Masterkey 2.0  adapter time will pass faster and you'll have fun.

Stressful Life

Relax & calm. Take time for yourself.

Make your own place with your own ambient. You can use your images, yoga, positive confirmations. Whatever makes you feel happy.Project them on the wall of your home. It doesn't matter if you are at home or on the go. Also, you can  easily learn new skills like dancing or golf stance with an enlarged video tutorial.

 

Go Big 

Are you fed up of texting on a small screen? Me too.

Finally, here is an effective solution. Masterkey 2.0  enlarges the keyboard as it should be in a second.

Earn credits that can be refunded or applied to additional accessories that will be introduced throughout the campaign. 

                                       Click here to learn more

 

What  Is  The  Masterkey 2.0  ?  How  Does  It  Work? 

Now you can have it all in your pocket: TV, video phone on a big screen, smart projector, laptop, gaming machine…

The  MasterKey 2.0  HE (Home Edition)  adapter  can  be carried  wherever  you  go. Connect  it  with  your  smart  phone  and  that's it. The  front  part  of  the  adapter  has  a  built-in  laser  which  projects  a  keyboard. There  is also a  pico projector  at  the  rear  part  of  the  adapter.  This  pico  projector  projects  a fully  adjustable  screen. 

The  MasterKey 2.0  BE (Business Edition)  adapter is an upgraded version. It  has a built-in kinesthetic sensor and software. Besides business APP, new APPs will be available soon (smart home, security).

 

Really  Easy  To Use

You  will  have access to  the  best  these  devices  offer  you – a  bigger  screen,  the keyboard,  the  projections,  fun,  easier  presentations,  better  mobility.  Masterkey will  give  you  all  the  best  and  useful  things  that  today's  electronics  offer. 

 

Impressive Tech & Design At An Affordable Price.

How does it work? The Tech behind it.

Masterkey  2.0  is  composed  of  a  pico  projector  which  projects  a  big  or  small  screen  according  to  your  needs.  It  has  a  built-in  laser  that  projects  a  keyboard.  It's  enough  to  touch  the  keyboard  and  Masterkey 2.0   detects  which  button  you  touched. You  can  also  use  the  Masterkey 2.0   battery  to  charge  your  smart  phone . The  best  and  the   highest  quality  components  have  been  chosen . 

 

How  Does  The  Masterkey  2.0  Compare?

The  Masterkey  2.0  adapter  is  a  unique  device  that  simply  cannot  be  compared  to  any  other  product  on  the  market  today.  It  operates  on  laser  and  pico projection  technology combining  multiple ( 5 ) operations into  one  powerful  device.  This pocket-sized  device  allows  you  to create a computer,  TV screen,  and a  projector  for  presentations  or  playing  games using  your  smart  phone.  It  can  be  used  anywhere  you  like: at  home, at  work,  on  the  road, and when  you  travel. 

Tech Specs

 

What  Will  You  Get ?

Top 10+ reasons why you will love  Masterkey 2.0 :

  • All-in-one. All in your pocket.

  • Wearable smart pico projector. 
  • Computer in your pocket.
  • Enlarge  the screen  of  your  smart  phone  up  to  120'' (portable home cinema).
  • You want to watch TV with a bigger screen anywhere, anytime, but you….
  • You don't want to carry around so much gear.
  • You want to play computer games with your friends.
  • Applied to the smart  car app.
  • Applied to the safe home app.
  • Video phone. Nature size.
  • Giving perfect presentations (business, sale, doc, tech, ….) anywhere.
  • Define your prospect's hot button.
  • Take control over your business & work. IOT.
  • Giving presentations at morning coffee or at lunch (fast, easy without all stuff).

 

What Comes In The Box? 

Masterkey 2.0  Home Edition (HE) adapter (with a  built-in pico projector, laser keyboard , battery), cable and power supply with instructions.

Masterkey 2.0  Business Edition (BE) adapter (with a built-in pico projector, laser keyboard , battery, kinesthetic sensor, software), cable and power supply with instructions.

 

Free Reward

Earn a FREE  cool case for Masterkey 2.0 !

1. Share Masterkey 2.0 on Facebook

2. Tag a friend

3. Receive a free case  with your pledge

 

After sharing, complete your claim via the Google form above. Please enter your Indiegogo account email so we can properly credit your reward.

 

Rewards

 

The Production Timeline

 

What We Need & What You Get

We've already  invested  our knowledge,  and  funds  into  this  project. We need  $15,000 to finish casing design and pay for the cost of everything that's needed to produce this  adapter . The donations you give us will be used to fund the  production, packaging and shipping of the product. Every cent  will be used to pay for making Masterkey adapter into a reality.

In return, you will get the most unique and useful adapter for your smart phone. Just imagine ! It's light, small and it can turn your smart phone into a laptop in an instant ! Anytime and anywhere.

 With your generous help, we'll be able to make this interface a high quality product that will change the way we use phones, work, IoT, IoE… 

 

Masterkey 2.0 Team  &  The Impact

We’re a tech company that  believes in innovation through collaboration. Whatever we do we want to create a product that will make people happier.Team members are from US and EU. Most of them are HW & SW experts.

What we stand for

With our knowledge and  product  we strongly believe that we can help business and sale staff  growing faster and reliable.  After all, customers count most.

Charity

We would like to align ourselves with some charities that help people get to and from where they need to go. Do you have any ideas of some great ones? Possibly a Veteran’s organization, or any others that could help them out.

 

                                

Our  Story

My  name  is  Michael. I'm  a  computer  expert  and  an  enterpreneur. I also develop  computer  peripherals. In  my  spare  time,  I  like to cycle,  watch movies,  and  enjoy   delicious  food at  restaurants  . 

I  came  up  with  the  idea  for  the  Masterkey  adapter  on  one  of  my  business  trips. Because we are  always on the move, we must  perform  several  tasks  in  different  places:  at  home,  at  work, with our  clients,  when  we  wait,  when  we  travel,  at  our  friends'  parties, and  while  commuting.  We  always  want  to  have  a  computer, a tablet,  a  projector  or  a  device for playing games or watch TV. 

However, we do  not  want  to  feel  the  burden  of  carrying  multiple  devices  or  carting  large  consoles  around  with  us. 

With Masterkey, you  can simply  transform  your smart phone, which  is  always  with  you, into a powerful  little  device  that  satisfies  all your communications  and  gaming  needs. In many cases better than others. You  can  use  it  anywhere  and  anytime  with  all  of  the applications  that  exist  on  the  market.

We've  invested  a lot  of  effort,  time,  knowledge,  and  funds  into  this  project. The  best  and  the   highest  quality  suppliers  have  been  chosen for the components, manufacturers and developers . 

 

Product Development

 

Manufacturing

 

Project Status

As you can see from the timeline above, we're in the final phase.  Funds from this pre-order campaign will be used to fund manufacturing costs. Masterkey has been developed since 2014 and we're committed to building the coolest &  the  most useful adapter for smart phones  on the market. We'd love to hear your candid and constructive feedback and would encourage those inclined to participate in our campaign.

 

Risks & Challenges

Our core business is hardware and the cloud.  We know the phone industry pretty well. We’ve been working with manufacturers and carriers, so everything we need is already in place. However, we are committed to bringing you a great product, and won't settle for anything less. Thus, during our manufacturing stage, we will actively work with our factory to make sure that everything is up to our standards. We recognize that this might result in a delay in our manufacturing process if complications arise, and we find it very important to make sure that these are shipped in a timely matter, but the quality comes first. This isn't our first rodeo but things seem to always come up and will be providing regular updates every 3 weeks to backers.

 

Questions and Answers

 

Technical Questions

Specifications & Customer Support

 

What are the product's dimensions ?

4,7'' x 2,3'' x 0,8'' (12 cm x 6 cm x 2 cm).

What is the weight ?

0,5 lbs / 8,1 ounce (230 g).

Can it be connected  to a smart phone wireless ?

Yes. We will supply you Masterkey 2.0  adapter (HE and BE) with wireless connection.

How big is the max projector size ?

Up to 120'' (300 cm).

How long does the battery last?

Masterkey  has a built-in internal battery that last up to 120 minutes and can be used as a charging station for other devices.

What colors does it come in ?

Black only.

Where can the virtual keyboard be projected ?

 The virtual keyboard  can be projected on any flat surface.

Which types of phones  does  this  device  work  with ? 

It  operates  on ANDROIDS,  all smartphones,  OS  and  WINDOWS.

How  is  this  device  powered?  How  is the  battery charged? 

The  same way  as  your  smart  phone.

Can  it  be  used  on  an airplane?

The  device  is  designed according  to  the  IATA  standards.

Does Masterkey 2.0  adapter come with a warranty?

Yes! Masterkey 2.0  adapter comes with a one year warranty starting from the date of shipping. Your Masterkey 2.0  adapter warranty covers all defects in material and workmanship, except the following:

  • Damage caused by accident, misuse, abuse, disassembly, unauthorized modification or neglect.
  • Damage caused by liquid contact.
  • Damage resulting from failure to follow instructions contained in your instruction manual. 
  • Damage resulting from the performance of repairs by someone not authorized by our company.

What certifications do built-in projector and laser keyboard have ?

Built-in components have FCC and CE approved.

What countries and mobile networks will support the Masterkey 2.0  interface?

Masterkey 2.0  adapter is not locked to any particular network or tech. It works in all countries that provide GSM/3G/LTE-based network services. It also supports  the  LTE standards to provide 4G mobile broadband connectivity around the world (subject to network availability and data fees).

Do you have customer service and technical support?

Yes, we do! We are here to answer all your questions. We have dedicated live chat hours for real time support.

 

Backing Questions

 

How do I contribute to a Perk so that I get a Masterkey 2.0 interface, including shipping?

There is one (1) perk  to choose from    $ – shipping cost (and VAT) will be added automatically to the final contribution amount.

I contributed using two Indiegogo accounts/email addresses - what should I do?

If you have made several contributions using different accounts, please make sure to tell us about this by submitting a support request here.

In the request, please indicate all the email addresses you used.

How do I know if my contribution was successful?

You should have received a confirmation email from Indiegogo if your contribution was successful. The confirmation email you received from Indiegogo serves as the receipt for your contribution. Please follow these instructions to access your individual Indiegogo account.

Can I change or cancel my perk?

Indiegogo has now made it easier than ever to upgrade your perks. You can do so on the contributions tab of your Indiegogo profile. See more information on how to do this  support@indiegogo.com .

After contributing to the campaign, what happens next?

We will keep you updated on the schedule by email. 

What happens to the money you raise?

Your money will only be used to build your product - all funds will be spent for  manufacturing setup and component costs.

Problem backing us?

Please contact support@indiegogo.com.

 

Buying & Shipping Questions

 

Are shipping costs in the Perk price in Indiegogo?

The prices do not include shipping.


I did not choose a Perk when contributing, but I paid the whole sum for the Masterkey 2.0  - do I get a Masterkey 2.0  ? 

If you made a contribution for the Masterkey 2.0  without adding a perk, there is no need to worry as long as the contribution equals the price of one of the two available perks.

How do I pay for several Masterkey 2.0 adapters? Can I add only one Perk at a time?

If you wish to contribute for several adapters, we kindly ask that you contribute for one perk and shipping at a time, using the same email address for all contributions.

Can the adapter features or specifications change before delivery?

As in any product development, changes are possible. We reserve the right to make changes in described features, specifications, and delivery date estimations and to introduce functionality at a later date. But the quality comes first.  If you’ve backed us, you’ll be kept right up to date.

What will the device cost at retail?

The expected retail price of Masterkey 2.0  HE is $ 299. The expected retail price of Mastekey 2.0  BE is  $ 399. 

I am a distributor or reseller. How do I contact you?

Please email via our site  Masterkey .

I am a developer. How do I contact you?

Please email via our site  Masterkey .

Where do you ship? 

We will be shipping these devices worldwide. The Masterkey 2.0  adapter will be initially shipped with English menus but we are currently adding Japanese, French, German, Spanish and Chinese language menus and documentation. 

Do I need to add the cost of shipping to my pledge?

Please add the amount specified in the perk description. Local import taxes may apply.

I contributed to a perk but I forgot to add the extra $ for shipping. How can I increase the amount?

No problem! If you'd like to add funds for shipping, you can make another contribution and select "Shipping Cost".

I can't get my payment to work in Paypal, what should I do?

Email the Indiegogo Customer Happiness Team at support@indiegogo.com. They'll be able to track your transaction and help with any issues.

Didn't find the  answer to your question? 

Please submit a request if needed. We're happy to help!

 

How to Participate in a Referral Contest and Get Refund

We offer you an interesting referral contest. Please click here.

 

So In Conclusion,

The  Masterkey 2.0  adapter  is  a  powerful  adapter that  turns  your  smart  phone  into  a laptop, video phone,  TV  screen,  projector  or  device  for  playing  games  in  an instant  .  Simply  affix  the  interface to  your  phone  and  plug  the  cable  into  the  interface and that's it. 

Then  you  will  get  best  these  devices  have  to  offer  you – a  bigger  screen,  the keyboard,  the  projections,  fun,  easier  presentations,  better  mobility.  This    Masterkey 2.0  adapter will  give  you  all  the  best  and  most useful  things  that  today's  electronics  offer. 

 

Help Us Spread The Word

We would like to thank every backer for any contribution and any assistance in the realization of our project. Please share our project through Facebook and Twitter, we will be happy for any help!

Thank you for supporting Masterkey 2.0  project !

 

 

All in one. All in your pocket.
story_txt:
Short Summary
     
Laptop,  video phone, TV, smart projector, gaming  machine, smart phone... 
All in your pocket ? 
Imagine wearable all-in-one device small enough to get in your pocket !
At  home,  you  probably  have  a  lot  of  electronic  devices, such  as  a  computer,  TV,   smart projector,  and a  gaming  machine.  When  you  leave  home,  you  only carry  your  smart phone.
How  would  you  feel, what  would  it  be like, if  your  phone  could  provide  all   the  benefits of your computer, TV, video phone, smart projector and gaming machine  in one device?
 Your smart phone + Masterkey =  TV, video phone,  smart projector,   gaming  machine and a computer!We  present  to you  a  light  and  powerful  adapter called Masterkey 2.0. Connect  it  with  your  smart phone  and  you  can  enjoy  watching  your  favorite  TV  shows,  play  games,  make  presentations  and  work.  Laptop In Your Pocket.  Light And Easy To Use.Simply  affix  the  Masterkey 2.0 adapter to  your  phone and start computing. Say goodbye to heavy stuff.    Quick  FactsThe  Masterkey  2.0  adapter  is  a  small,  light  and  helpful  deviceYou  can  carry  it  wherever  you  go.  Your  smart  phone  immediately  turns into a computer, video phone, tablet, TV  screen, projector, or device for  playing  computer  games  anytime  and  anywhere. Take awayYou  can  use  it  at  home,  at  work,  on  the  road,  for business,  when  travelling  or just  for  fun. With  the  Masterkey  2.0  adapter  you  will  get  5  devices  all  in  one.  This  device  has  a  built-in  laser  and  pico  projector.  The  size of the screen  can  be  adjusted  to meet  your  needs. Draw The Attention Of Your Audience. Wow them.Masterkey 2.0 adapter is designed to draw the attention of your audience. Give awesome presentations on giant screen up to 120 " without any trouble in an instant at affordable price.  Take presentations on the go. Do it with big screen when you sell products or services to engage your customers. No more tech troubles.  Furthermore, Masterkey 2.0  can be used for video conferences.
Are You in Business? Masterkey 2.0  BE is the Easiest Way to Define Your Prospect's Hot Button.
Masterkey 2.0  Business Edition (BE) is designed for sales teams and businesses. Let's say you have a presentation in front of six people and you try to present your service or product which is too big or too small or maybe too complicated.What you need is a wearable smart projector. Masterkey 2.0  BE has a built in kinesthetic sensor and software that recognizes the interest in your presentation on the faces of your prospects.How it works (Business Edition)?We developed software that recognizes facial patterns (interested in, or not interested in), facial features, face recognition, gender and age recognition, detection of hand gestures, analysis and registration of images.While you're running your presentation, Masterkey 2.0  BE observes all prospects. Later, software analyzes the facial patterns of those prospects. Results are presented for each prospect in combination with a time line of your presentation.That way you can see what attracts each prospect and what doesn’t attract them so you can make much more effective presentations.  You can also connect (as a sales manager) to the live presentation of your coworker no matter where you are. You can take Masterkey 2.0  with you and use it anywhere you go. It can be used while traveling on business or on holidays. Testimonials from our testers Very impressive product  Nice job......John, 43I Have to admit , I was sceptical. But Masterkey is actually an awesome product.  George, 35Masterkey 2.0 is a great product. Andrew, 37All in one... really cool and useful. Nick, 31 Video Phone. Big Size.Keep in touch with family and friends. Easy and user-friendly.You can talk to your children, grandchildren, wife, husband, parents, friends or business partner on  giant screen as they are beside you. You can use it at home or on travel. It's simple and in  most   cases free. With Masterkey 2.0  you are always with your dearest  ones. Nurture relationships with your loved ones. Turn  Your  Car  Into  a  Smart  Car You  can  have  a  smart  car,  too.   The  Masterkey  2.0  enables  you  to have  access  to  your  favorite  applications  in  your  car.  Let's PlayWe love computer games & movies or AR on a GIANT SCREEN anywhere.Wish you'd play your favorite game on giant screen or be a part of  a movie? Let's do it. Also your kids can now play or  watch cartoons  wherever you are.Stay In Good ShapeLet's be honest. A gym can be boring and sometimes you don't have time. Why wouldn't you watch your favorite show or breaking news during your gym ? With Masterkey 2.0  adapter time will pass faster and you'll have fun.Stressful LifeRelax & calm. Take time for yourself.Make your own place with your own ambient. You can use your images, yoga, positive confirmations. Whatever makes you feel happy.Project them on the wall of your home. It doesn't matter if you are at home or on the go. Also, you can  easily learn new skills like dancing or golf stance with an enlarged video tutorial. Go Big Are you fed up of texting on a small screen? Me too.Finally, here is an effective solution. Masterkey 2.0  enlarges the keyboard as it should be in a second.Earn credits that can be refunded or applied to additional accessories that will be introduced throughout the campaign.                                        Click here to learn more 
What  Is  The  Masterkey 2.0  ?  How  Does  It  Work? 
Now you can have it all in your pocket: TV, video phone on a big screen, smart projector, laptop, gaming machine…The  MasterKey 2.0  HE (Home Edition)  adapter  can  be carried  wherever  you  go. Connect  it  with  your  smart  phone  and  that's it. The  front  part  of  the  adapter  has  a  built-in  laser  which  projects  a  keyboard. There  is also a  pico projector  at  the  rear  part  of  the  adapter.  This  pico  projector  projects  a fully  adjustable  screen. The  MasterKey 2.0  BE (Business Edition)  adapter is an upgraded version. It  has a built-in kinesthetic sensor and software. Besides business APP, new APPs will be available soon (smart home, security). Really  Easy  To UseYou  will  have access to  the  best  these  devices  offer  you – a  bigger  screen,  the keyboard,  the  projections,  fun,  easier  presentations,  better  mobility.  Masterkey will  give  you  all  the  best  and  useful  things  that  today's  electronics  offer.  Impressive Tech & Design At An Affordable Price.How does it work? The Tech behind it.Masterkey  2.0  is  composed  of  a  pico  projector  which  projects  a  big  or  small  screen  according  to  your  needs.  It  has  a  built-in  laser  that  projects  a  keyboard.  It's  enough  to  touch  the  keyboard  and  Masterkey 2.0   detects  which  button  you  touched. You  can  also  use  the  Masterkey 2.0   battery  to  charge  your  smart  phone . The  best  and  the   highest  quality  components  have  been  chosen .  
How  Does  The  Masterkey  2.0  Compare?
The  Masterkey  2.0  adapter  is  a  unique  device  that  simply  cannot  be  compared  to  any  other  product  on  the  market  today.  It  operates  on  laser  and  pico projection  technology combining  multiple ( 5 ) operations into  one  powerful  device.  This pocket-sized  device  allows  you  to create a computer,  TV screen,  and a  projector  for  presentations  or  playing  games using  your  smart  phone.  It  can  be  used  anywhere  you  like: at  home, at  work,  on  the  road, and when  you  travel. Tech Specs What  Will  You  Get ?Top 10+ reasons why you will love  Masterkey 2.0 :
All-in-one. All in your pocket.
Wearable smart pico projector. 
Computer in your pocket.
Enlarge  the screen  of  your  smart  phone  up  to  120'' (portable home cinema).
You want to watch TV with a bigger screen anywhere, anytime, but you….
You don't want to carry around so much gear.
You want to play computer games with your friends.
Applied to the smart  car app.
Applied to the safe home app.
Video phone. Nature size.
Giving perfect presentations (business, sale, doc, tech, ….) anywhere.
Define your prospect's hot button.
Take control over your business & work. IOT.
Giving presentations at morning coffee or at lunch (fast, easy without all stuff).
 What Comes In The Box? Masterkey 2.0  Home Edition (HE) adapter (with a  built-in pico projector, laser keyboard , battery), cable and power supply with instructions.Masterkey 2.0  Business Edition (BE) adapter (with a built-in pico projector, laser keyboard , battery, kinesthetic sensor, software), cable and power supply with instructions. Free RewardEarn a FREE  cool case for Masterkey 2.0 !1. Share Masterkey 2.0 on Facebook2. Tag a friend3. Receive a free case  with your pledge After sharing, complete your claim via the Google form above. Please enter your Indiegogo account email so we can properly credit your reward. Rewards The Production Timeline What We Need & What You GetWe've already  invested  our knowledge,  and  funds  into  this  project. We need  $15,000 to finish casing design and pay for the cost of everything that's needed to produce this  adapter . The donations you give us will be used to fund the  production, packaging and shipping of the product. Every cent  will be used to pay for making Masterkey adapter into a reality.In return, you will get the most unique and useful adapter for your smart phone. Just imagine ! It's light, small and it can turn your smart phone into a laptop in an instant ! Anytime and anywhere. With your generous help, we'll be able to make this interface a high quality product that will change the way we use phones, work, IoT, IoE…  Masterkey 2.0 Team  &  The Impact
We’re a tech company that  believes in innovation through collaboration. Whatever we do we want to create a product that will make people happier.Team members are from US and EU. Most of them are HW & SW experts.What we stand forWith our knowledge and  product  we strongly believe that we can help business and sale staff  growing faster and reliable.  After all, customers count most.CharityWe would like to align ourselves with some charities that help people get to and from where they need to go. Do you have any ideas of some great ones? Possibly a Veteran’s organization, or any others that could help them out.                                 Our  StoryMy  name  is  Michael. I'm  a  computer  expert  and  an  enterpreneur. I also develop  computer  peripherals. In  my  spare  time,  I  like to cycle,  watch movies,  and  enjoy   delicious  food at  restaurants  . I  came  up  with  the  idea  for  the  Masterkey  adapter  on  one  of  my  business  trips. Because we are  always on the move, we must  perform  several  tasks  in  different  places:  at  home,  at  work, with our  clients,  when  we  wait,  when  we  travel,  at  our  friends'  parties, and  while  commuting.  We  always  want  to  have  a  computer, a tablet,  a  projector  or  a  device for playing games or watch TV. However, we do  not  want  to  feel  the  burden  of  carrying  multiple  devices  or  carting  large  consoles  around  with  us. With Masterkey, you  can simply  transform  your smart phone, which  is  always  with  you, into a powerful  little  device  that  satisfies  all your communications  and  gaming  needs. In many cases better than others. You  can  use  it  anywhere  and  anytime  with  all  of  the applications  that  exist  on  the  market.We've  invested  a lot  of  effort,  time,  knowledge,  and  funds  into  this  project. The  best  and  the   highest  quality  suppliers  have  been  chosen for the components, manufacturers and developers .  Product Development Manufacturing
 
Project Status
As you can see from the timeline above, we're in the final phase.  Funds from this pre-order campaign will be used to fund manufacturing costs. Masterkey has been developed since 2014 and we're committed to building the coolest &  the  most useful adapter for smart phones  on the market. We'd love to hear your candid and constructive feedback and would encourage those inclined to participate in our campaign.
 
Risks & Challenges
Our core business is hardware and the cloud.  We know the phone industry pretty well. We’ve been working with manufacturers and carriers, so everything we need is already in place. However, we are committed to bringing you a great product, and won't settle for anything less. Thus, during our manufacturing stage, we will actively work with our factory to make sure that everything is up to our standards. We recognize that this might result in a delay in our manufacturing process if complications arise, and we find it very important to make sure that these are shipped in a timely matter, but the quality comes first. This isn't our first rodeo but things seem to always come up and will be providing regular updates every 3 weeks to backers.
 
Questions and Answers
 
Technical Questions
Specifications & Customer Support
 
What are the product's dimensions ?
4,7'' x 2,3'' x 0,8'' (12 cm x 6 cm x 2 cm).What is the weight ?0,5 lbs / 8,1 ounce (230 g).Can it be connected  to a smart phone wireless ?Yes. We will supply you Masterkey 2.0  adapter (HE and BE) with wireless connection.How big is the max projector size ?Up to 120'' (300 cm).How long does the battery last?Masterkey  has a built-in internal battery that last up to 120 minutes and can be used as a charging station for other devices.What colors does it come in ?Black only.Where can the virtual keyboard be projected ? The virtual keyboard  can be projected on any flat surface.Which types of phones  does  this  device  work  with ? It  operates  on ANDROIDS,  all smartphones,  OS  and  WINDOWS.How  is  this  device  powered?  How  is the  battery charged? The  same way  as  your  smart  phone.Can  it  be  used  on  an airplane?The  device  is  designed according  to  the  IATA  standards.Does Masterkey 2.0  adapter come with a warranty?Yes! Masterkey 2.0  adapter comes with a one year warranty starting from the date of shipping. Your Masterkey 2.0  adapter warranty covers all defects in material and workmanship, except the following:
Damage caused by accident, misuse, abuse, disassembly, unauthorized modification or neglect.
Damage caused by liquid contact.
Damage resulting from failure to follow instructions contained in your instruction manual. 
Damage resulting from the performance of repairs by someone not authorized by our company.
What certifications do built-in projector and laser keyboard have ?Built-in components have FCC and CE approved.What countries and mobile networks will support the Masterkey 2.0  interface?Masterkey 2.0  adapter is not locked to any particular network or tech. It works in all countries that provide GSM/3G/LTE-based network services. It also supports  the  LTE standards to provide 4G mobile broadband connectivity around the world (subject to network availability and data fees).Do you have customer service and technical support?Yes, we do! We are here to answer all your questions. We have dedicated live chat hours for real time support. Backing Questions How do I contribute to a Perk so that I get a Masterkey 2.0 interface, including shipping?There is one (1) perk  to choose from    $ – shipping cost (and VAT) will be added automatically to the final contribution amount.I contributed using two Indiegogo accounts/email addresses - what should I do?If you have made several contributions using different accounts, please make sure to tell us about this by submitting a support request here.In the request, please indicate all the email addresses you used.How do I know if my contribution was successful?You should have received a confirmation email from Indiegogo if your contribution was successful. The confirmation email you received from Indiegogo serves as the receipt for your contribution. Please follow these instructions to access your individual Indiegogo account.Can I change or cancel my perk?Indiegogo has now made it easier than ever to upgrade your perks. You can do so on the contributions tab of your Indiegogo profile. See more information on how to do this  support@indiegogo.com .After contributing to the campaign, what happens next?We will keep you updated on the schedule by email. What happens to the money you raise?Your money will only be used to build your product - all funds will be spent for  manufacturing setup and component costs.Problem backing us?Please contact support@indiegogo.com. Buying & Shipping Questions Are shipping costs in the Perk price in Indiegogo?The prices do not include shipping.I did not choose a Perk when contributing, but I paid the whole sum for the Masterkey 2.0  - do I get a Masterkey 2.0  ? If you made a contribution for the Masterkey 2.0  without adding a perk, there is no need to worry as long as the contribution equals the price of one of the two available perks.How do I pay for several Masterkey 2.0 adapters? Can I add only one Perk at a time?If you wish to contribute for several adapters, we kindly ask that you contribute for one perk and shipping at a time, using the same email address for all contributions.Can the adapter features or specifications change before delivery?As in any product development, changes are possible. We reserve the right to make changes in described features, specifications, and delivery date estimations and to introduce functionality at a later date. But the quality comes first.  If you’ve backed us, you’ll be kept right up to date.What will the device cost at retail?The expected retail price of Masterkey 2.0  HE is $ 299. The expected retail price of Mastekey 2.0  BE is  $ 399. I am a distributor or reseller. How do I contact you?Please email via our site  Masterkey .I am a developer. How do I contact you?Please email via our site  Masterkey .Where do you ship? We will be shipping these devices worldwide. The Masterkey 2.0  adapter will be initially shipped with English menus but we are currently adding Japanese, French, German, Spanish and Chinese language menus and documentation. Do I need to add the cost of shipping to my pledge?Please add the amount specified in the perk description. Local import taxes may apply.I contributed to a perk but I forgot to add the extra $ for shipping. How can I increase the amount?No problem! If you'd like to add funds for shipping, you can make another contribution and select "Shipping Cost".I can't get my payment to work in Paypal, what should I do?Email the Indiegogo Customer Happiness Team at support@indiegogo.com. They'll be able to track your transaction and help with any issues.Didn't find the  answer to your question? Please submit a request if needed. We're happy to help! How to Participate in a Referral Contest and Get RefundWe offer you an interesting referral contest. Please click here. So In Conclusion, The  Masterkey 2.0  adapter  is  a  powerful  adapter that  turns  your  smart  phone  into  a laptop, video phone,  TV  screen,  projector  or  device  for  playing  games  in  an instant  .  Simply  affix  the  interface to  your  phone  and  plug  the  cable  into  the  interface and that's it. Then  you  will  get  best  these  devices  have  to  offer  you – a  bigger  screen,  the keyboard,  the  projections,  fun,  easier  presentations,  better  mobility.  This    Masterkey 2.0  adapter will  give  you  all  the  best  and  most useful  things  that  today's  electronics  offer.  
Help Us Spread The Word
We would like to thank every backer for any contribution and any assistance in the realization of our project. Please share our project through Facebook and Twitter, we will be happy for any help!
Thank you for supporting Masterkey 2.0  project !
 
 

All in one. All in your pocket.

story:
Hi to all Pepakura Library followers.

I have been asked to explain the idea of having a website over the already formed but limited Facebook page.

First of all we have approx 2,500 files and 8,000+ members already on the Facebook page with new files and new members added daily. The files are getting a lot more difficult to search for time wise. We also have many members requesting if other members have certain files which swamps genuine questions about help and general discussions.

I myself have over 24,000 new files on my hard drive awaiting upload, but I have been holding back due to the sheer amount of files we already have. If it takes ages to search through 2,500 files, can you imagine how long it will take searching through 26,000+?

So I knew that one day, the time would come, that we will have outgrown our Facebook page.

Also I am waiting for Facebook to complain that the memory we are using up with members and file space will soon come to an end

So, whats the solution ??????

A WEBSITE

This as many of you know is not free. To create a bespoke site that will house all the varied files PDO, STL ect, including member pages, it will cost a certain amount of money.

At this rate we are adding over 1,200 members a month and growing so the site will benefit the existing and new members.

All I am asking is a small contribution to get the site up and running. All of the money, however small, will go to the site. The more we get, the more the site will grow in options and provide us with more opportunity to make the site stand out from the crowd.

We will still have the Facebook page but as a forum to help with problems and show off members builds. You can still upload files but they will then be transferred to the website in the free files section.

But we are currently unable to grow unless we upgrade the platform from Facebook. We are very limited.

The Website will be made into 3 levels

1. Entry level

(This will be exactly the same as the Facebook page. The only difference is you will only have access to the free files). However instead of the current 2000 files you will have access to thousands more, with the option to also search more efficiently.

2. Silver level members £9.99 per year (£5.99 for the fist year we set up the website). (Price to be finalised)

(Every yearly subscribed member will have there own page on the website with general details about who they are, their likes, projects, the area they live so that if any promotional deal going on in their area they will get emailed direct to their inbox and any members that live near to them will give you a chance to work together and help each other if needed. Remember this group has a family ethic. They will be able to sell costumes and props and advertise their items on their page through the website shop. They also get access to the "Pay for File" section that designers normally sell for a fee. You will need to be a member for this as the problem with copying and re selling files is on the increase and we can police the files sold on this site by adding a way that every file sold will have a way of saying who bought it. Then, if they then sell the file on we can stop this as we already know who that member was (we will be working closer with the designers on this in the near future)

Also the Silver members will have full Access to discounts and offers every month with promotions. We are working on these promotions and they will only be available to Silver members as you will have discount codes sent to your inbox, that will allow you to get massive discounted goods from the advertiser we will promote in your country. Whether it be cardstock, resin, foam cutting tools, printers, fibreglass, 3D printers, paints, sealers etc saving you £100's of pounds a year.

We will also be offering access to videos to help you use these products, New material systems and ways of working will be addressed to help all our members to have the best experience.

3. Gold Members £50.00 per year (designers) (Price to be finalised)

This group is designed for the SELLERS of files.

This Fee is higher than the Silver membership, but we feel if your a seller and you want your work safe and not resold and kept protected then we are here to make sure this wont happen. The work needed to police and control any problems that arise through BUYERS and SELLERS is extensive but with this fee we will make sure it runs smoothly. We don't any problems with files being sold that are not the designers property so someone will be on hand 24 hours a day to answer any problems or issues that arise. Any issues will be investigated and the software we are making will tell us everything we need to know. It will allow us to find out exactly who has re-sold your files.  We feel the £50 service fee is a small price to pay to ensure the safety of your hard work.

All Silver and Gold members will have a monthly Q and A, to make sure they have a say in how the site is running, how we can make it better for all the members and we will give out prizes from our sponsors of the month. So whatever level you subscribe you will be getting your monies worth and a great friendly experience will be had by all.

I hope you have found that this answers most, if not all your questions. If any of you require further information, please feel free to message me and I will answer all the questions to the best of my ability at this current time. ALL website subscription prices are still to be finalised. 

Thanks,

Damian David

story:
Charging cables have become an integral part of all of our everyday lives and a broken or incompatible charging cable amounts to an almost insurmountable crisis.

Driven primarily out of the aggravation of broken and inferior quality charging cables my team and I went on a journey to produce a cable that solved the short comings of conventional cables, we wanted one cable for all devices, it had to be durable, would not break and capable of charging devices fast. ITIPz was born.

Our team of designers and engineers went through numerous iterations of design and rigorous testing to accomplish the ITIPz premium quality product for apple and android devices.

With the global movement towards USB-C, the next logical step was for us to develop the USB-C magnetic tip. We have started with the design and early prototypes and need your backing to assist us in bringing it to fruition. 

USB-C inserts for Magnetic tip.

 

 

Why we need you.

By backing us you will receive the ITIPz supercharger cable and tips of your choice at a discounted rate. The product is ready to ship and early bird backers will receive their personalized ITIPz order in December 2016. 

Added Bonus

The first 200 early bird backers will have the option to personalize their ITIPz cable.

Our commitment to you.

Although the ITIPz product is ready to ship we have gone for a fixed goal of $5000 to give you, our valuable backers, the confidence to back us. Reaching the goal we will also give us the validation that we are on the correct path with producing the USB-C magnetic tip which we hope to launch the middle of 2017.

 

How you can help us in other ways.

Help us get the word out their by sharing our links. 

https://www.facebook.com/itipzsupercharger/

https://www.instagram.com/itipzsupercharger/
story_txt:
Charging cables have become an integral part of all of our everyday lives and a broken or incompatible charging cable amounts to an almost insurmountable crisis.

Driven primarily out of the aggravation of broken and inferior quality charging cables my team and I went on a journey to produce a cable that solved the short comings of conventional cables, we wanted one cable for all devices, it had to be durable, would not break and capable of charging devices fast. ITIPz was born.

Our team of designers and engineers went through numerous iterations of design and rigorous testing to accomplish the ITIPz premium quality product for apple and android devices.


With the global movement towards USB-C, the next logical step was for us to develop the USB-C magnetic tip. We have started with the design and early prototypes and need your backing to assist us in bringing it to fruition. 
USB-C inserts for Magnetic tip.

 
 
Why we need you.

By backing us you will receive the ITIPz supercharger cable and tips of your choice at a discounted rate. The product is ready to ship and early bird backers will receive their personalized ITIPz order in December 2016. 
Added Bonus
The first 200 early bird backers will have the option to personalize their ITIPz cable.

Our commitment to you.
Although the ITIPz product is ready to ship we have gone for a fixed goal of $5000 to give you, our valuable backers, the confidence to back us. Reaching the goal we will also give us the validation that we are on the correct path with producing the USB-C magnetic tip which we hope to launch the middle of 2017.
 
How you can help us in other ways.
Help us get the word out their by sharing our links. 
https://www.facebook.com/itipzsupercharger/
https://www.instagram.com/itipzsupercharger/

story:
SOLAR POWERED POWER BANK

Compatible with most usb charged devices such as

  • Iphone, Ipad, Ipod etc
  • Samsung Phones
  • Android Phones
  • GPS Navigation
  • GoPro Camera's
  • Camping/Hiking flash lights
  • Vape/vapers

The Fastest Charging Solar Powered Power Bank

Fully Waterproof

Can Also Charge From Mains

What We Need & What You Get

We Need Funding In Order To Place A High Quantity Order So That The Price Is Reduced To A Figure That Will Be Affordable For Everyone. Your Contribution Will Help Us Achieve The Following Tasks;

  • Place A Large Order (1000 units approx)
  • Shipping + Local Taxes
  • Team To Test, Pack and Ship

With your purchase of our available perks, you can be one of the first to receive this truly remarkable bit of tech. Running Low on Battery is A Thing Of The Past With The Solar Powered Power Bank.

The Impact

If we are successful with our indiegogo campaign, the next step for us will be to design and produce a better version that incorporates; 

  • Faster Charging
  • More Compact yet more powerful
  • Able To Charge Laptops
  • Wireless Charging Compatible
  • Bluetooth Connectivity with a Mobile App to give Live Status Updates such as power remaining, charge time etc

Help Us On Our Journey To Make Everyday Struggles A Thing Of The Past......

story:
Are you worried about your personal information being stolen? Are you one of the people who have had your credit ruined by a hacker? Do you know anyone that has had their identity stolen? If any of these topics concern or upset you, then you should consider participating and donating to this project.

I am one of those that has had my SS# stolen and jacked. What a nightmare! It took over 6 months and hundreds of hrs to fix not to mention the lost time ad funds.

We now know the WE NEED to STOP THE HEMORRHAGING OF OUR HARD EARNED MONEY! NO ONE SEEMS TO GIVE A SH*T ABOUT OUR SECURITY & PRIVACY!

 

It is long overdue “We the People” take our credentials back from those that don't take the necessary measurements to prevent our identification and credentials secure and private! Daily we are seeing our personal lives getting hacked and stolen. This needs to STOP! My SS# was compromised and some illegal alien was using it! Every 2 seconds another person's identification is stolen! This is an emergency right NOW!

The people and companies we have entrusted are not doing their job and we are all vulnerable. All the agencies could have fixed this longtime ago just by taking the situation more seriously and by investing a small amount of additional capital. If those WE trusted, took our data and privacy more seriously they would have created a multiple fragmented storage system!If they did hacking our credentials would be non-existent! We need to take action ourselves and eliminate this problem once and for all.

The system is called fragmentation combined with “ALIVE BIOMETRICS”! True ID, LLC has developed the un-hackable system “ALIVE IRIS/PUPIL SCAN. This new identification system will be for every human on Earth. The new system uses MULTIPLE ALIVE BIOMETRICS and an all-new 3-Demsional Crystal Code.  We are also assembling a team to help push a bill through congress to boot the old SS# and replace it with a new encrypted 3-D code. This new system will allow for every individual to maintain their OWN data without anyone else having the information.

Everyone can help by donating whatever they can and be sure to contact your Congressional representative and inform them about this cause.

This new code will be for everyone. Every Dollar raised will be going toward this new solution which will help everyone. If a large percentage of people decide to help and contribute, we will move on to the next level of this project. The funds will be used to further develop the systems and devices.

I look forward to everyone’s feedback. If anyone is interested in helping beside cash contributions, please feel free to write a message with your contact information and how you would like to help. Thank you all so much for your time.

Thank you all for your time!

Theodore Dean McBain
