story:
Symetium is much more than a regular smartphone - it was designed with perfection in mind! Everything is thought out to the smallest detail, the materials are carefully selected to provide you with an experience and design that you will never get with another smartphone.

 

 

Designed in Sweden, Symetium features a unique monolithic and minimalistic design without any visible camera lenses or camera cutouts on the front or back. Every detail and material has been thoughtfully chosen to give you a unique and clean design that you’ll have never seen before. And, with the adjustable virtual bezel you won't have any issues holding it in any situation.

 

 

 


 

 

A Desktop PC In Your Pocket

 

Powered by Qualcomm's Snapdragon 865, and with 12 GB of RAM, Symetium was never designed to be a smartphone it was designed to be a desktop computer. Symetium can provide you with a great and productive experience, whether you're a gamer that wants to connect it to a tv with a controller,  or a businessman or businesswoman that wants to work on the go, the desktop UI has been designed to give you the same experience as a desktop computer with no limitations.
 

 

 

A Gaming Smartphone As Well!

 

Symetium is great for gaming and media as well!
Connect it to a TV with a controller and get a media center UI optimized for controllers like Android TV to turn Symetium into both a media center device and a gaming console.
Powered by Dolby Atmos, Symetium features two powerful stereo speakers for a rich and powerful sound. And of course, it has a 3.5 mm headphone jack. Not all trends are useful :), we even opted for an IR blaster so you can control your tv while streaming to it.

 

 

Powerful 5500 mAh Battery

 

Symetium has an incredible 5500mah battery and quick charge 4.0 to last you through the day and beyond, using the supplied glass panel you can also enable qi wireless charging, The charger can also be used with AAA batteries, so you can transform your charger into a mini power bank in case of emergency.

 

 

Lifelike Display

 

Symetium is equipped with a bezel-less 90hz 4k HDR OLED display for vibrant colors and deep blacks, with its 90hz refresh rate you will get a fluid lag-free performance for both gaming and anything else. There is also an advanced built-in calibration tool with everything from whitebalance to contrast and more, that can store calibration profiles so you can calibrate the colors after the sRGB or Adobe RGB or DCI-P3 color space or punchy and vibrant colors with the included "Vibrancy+" calibration preset, choose which apps your custom profiles should apply to, so you can have accurate true to life colors when you choose.

 

 

  


 


One Camera Fits All

 

The modular camera system of Symetium also features Sonys 48 Megapixel flagship sensor imx586 for the best quality photos whether you want to take a selfie or photos of the world.

With its modular design, you will be able to upgrade to a multiple camera setup with the lenses you desire, and with its magnetic design you can attach it anywhere on Symetium or somewhere else, Symetium also features a camera holder so you can pull the camera out or rotate it for easy access or to take highly detailed selfies, the camera module itself is waterproof so you don’t have to worry about getting it wet, if you prefer to have a visible camera lens you can also get the optional camera lens panel so you don’t have to pull out the camera when you want to take a photo.

We also built in a two-stage camera shutter key so you will never miss a shot.

 

Turn Symetium into a mini computer

 

We also designed a stylish metal case with a built-in QWERTY keyboard and a trackpad.
This elegant case protects your phone and turns your Symetium into a mini computer!

 

 

Invulnerable Design

 

With Symetium you don’t need to worry about scratches. Unlike many expensive brand new smartphones, which you can easily and permanently scratch, The display of Symetium is designed to be recessed which allows you to install a screen protector invisibly without affecting design or function. You don’t need to buy it separately - a tempered glass screen protector already comes pre-installed.

 

 

Symetium comes with a magnetic back panel, so you can switch to other colors and materials to suit your style or replace a scratched panel with a new one.
The inside has a window to the hardware inside, so you can turn Symetium into a transparent phone, just by using the supplied clear glass back panel. Don’t worry if you lose your panel, the inside is waterproof, so even without a back panel you will still be protected from water and dust.  Symetium also supports QI wireless charging if you use the supplied glass panel, and with the optional open camera lens panel, you don’t have to remove the camera to take a photo.

.

 

 

 

A Beautiful UI Based On Design And Function!

 

SymetiumUI is designed to work as a desktop operating system as well as a mobile operating system, with elegance in mind. The thoughtfully made design will harmoniously reflect the wallpaper you're using, with the translucent design it will dynamically adapt its UI design and dynamic home button to your wallpaper.

 

Symetium also features a dynamic notification led and home button so you can choose what notification led style you want, and with the built-in UI customization, you can customize the translucency or turn it off completely. You can also connect Symetium via USB type C to an HDMI display, for a full desktop experience with a mouse and keyboard without any need for a dock.

 

 

Unlike standard Android, SymetiumOS intelligently organizes applications and files into separate categories — for example, an image gallery, as well as image-related widgets. This was done to ensure that applications and data were clean and organized and that the user could better control the operation of the PC operating system.

 


 

 

Choose Your Android And Modify It

 

Symetium will come with an untouched stock Android one pre-installed. But you can upgrade it to SymetiumOS. No PC is needed, just plug in the supplied USB flash drive to Symetium and let the system do the rest.


By giving you the opportunity to choose between stock android and SymetiumOS or any other ROM such as LineageOS, we want to show our openness to third-party modifications.

 

 

We are personally tired of the smartphones that "die" as soon as the manufacturers stop updating them. We are going to keep Symetium up to date as long as we can with a guaranteed 2 years of updates on SymetiumOS and longer on stock android, We also greet others to creating custom ROMs to keep Symetium alive for many years to come and we will release everything you need to modify your Symetium to your heart's content without having your warranty voided!

Because that’s what Android is all about, freedom and customization!

 

First Class Security

 

with Symetium you will be able to encrypt apps or data using fingerprint or a passcode or both, Symetium also features advanced anti theft features such as protection mode, protection mode will turn on if a force reboot or soft reset has been initiated or if the Sim Card has been removed, Protection mode let's you listen to the microphone or track your device as well as displaying messages on the screen, Protection mode will also continuously connect to any nearby open Wi-Fi connection to keep tracking enabled even if threes no connection available.
 

 

Protection mode will run silently and the device will appear off and refuse to start it will just display a fake low battery warning when trying to boot unless you choose to display a message on the screen remotely, Protection mode can be disabled if you hold the power button for 10 seconds,Protection mode will also let you reserve battery which won't be used during normal operation so you know there's always battery available for protection mode, Protection mode can also be configured to initiate when the non-reserved battery has been fully depleted Symetium will also perform a silent system wipe if you input a unique pin code of your choice when unlocking your device, this is useful if you are forced to unlock your device and don't want your data to fall into the wrong hands, to abort the operation simply hold on the power off button in the power menu, this can of course also be pass-code protected.

 

 

          Symetium pay a securely encrypted cryptowallet

 

Symetium pay let's you securely collect all your credit cards in one place for payments, Symetium pay also supports cryptocurrency which will automatically be converted to FIAT currency whenever you use Symetium pay to make a purchase in any store that supports contactless payment methods, we believe cryptocurrency is the future and that it should be as easy to pay with it as with any other currency.

 

 

Compare The Specs

 

 

 

 

The idea of Symetium originated in 2012. We designed this smartphone as an uncompromising solution, made from first-class materials, with a unique design and powerful technical stuffing. We studied the smartphone market for many years, revealed its strengths and weaknesses. And now we are ready to realize our invention. And now we just need your support!

 

 

Timeline

 

 

 

 

 

 

​

• The final color palette may differ from the one shown here. We will try to collect the maximum number of reviews to find out the most popular colors and implement them in the best possible way.

• There may be changes to the final dimensions or specifications of some of the parts as we optimize the design for mass production.

• There is the possibility that the delivery of the product to our contributors may be delayed due to unforeseen product changes that require additional development time or addition to the scope of our manufacturing timeline.

• There is the possibility that the delivery of the product to our contributors may be delayed due to unforeseen circumstances in international shipping and logistics.

Finally, the very nature of Symetium means that the exact list of components will not change until we start production to ensure quality. If we are forced to change a function or component, it will be ONLY because we have come up with something better and more innovative to replace it.

In the event of any changes in Symetium, we will promptly report these changes to our participants.

 

 

 

Is the phone locked or unlocked?

Symetium is unlocked for use on almost all networks

What accessories come as standard?

Powerbank Charger, USB Cable,  Quickstart Guide, User Manual & Headphones

Is there a warranty on Symetium?

Yes, 12 months

What is the battery life?

Approximately 3 to 4 days

What countries and mobile networks will support the Symetium?

Symetium will work on most GSM & CDMA networks throughout the world.

Will the phone receive updates after launch?

Yes, as software evolves, updates will be available as and when necessary.

Why set such a high funding goal?

Manufacturing Symetium Smartphones is very costly and we do not want to fall short. We decided that to do things properly and to assure our supporters that they will receive their Symetium, a minimum budget is needed of €1.25M

What if you fail to reach the funding goal?

As our campaign is Fixed Funding if we won't reach our funding goal all funds will be refunded automatically to all contributors.
 

What if my question isn’t answered here?

Please contact us at symetium@outlook.com

story:
Product Detail

Product Name :One Time Use Power Bank 

Type :Polymer Lithium lon Grade A Non-Recycled Battery 

Socket Type: 2in1 Micro USB & Lightning

Feature:Portable and Convenient 

Cycle Life:one time 

Capacity:1000mah 

Color:Black /White Material:Fireproof ABS+PC 

Theoretical Available Time 20 Minutes 

Indicator:LED 

Product Size:57x52x11mm

Working environment temperature: -10 ~ 40 °C

Built-in overcharge and over discharge protection: Equipped with secure IC chips, effectively protects your devices from overcharge, over-current and over discharge, the all-around ways assure you of a satisfied and safe charging experience. This power bank is born from an idea by accident, when on a hike, and having nothing to load and my smartphone with the flat battery, I devised this power bank.

 

 Switch button it is used to activate the power Bank before putting it into operation and it serves to not waste the power charge over time.With the 2 in 1 connector This power bank can be used for both Android and IOS smartphones from iphone 6 (included) and then also usable with Iphone X & Samsung S9. You can use the battery very simply by reversing and inserting the connector on the right side. For example the battery of a Samsung S9 is 3500 Mah so the Power Bank recharges the phone from off about 28%.

More compatibility      

                                                              

Risks & Challenges

story_txt:
Product Detail
Product Name :One Time Use Power Bank 
Type :Polymer Lithium lon Grade A Non-Recycled Battery 
Socket Type: 2in1 Micro USB & Lightning
Feature:Portable and Convenient 
Cycle Life:one time 
Capacity:1000mah 
Color:Black /White Material:Fireproof ABS+PC 
Theoretical Available Time 20 Minutes 
Indicator:LED 
Product Size:57x52x11mm
Working environment temperature: -10 ~ 40 °C
Built-in overcharge and over discharge protection: Equipped with secure IC chips, effectively protects your devices from overcharge, over-current and over discharge, the all-around ways assure you of a satisfied and safe charging experience. This power bank is born from an idea by accident, when on a hike, and having nothing to load and my smartphone with the flat battery, I devised this power bank.


 
 Switch button it is used to activate the power Bank before putting it into operation and it serves to not waste the power charge over time.With the 2 in 1 connector This power bank can be used for both Android and IOS smartphones from iphone 6 (included) and then also usable with Iphone X & Samsung S9. You can use the battery very simply by reversing and inserting the connector on the right side. For example the battery of a Samsung S9 is 3500 Mah so the Power Bank recharges the phone from off about 28%.
More compatibility      
                                                              
Risks & Challenges
There is no risk emby already is in the prototype stage as you can see from the video where you see it in operation.

Remember to make word of mouth

story:
This Case will not come off! Our anti-theft case includes a tiny yet massively resistant locking mechanism. It’s impossible to take off without your own key and color code.

Thieves can’t turn it off! A unique sleep/wake button is integrated into the case, making sure that no one besides you can turn off your phone.

Normally, a thief will want to shut your phone off, disabling all software solutions to find the phone. Safeskin addresses this head on with the first hardware solution.

The button works with a 0.026in (0.65mm) tactile switch, making it so slim that you would never guess it’s a completely separate button.

Lightining Compatiable: Keep your phone charged without having to worry about the case getting in the way.

6 layer HDI PCB

Communicates with the iPhone through Apple-approved Protocol

Our Case is Drop Proof! Made out of a strong but flexible material, PC ABS, Safeskin absorbs the shock and prevents the phone from breaking. The touchscreen starts save with the case slightly above the phone’s screen.

How loud is the alarm on the Eye?

It is 100 dB.

How long is the alert and how do I switch off?

It keeps on alerting until the Case and Eye get back into each other’s safety range and the owner presses the button for 5 seconds on the Eye.

What is the range of the alert distance?

There are two different options. The user can choose between them in the application. There is a smaller range (about 30 feet) and a larger one (about 100 feet).

What happens if I go to the bathroom with my phone in my pocket, but the Eye remains in my bag?

If your alarm function is turned on then as soon as you get out of the Eye’s safety range both accessories will start to alarm. You can easily turn this off by pushing the button of the Eye for 5 seconds. And in case your in a SafeZone that you have set up earlier then the alarm won’t even go off.

How do I switch back to normal mode after an alert?

You just have to switch off the alarm by pressing the button on the Eye for 5 seconds within in the Case’s safety range. As soon as the alarm turns off everything is automaticallay back to normal.

How do I find my keys, bag etc. if I am using several Eyes?

You can easily manage your Eyes in the Safeskin application. When you put a given Eye on any of your belongings, you can name it in the app. When you are looking for something then you can simply ring the given Eye with light or sound or both through the application.

What happens if I lose my Eye?

You can’t loose your Eye because it is virtually connected to the phone. So if you were to lose it then both would start to alarm.

How do I prevent a false alert, eg. my kids are playing with the my phone/Eye?

You can set a SafeZone or a SafeTime in the app.

How do I take off the case?

You get a key included in your Eye. With that you need to turn the three locks to match your own color code. You receive your own color code in the application, right after you connect the case to your phone.

What happens if I lose my keys and forget the color code?

You cannot lose your keys because it is inside the Eye which is always wirelessly connected to your phone and Case. You can always see your color code by logging into the app with your own credentials.

Is the Case/Eye compatible with Android phones?

Not at the moment. However, we are planning on developing Safeskin for Androids as well in the future.

What is the material of the Case? Is it drop proof?

The material of the case is PC ABS. Yes, the case is drop proof.

Can I pay with my phone if the Case is on my phone?

Yes, NFC works with our case on.

Does wireless charging work with my Case on?

Yes wireless charging works through the Safeskin Case.

What is the extra function of your application, comparing it with "Find my iPhone"?

You can manage all your Eyes and thus find your different belongings as well. And you can also manage your safety settings.

story:
JUMPER Power Labs was born out of the rapid development in battery pack technology.  From the onset we have worked tirelessly towards realizing a dream of highly portable, multi-functional power banks.  Creating products that allow people to live beyond the limits of their technology; that is JUMPER Power Labs.

VIS - 4 Reasons You Want One

Jump-Starter

VIS will jump starting your 12V car battery up to 20 times on a single a charge.  Attach jumper cables to dead car battery, plug attachment into your VIS turn the ignition and you are back on the road!  

Power Bank

The 6,000 mAh macromolecule polymer, soft pack engineered battery pack is capable of charging your iphone 6 or similar powered smartphones between 3 and 4 times on a single charge.  VIS was also designed to be used with all your 12V appliance's. 

Flashlight

The high powered, range adjustable, 3W, three mode (beam, strobe, sos) flashlight will illuminate the road less traveled.

Emergency Tool

The LED strip light operates in red and white light, the red light operates in three modes (beam, strobe, sos) the white light operated in three settings (high, medium, low) use as a mobile lantern or a magnetically fixable stationary light.  Plus Emergency Hammer! 

What We Need

Jumper Power Banks needs to raise $10,000 via the IndieGoGo community in order to enter production at our manufacturers minimum.  Your support will give JUMPER the opportunity to explore new technologies and new products in the future!

What You Get

Supporters will be rewarded with the most dynamic power bank on the market.  What we have been working on and continuously improving for two years; VIS.  .  VIS will impress with all its functionality but will surprise with the small size, light weight and sophisticated yet rugged design.  You will be receiving our latest re-design seen below: Delivery is scheduled for July 2015

The Impact

We envision a world where you are limited only by how far you can go and not how long your battery can last. With the new advancements in battery pack technology and your support we will extend the limits of technology to eliminate the need to pause your journey. With this new autonomy the only thing limiting you will be your sense of adventure. Please help us make widespread readily available battery pack technology available to the masses. 

We have been working with our strategic battery and tooling partner in Taiwan, Kuan Lu for over two years in order to develop what we have today: a truly portable multi-function power solution we are proud to call VIS. Your support will be invaluable to advancement of JUMPER Power Labs and the continued exploration of this exciting technology.

Words from the Founder, Albert Shoihet

I believe freedom and confidence are vital to making people feel good and safe.  VIS was designed and built to provide this feeling.  Whether you want VIS to put in your son's or daughter's car to keep them out of trouble or keep VIS at house in case of power outages/natural disasters, VIS will be there. 
 If you are like me and live an active, adventurous lifestyle and want to stretch your technical capabilities on the road, trail, or wherever, VIS will be there; at precisely the moment you need it.  

(My first time using VIS; jumpstarting my neighbours car, she was very impressed)
IndieGoGo has revolutionized the process entrepreneurs, idea people, and creative people alike go through in order to turn an idea into reality.  This community has given us the opportunity to create a multi-function, utility power bank that will add tremendous value to everyone who purchases one. VIS has been a trusted companion of mine for a few months now!  I thank you for taking the time to read through our campaign and for being a part of such a great community!

Specifications

6,000 mAh Cobalt B lithium-ion battery

Capacity：LiPo 6000 mAh

Input：14V1A

Output：5V/2A；12V10A；12V Jump Start

LED Light (Light, Burst flashing, SOS)

Start Current：150A

Peak Current：300A

Size：L:8.5" (22cm) W:1.85 "(47 mm) D:1.85 " (4.6 cm)

Weight：1.1 lb (500g)

Operating Temp.：-20℃~60℃

Lifetime：>1000 cycles

VIS can be used to charge any rechargeable mobile USB device. Here is a list of popular mobile devices and their battery capacities:

  • Samsung S5: 2800mAh 
  • iPhone 6: 1810mAh 
  • iPhone 6+: 2915mAh 
  • HTC m8: 2600mAh 
  • GoPro HERO4: 1180mAh 
  • Nexus: 2300mAh 
  • Sony: 2330mAh 
  • LG: 3000mAh

Risks & Challenges

We work directly with the manufacturer which gives us confidence in producing the VIS on schedule. However, issues within the manufacturing process do occasionally happen that are unexpected; this would delay our delivery. We believe we will be able to deliver in a timely and efficient manner, and do not foresee any risks and challenges that would cause major delays. Regular communication with our backers will make sure there are no surprises.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Like us on Facebook 
  • Follow us on twitter  
  • Make sure to use the IndieGoGo share tools to show your friends and family!

story:
The Real HomePhone

Before telling you our story, we want let you know that you can find more news and updates on:

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/therealhomephone/

Instagram: @therealhomephone

Let's START!!

Who we are?

We are Sertea Web.                                

Sertea Web is a spin off of an Italian company that has created a multi-channel communication platform. We design and develop a technology platform elder age-friendly, in a Technological Park near Milan.

Reasons for our project?

In the last 50 years, the socio-economic development of most countries has been accompanied by a significant reduction in fertility and increases in life expectancy. According to the latest estimates, by 2050 in the world 1 person every 5 will be 60 years or more.

The elderly population, in fact, will double from 900 million individuals to almost 2 billion. With 21.4% of citizens over 65 Italy is the second country in the world for longevity after Japan.

Elderly people, in most cases, are unable to use smartphone, for example due to vision problem. Our purpose is to help them. 

This work, in fact, addresses elderly people who DO NOT use smarthphone. 

We have considered that innovating does not necessarily mean inventing something new, but also better using what we already have. So by Following this philosophy, the normal home phone we all know has been revolutionized.

WE INNOVATE THE PARADIGM OF COMMUNICATION TELEPHONE / TELEVISION!
Now communication technology is no longer an obstacle for elderly people. Making calls with the TV means using a technological tool available to each generation.

 

What is HomePhone?

The real HomePhone is a new concept device that transforms YOUR home television into a smartphone!
It is carefully designed for people security and home care of seniors and the sick.



In case of necessity, like a car failure or a illness, HomePhone allows to get your phone call or a SMS on television at home.
HomePhone is able to display the message (SMS/PUSH) or the entry call on the screen, turning on the television (if switched off or in stand-by) or switching the program if the TV is on, forcing your family members to answer.
When you close the Pop-up and switch-off the alarm with your TV remote controller (OK button), you confirm that you have received the message.

FOR THIS REASON HOMEPHONE ALWAYS GIVES YOU THE CERTAINTY OF REACHING THE DESIRED PERSON!!

It also has an EMERGENCY BUTTON. This is designed for a sudden domestic accident (like a stroke, heart attack, fall with consequent fractures, thief intrusion). Interested person can easily push the button and send an alert message to pre-defined contact list.

 

 

Finally, it is designed as a Telemedicine device. In fact, it is able to collect data concerning vital parameters and send them to hospital facilities, for a remote analysis or save into servers.

Feature:

• HomePhone makes them talk with the TV, being equipped with SIM, Bluetooth, WiFi, HDMI, USB, Apps
• Compatible with TV model produced from 2005 onwards
• Self-installing
• Profile set-up through web app (contact list, emergency number)

The Real HomePhone is covered by international patent applications.

We need 850.000 $ to go from the prototype to the real industrialization. In particular we have to produce a minimus of 1400 working device and this sum that we request is necessary for cover all the production cost and other fees. No profit for us, only the need to start the production and transform our project into reality. 

Prizes and Awards

1) Digital 360 Awards 2017

On the 28th of June we have been selected "the best telecommunications solution" by a jury of 53 CIOs of the major companies operating in our country!!!!

We won in the category of telecommunications and were finalist in the category of IoT (Internet of Things) and Big Data Analytics at the Digital 360 Awards.

Click here for more details:

http://www.digital360awards.it/winner-2017/sert...

2) InnovaS@lute Awards 2017

HomePhone received the InnovaS@lute Awards 2017, a special recognition in the "Communication with citizens and users" by Forum Innovazione Salute.

Click here for more details:
http://www.innovazioneperlasalute.it/it/homepage/

3) GERMAN-ITALIAN INNOVATION CONFERENCE 2017 (Berlin)

We have been invited to the GERMAN-ITALIAN INNOVATION CONFERENCE in Berlin on the 29th of November 2017!

The main theme has been "Investing in Italian Innovation: Digital Solutions and the challenge of Industry 4.0"

 

Other Ways You Can Help us

Maybe that you are interested but are not able to contribute financially to our cause. Do not worry, you can still be very helpful for us.

Please, if you trust in our project share our fundraising page and follow us on social networks.

You can find us on:

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/therealhomephone/

Instagram: @therealhomephone

story:
Never drop your smartphone again when taking pictures and videos. PHOTOG's ergonomic grip lets you hold the smartphone one-handed - safely. 

The physical DSLR shutter button works seamlessly with smartphone's default camera app via bluetooth. The detachable grip is also a remote shutter button and a charger. 

This small gadget in your pocket will change your smartphone photography experience forever. 

Key Features: 

Smart mount. Stretch to fit any size of smartphones of any brands. 

Hot shoe.  Adapt light and microphone. 

Shutter button. Works directly with smartphone's default camera app via blue-tooth. (No need to work with an extra app)

Grip. Hold one-handed for a genuine DSLR feeling. 

           Also works as charger. 

           Detachable as remote shuttle release button. 

 

Recommended by leading lifestyle magazine:

 

Who are the creators?

Veteran photographer and filmmaker Don Ng is the creator of PHOTOG. He teams up with his brother Jacky Ng who happens to be an awards-winning product and toy designer and his colleague system engineer Jackie Lee to create PHOTOG. 

An ideal add-on should be easy to carry, safe and comfortable to hold with one palm, light-weight, ready-to-go. That is the way we create PHOTOG.

More...

Taking pictures and videos consumes smartphone battery fast. PHOTOG's grip is also a 3000 mAh charger to keep your smartphone more substainable without connecting an extra mobile charger. Isn't it cool!

The adjustable ring makes sure the mount tightly holds smartphones in different size from different brands, NOT just for iPhone. PHOTOG is friendly with all major smartphones: iPhone, Samsung, LG, Huawei, Xiaomi.   

 

 

Q&A

 

Does PHOTOG fit any size of smartphone from all brands?

Yes. we design PHOTOG in a way to fit all size from iPhone SE to iPhone X to Samsung Edge to Huawei Mate series.

Do I have to remove my phone case to mount PHOTOG?

No.

Do I have to download an app in order to use the shutter release button?

No. Just pair PHOTOG's bluetooth with your smartphone and use smartphone's default camera app.

Apart from black, do you offer other colors?

At this stage, we will only produce black PHOTOG. 

 

PEAKS

----------------------------------------

----------------------------------------

----------------------------------------

 

Risks and challenges

PHOTOG is just an idea which I want to make it real. I have produced a prototype with my brother who is a product designer and now we are hoping that this idea will be funded to take it to the next step - production. 

Once it reaches its target, we will put it on production line. We will try our best to monitor the timeline of production and our goal is to meet delivery date. If anything happened unexpectedly, delay, we will keep all backers posted. If the goal is met earlier than the deadline, we may ship it to you well before the delivery date.
story_txt:
Never drop your smartphone again when taking pictures and videos. PHOTOG's ergonomic grip lets you hold the smartphone one-handed - safely. 
The physical DSLR shutter button works seamlessly with smartphone's default camera app via bluetooth. The detachable grip is also a remote shutter button and a charger. 
This small gadget in your pocket will change your smartphone photography experience forever. 

Key Features: 
Smart mount. Stretch to fit any size of smartphones of any brands. 
Hot shoe.  Adapt light and microphone. 
Shutter button. Works directly with smartphone's default camera app via blue-tooth. (No need to work with an extra app)
Grip. Hold one-handed for a genuine DSLR feeling. 
           Also works as charger. 
           Detachable as remote shuttle release button. 


 
Recommended by leading lifestyle magazine:

 
Who are the creators?
Veteran photographer and filmmaker Don Ng is the creator of PHOTOG. He teams up with his brother Jacky Ng who happens to be an awards-winning product and toy designer and his colleague system engineer Jackie Lee to create PHOTOG. 
An ideal add-on should be easy to carry, safe and comfortable to hold with one palm, light-weight, ready-to-go. That is the way we create PHOTOG.

More...
Taking pictures and videos consumes smartphone battery fast. PHOTOG's grip is also a 3000 mAh charger to keep your smartphone more substainable without connecting an extra mobile charger. Isn't it cool!
The adjustable ring makes sure the mount tightly holds smartphones in different size from different brands, NOT just for iPhone. PHOTOG is friendly with all major smartphones: iPhone, Samsung, LG, Huawei, Xiaomi.   


 

 


Q&A
 
Does PHOTOG fit any size of smartphone from all brands?
Yes. we design PHOTOG in a way to fit all size from iPhone SE to iPhone X to Samsung Edge to Huawei Mate series.
Do I have to remove my phone case to mount PHOTOG?
No.
Do I have to download an app in order to use the shutter release button?
No. Just pair PHOTOG's bluetooth with your smartphone and use smartphone's default camera app.
Apart from black, do you offer other colors?
At this stage, we will only produce black PHOTOG. 
 
PEAKS

----------------------------------------

----------------------------------------

----------------------------------------

 
Risks and challenges
PHOTOG is just an idea which I want to make it real. I have produced a prototype with my brother who is a product designer and now we are hoping that this idea will be funded to take it to the next step - production. 
Once it reaches its target, we will put it on production line. We will try our best to monitor the timeline of production and our goal is to meet delivery date. If anything happened unexpectedly, delay, we will keep all backers posted. If the goal is met earlier than the deadline, we may ship it to you well before the delivery date.

story:
(If cannot visit the Youtube, here is  another video link.)

Short Summary

    I am an electronics maker and a member of the Xinchejian hacker space in Shanghai.

    As a maker, the Arduino UNO is a must-have tool. ISP and FTDI add-ons are frequently necessary when designing new boards or making some stuffs. So I integrated them into the UNO board. I also made some improvements on the UNO. 

    UNO++ is suitable for both the experienced user and for beginners, combining ease of use with the ability to perform more advanced tasks without requiring more parts. 

    Since the UNO++ is based on Arduino UNO, it is also open hardware. 

    I have made a prototype of UNO++. I really appreciate your help in making this project happen. 


About the UNO++

A, Overview:  UNO++ = UNO + FTDI(USB to Serial) + ISP programmer

             

B, Features:

      It has 3 modes: Normal, FTDI and ISP. I have modified the code of ATMEGA16U2, so that you can set up those modes by Serial Monitor instead of using switches.

1, Normal Mode:

       In normal mode, UNO++ is an Arduino-UNO compatible board. The differences are as follows:

  • When uploading to UNO++, the RX header pin is disconnected from the ATMEGA328. So you don't need to unplug your serial module from the header to upload programs to UNO++.
  • It is possible to enable and disable RESET-EN to ATMEGA328 via the Serial Monitor. There is no need to cut any trace or solder pads. 
  • A "Base-Board" is included. Attach it to cover the spiky pins on the bottom of the UNO++. 

2, FTDI Mode

     UNO++ can be used as a USB to Serial device.  Arduino Pro Mini, LilyPad, etc can be connected directly to the FTDI socket.

3, ISP Mode

    UNO++ uses the stk500v1 protocol to program AVR Mega chips. You can even program the bootloader into UNO++'s own ATMEGA328 by looping back an ISP cable, as the ATMEGA16U2 works independently from the ATMEGA328. 

C, Setting:  use Serial Monitor to configure settings       

D, Technical Specs:  (Same with Arduino UNO)

  • Microcontroller: Atmega328P@16MHz & Atmega16U2
  • Operating Voltage: 5V
  • Input Voltage (recommended): 7-12V
  • Digital I/O Pins:14 (of which 6 provide PWM output)
  • PWM Digital I/O Pins: 6
  • Analog Input Pins: 6


What We Need

The funding goal is based on a minimum production quantity of 100 units.  Money raised will be used to begin the manufacturing process.


What You Get

UNO++ including the Base-Board. For more information, see Perks. 

Note: There is an additional shipping fee that will added during checkout.


TimeLine


Risks & Challenges

The prototype of UNO++ has been tested for over a month and has been updated to version 2. However, there could always be a little risk in manufacturing. But, I have been working with the factory for over a year, and I believe the risk can be controlled. 


Special Thanks to

Hacker Space:  Xinchejian， Mushroom Cloud

Friends: Chris, Sean, Jose, Ricky, Drink and ...

story:
Short Summary

We are Ignition, probably the best 3rd Party AppStore for iOS. We were the first to upload the Electra Multi Path and the first to be recommended by Coolstar the creator of Electra himself.

Ignition have finally decided to bring the users some simple merchandise that they have asked for. That merchandise would be cases! We have decided to go with the Apple Silicone style cases with the same quality but for an affordable price.

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need $500 to get our first 200 cases.
  • By supporting our campaign you get the case and you also get a personalised letter when your case is delivered. 
  • If we do not reach our goal all funds go directly back into Ignition and making it better for everybody.

The Impact

  • By supporting our campaign you'll be helping us provide you with great cases but for a great price whilst still helping Ignition.

Risks & Challenges

  • During the process of creating the cases we will have to continuously talk with our suppliers to try and get the best pricing to keep the price of the cases down.
  • We have experience dealing with wholesalers and working them down to a reasonable price.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't support our campaign directly you can always try the following!

  • Spread the word! Make some noise about our campaign!
  • You can also use the Indigogo share tools to help!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
My Bio

  • I'm in 8th grade and I love science, enginering, and making devices in general
  • I joined Y.E.A (Young Entrepreneurs Academy) to help me with the distrabution and creation of DFault Disconnected Headphones

What I Need & What You'll Get

  • 100%  OF THE FUNDS WILL GO TO THE PROJECT NO IFS, ANDS, OR BUTS!
  • If you donate $21 or more you get your headphones early.

The Impact You Make When You Donate

I don't have much money so any donation will help the project more than anything else 

  • The second I get a 3D printer I will start a livestream of the progress

My Risks & Challenges

My biggest problem is funds because I don't have access to a 3D printer

  • I know how to make designs/models for the printer.
  • Even if you don't donate I will gradually earn money for a 3D printer. However if I get funds the I need I can start making the headphones faster

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help!

  • If you want to it wauld be awesome to share this page or just spread the word.

Thanks!

story:
Introduction

Why must Gopro all look the same?


HI GOPRO LOVERS,
After a decade, our favourite action camera brand Gopro is still...... yes , transparent. That's when we come in.
Chroma is a company that specializes in casing for your Gopro cameras! Being waterproof and made of strong durable materials !  Don't be afraid to give your Gopro a little splash of personality and character! Take it out on your suction cup, chest harness, helmet and show it off to your friends!

Don't you wish your Gopro had these on? Im sure they do!
Chroma Case has a beautiful matte finish texture that comes in an assortment of colours for your own personalization! Helps to identify your gears too!

Key Features

We take our Gopro almost everywhere we go, swimming, cycling, jumping off a cliff or even skydiving. These gears go into some seriously tough conditions! 
Fret Not! Chroma Cases are MEANT to protect your camera gears everywhere you go. They are as hard as housing Gopro has made(Material :PC ) 
And yes, they're waterproof as well!
Color Scheme


Take note that every chroma case COMES with an audio skeleton backdoor & waterproof bacdoor! So you can mix and match for different color combinations!

Looks great huh?Oh yeah, one more thing. Power On and WIFI light still remains visible even with CHROMA!

Warranty

We ensure a 1 to 1 exchange for ALL our CHROMA CASES for a period of one year since purchase date! That's how much we trust our manufacturers to protect our lovely action camera.

Compatibility



Chroma Cases are designed to fit all recent  Gopro Hero models! ( Sorry Session Fans, till next time)  Hero 3, 3+ and 4!
Never leave your Gopro in those old transparent boring housing anymore!
Packaging

Each Chroma Case is shipped in a black gift box wrapped in a black dust bag.
So you know your Chroma Case and Backdoors are safe!
TEAM

- 5 years of experience in Fashion and Marketing Field.

-Had a dream.

-Need you guys to make this a reality.

TIMELINE
Where are we in development?
 We have just recently settled on our new prototype design specifications and is working to see how we can improve this for our own customer's satisfaction. We will keep you guys updated.

HELP US MAKE THE WORLD'S COOLEST CAMERA A LITTLE BIT COOLER: 

Here’s how you can support our campaign and be the first to own a CHROMA CASE for your Gopro.

1) Select a perk on the right hand side to start your order.

2) Continue onto the next page to enter shipping information followed by payment details.

3) Complete payment via Paypal or using your Credit Debit Card.

4) Your CHROMA CASE will be dispatched when our campaign ends. We can't wait to deliver it to you.

Thanks so much in advance to everyone who supports our campaign!

WHERE DOES THE MONEY GOES?

We have come so close to reaching our reality, all we need is you to help us with the last inch. Our manufacturers are all set and ready to go!

WHAT HAPPENS IF WE REACH OUR GOAL?
We will raise the bar, using new materials, colours, finishes and release sport series cases for you sport enthusiast! So help us achieve our goal!

FAQ

How easy to install CHROMA?
As easy as 1,2,3! The same way you open your Gopro!
Does it fit other Gopro Bacdoors?
Yes it does! LCD, Battery Backdoor and etc.
Does it fit other Hero models?
Chroma Cases fits Hero models 3, 3+ and 4. 
How long will it take to ship?
Our manufacturers and us are working hand in hand to help deliver this by 2016!
How can I contact you?
Any business enquiries will be reachable at chausjah@yahoo.com, we will get back to you ASAP!
What other possibilities will there in the future?
We will definitely bring out more fresh, exciting new materials for production! 
So please give us your support!
Can you tell us more about the production process?

Our manufacturer is ready to push the production to new heights at the end of the campaign. The last inch are from you guys!

story:
Hi!

My name is Dirk, you might remember me from the TOHKBD project or the FunkyOtherHalf shop. I am a hardware developer that makes all sorts of fun/functional/funky gadgets for the Jolla phone.

This is me:



Jolla has now made a beautiful tablet and I want to make a carbonfiber casing for it. Carbonfiber is awesome! It looks great and offers great protection. Keep it light, keep it sporty, keep it Funky!


The idea

The tablet is beautiful, but as with all other tablets it has a very large glass area which makes it vulnerable to scratches and cracking. Without a strong protective casing it is a bad plan to throw it in your backpack with all your other stuff.

Things like charging cables, pens, other electronics or even books can put concentrated loads on the screen which can easily crack a screen. Having a strong casing covering the screen with a soft inner lining will remove all the concentrated loads, by absorbing a lot of the force and spreading it over a large surface area.


During use you can easily slide of the casing and put it in the normal position, exposing the screen. Due to the flat surface on the back, placing it on rough surfaces will certainly scratch the back panel. Not good. Slap a casing around it and you can place it down anywhere.

Being able to carry the tablet around with you  and use it wherever without worries increases the functionality and will guarantuee a longer life without cracks and scratches.

Sounds good right? And as an added bonus it also looks awesome!


The Construction

The casing is made from 5 layers of 200gram/m2 cloth with a twill weave. 

This is laminated using epoxy resin with a 'wet lay up' method. This is a fancy term for 'lay down the carbon by hand, pour the epoxy from a cup, distribute it evenly with your creditcard and go over it will a paintroller to sqeeze out the air'.

A plastic sheet is tensioned over the wet laminate and tensioned by hand. Small air bubbles under the plastic are removed by going over it again with a roller.



pictures from early prototype mold and laminate


The finished laminate is about 1 mm thick. This is left to dry for several hours.
 

The part is released from the mold, a CNC-mill is used to cut the outline and camera/speaker holes, the edges are sanded by hand, the sides of the laminate are sealed and the velvet layer is applied on the inside.


What We Need & What You Get

For the 'mass-production' of a carbonfiber part I need:

  • Multiple molds, since it takes hours for epoxy to cure
  • All sorts of pneumatic stuff to hook up a lot of vacuumbags
  • Lots of tools for milling and sanding down the parts
  • Spraypainting tools for finishing layers
  • Enough orders to get to bulk ordering carbon and epoxy

What you get

You will get a carbonfiber/epoxy casing with a nice satin finish. Rounded edges and soft velvet inner coating to prevent scratches.

The casing slides on from the top or bottom and it totally reversible, so you can use it as a heavy duty screen protector as well as a regular casing!

Your tablet will look awesome and you will be the local hero with your sporty techy look.


Shipping

Shipping comes with tracking! You will get a notification from the postal service when the casing is shipped and you can track the progress of the shipment via the link provided by them.

Multiple casings can be shipped in one package, so if you want one (or two or three) more you can select 'Extra Casing'. That way you only have to pay for the shipment once.


Development

The Casing is under continuous development during this campaign. You can follow this and share your ideas here: talk.maemo.org.

Depending on the success of the campaign I can develop and try more things.

If the goal is doubled, I could for instance do one of the following:
- add different materials (carbonkevlar/alutex/kevlar/glass)
- change to infusion instead of wet layup (stronger, lighter, but more expensive)
- make custom cutouts
- custom  velvet lining colour
- outsource production to speed things up


The Impact

It would have been possible to sell this via my regular shop funkyotherhalf.com, but the amount of tooling for this projects is considerably higher.

I need to:
- build multiple molds. more molds, faster production.
- arrange a CNC machine to be able to mill the casings
- be able to do bulk ordering on carbonfiber cloth and epoxy
- get a bucketload of coffee (+20% stamina) and buy bread (+10% mana)

To be able to afford this, I need this campaign to make it a reality. Treat yourself you a fancy and functional casing to protect your tablet and support me to develop more Funky stuff!


coffee will we consumed in high quantities from this mug



Risks & Challenges

At this start of the campaign, the design is ready, but open for debate and improvement. There is a lot of tooling to be done though to change the production from one-offs to pumping them out by the tens at a time.

The production of products in these quantities is something I gained a lot of experience with during the TOHKBD project. Carbonfiber and other composites is something I worked and played with for years, and I am confident about the production of this product.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you want to help in the project or have a question, you can come to talk.maemo.org, ask me anything on IRC or send me an email at info at funkyotherhalf.com, or use the contact form on my site.

    The Casing is under continuous development during this campaign. You can follow this and share your ideas here: talk.maemo.org.
Depending on the success of the campaign I can develop and try more things. 
If the goal is doubled, I could for instance do one of the following:- add different materials (carbonkevlar/alutex/kevlar/glass)- change to infusion instead of wet layup (stronger, lighter, but more expensive)- make custom cutouts- custom  velvet lining colour- outsource production to speed things up

The ImpactIt would have been possible to sell this via my regular shop funkyotherhalf.com, but the amount of tooling for this projects is considerably higher. I need to:- build multiple molds. more molds, faster production.- arrange a CNC machine to be able to mill the casings- be able to do bulk ordering on carbonfiber cloth and epoxy- get a bucketload of coffee (+20% stamina) and buy bread (+10% mana)To be able to afford this, I need this campaign to make it a reality. Treat yourself you a fancy and functional casing to protect your tablet and support me to develop more Funky stuff!coffee will we consumed in high quantities from this mug
Risks & Challenges
At this start of the campaign, the design is ready, but open for debate and improvement. There is a lot of tooling to be done though to change the production from one-offs to pumping them out by the tens at a time.The production of products in these quantities is something I gained a lot of experience with during the TOHKBD project. Carbonfiber and other composites is something I worked and played with for years, and I am confident about the production of this product.    Other Ways You Can HelpIf you want to help in the project or have a question, you can come to talk.maemo.org, ask me anything on IRC or send me an email at info at funkyotherhalf.com, or use the contact form on my site.

story:
Short Summary


Tempr is the first social sharing app to #hashtag your friends. Tempr enables like-minded people to connect with their friends to :

  • #hashtag your friends,
  • vote for best #hashtags 
  • discover your best #hashtags,
  • comment,
  • share photo & video,
  • and much more.

Tempr was conceived by 4 co-founders who strongly believe that people have more #qualities than they think, and they deserve to be known. 


-- Join our community, it's going to be so great! #YouAreAmazing --


What We Need 


The beta iOS app is currently in end of development, available in june-july. The additional funding will help start the android version and cover marketing and promotions. There is a lot of great perks for those who contribute to this ground breaking project - See the What You Get Section


The Impact


The Tempr  app is important because we want to redefine social sharing in a positive way. There should be a central location where people who wish to participate in constructive dialog can may realize through stories that they have more qualities than they think. To give #hashtags to friends is a way to share your opinion about this friend. Finally, you'll feel better by seeing all the positive that your friends think of you and showing all the positive that you think about your friends. - Without being annoyed by privacy issues, ads or media -. Tempr app, it’s just about you and your friends. 


Share friends #qualities through a story, vote for #qualities of other friends, find out your most loved #qualities of your friends and yourself. 


Risks & Challenges


The greatest challenge was brainstorming with our team of beta testers to insure a safe app : no bashing, no cyberbullying, etc. It’s now a 100% positive app with a caring spirit. You are just with your friends, nothing anonymous; there is no gossip or rumors. It’s safe and the beta iOS app is working well. For Android version, we have to work on the design to propose a 100% Android compliant app. 


-- Join our community, it's going to be so great! #YouAreAmazing --

What You Get

OMG, many personalised things! Benjamin, our designer, worked hard to provide you high class perks. Thanks Benjamin :)

A ticket to remember you were part of the beginning ! Thanks to be here :)

--

Get your Tempr' background for your profile according to your status. A way to be #different as a contributor of Tempr' story. You support us, you deserve it :)

--

Dedicated Tempr' badges for each status, starting #Pioneer! 


--

Every morning, get coffee or tea using your personalised mug with your most appreciated #qualities on it. Yeah dude, that's the way I want to start! 

--

So #sweet, you can receive #personalised  & #original postcards from Paris, with your own #qualities loved on Tempr. Are you romantic? Here we are !

--


Personalised women & men T-Shirts with your own #qualities received on Tempr app. You have packages with 1, 3, 6 or 12 T-shirts. All different, all personalised, all #unique as you are. Show to the world you are unique with many #qualities and style. #Stunning !

Also, you can like our Facebook Fan Pages : join us !

story:
Hello everyone.

My name is Elad and I'm the founder of "I-TECH-E inspiring tech education".

my company as been operating for several years now providing  technological education for children.

The FLEBOT is, I hope, the first of a line of products specifically designed for children.

The FLEBOT helps to teach children the basics of mechanics in a fun and creative way. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

  

 

 

 

Risks & Challenges

The FLEBOT is ready for production.

story:
SurfBoard is a mouse and keyboard device that doesn't require you to press anything to switch modes. SurfBoard can be used wired or wirelessly and is completely customizable via our free Windows software. Use it to create your own macro-function keys and pair it with multiple devices simultaneously. Use a standard keyboard layout or create your own for your most commonly used functions. Use Auto CAD or Illustrator a lot and have to constantly use keyboard shortcuts? Program them into SurfBoard with your own custom layout and increase your efficiency. From simple pointing and text input to complex application functions, SurfBoard can be used with a variety of devices including your PC, smartphone, tablet, and smartTV. With SurfBoard, the possibilities are endless and totally up to you. 

Combine the functions of your mouse, touchpad, keyboard, remote control all into one easy to use and completely customizable device. 



The mouse and keyboard are physically separated so it minimizes the risk of pressing keys by accident and no need to press a button or perform a gesture to switch back and forth. All pointing and texting can be done from a single device with just one hand. 

Control computing devices without keeping both of your hands busy and without needing to move back and forth between your mouse and keyboard.


Uniform haptic feedback

Other devices on the market don't have uniform haptic feedback and pressure points vary across devices. Successful development of SurfBoard has created a uniform device with a larger surface area than that of a standard external trackpad. 


Take advantage of web surfing from your PC or smartphone with simple and easy to use pointing, scrolling, and input controls.


Internal testing of SurfBoard for design applications showed that almost all functions and shortcuts could be completed with a single hand increasing work efficiency by 10-15%.



Use the surface of SurfBoard as a trackpad while also being able to type at the same time without having to move your hand back and forth from your mouse and keyboard. Browse the web, watch your favorite clips all without having to move your hand between your peripherals. 


For users with more advanced needs such as 3D design applications, SurfBoard can be programmed using our custom Windows software to use with complex design applications like CAD, Excel, Illustrator, Premiere, etc. 


SurfBoard's clicking features perform precisely like a standard trackpad in addition to customizable gestures like undo/redo or even drawing on your PC with a stylus.


SurfBoard delivers a portable computing experience and can be used anywhere you go.


Your standard remote control makes using your smart TV cumbersome because there's no easy way to move the cursor around or type. Use SurfBoard as a smart remote with your IPTV. You can customize the surface to have an assigned pointing area, separate key input, and even gestures for volume adjustment or channel surfing.



Our Windows based software allows customized surface layouts for macro functions, custom gesture areas, etc. 
You can set specific keys, functions, shortcuts, gesture areas for just about anything. Here are some examples of other applications that SurfBoard can already be used with and have been personally tested out by us. 

Other application uses









Colors


Prototype Photos










  • What are the color options?

        - SurfBoard will be offered in black or white, but may depend on the the ratio of              color requests we receive from backers.

  • How can I connect to SurfBoard?

         - SurfBoard can be connected via micro-USB (PC > SurfBoard), USB                                 (smartphone/tablet > SurfBoard), or Bluetooth (AA batteries). The device                   comes with both a micro-USB port and USB port to connect to a variety of                   devices.

  • Can I use it wirelessly if the batteries run out?

         - You can use a micro-USB cable to continue to power the device (wall our                       external battery) and continue to use the device wirelessly from the device                   you are controlling. (power supply - cable / control - bluetooth)

  • How do I customize SurfBoard?

         - We will be providing Windows based software available through our website.               Through a USB connection to your SurfBoard, you will be able create and                     upload new layouts directly to your device and takes about 1 to 2 minutes per             upload depending on data size.

  • Does the standard layout support multiple languages?

         - English is supported by default. We can provide layouts in Korean by request.             However, other languages will be supported as well. We will add additional                   languages as we go, but additional optimization tests will be necessary to find             the optimal layers.

  • What is the warranty?

         - 1 year

  • What is the shipping costs?

         - Shipping is included in the perk costs and is expected to commence                                 beginning in July, 2016.

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Are you literally attached to your old charger? 

Annoyed by cable fuss while trying to use your smartphone? Or do you just hate ugly cables and chargers that clash with your carefully designed interior? We got you.

This is QUBE. The First wireless charger & powerbank. Design & technology fused into one.

 


Dual Wireless charging  powered by ZENS® 

The QUBE base element as well as the top provides fast and secure charging for all Qi compatible devices such as:

  • iPhone 8, iPhone 8 Plus, iPhone X, iPhone Xs, iPhone Xs Max, iPhone XR,  
  • Samsung Galaxy: S10 Plus, S10, S10e, Note 9, S9, S9+, Note 8, S8, S8+, S7, S7 Edge  (Plus more devices)
  • And all other Qi compatible devices. 

 


The QUBE top holds a 10w fast charger combined with a powerful battery pack that can charge an iPhone X up to 4 times. While using the QUBE’s top for a quick charge at your favourite spot you can simultaneously charge another device on the QUBE’s base. 

The QUBE’s top ‘powerbank’ will recharge when the base and top are fused together again. Making it possible to simultaneously charge your device on top as well as the powerbank itself.

 

 

Tired of bending over the couch to only get a glimpse of a charging cable? 

Finding out the adapter was plugged out again… but foremost tired of having ugly cables and chargers mess up the interior design plan. 

We reckon, we are not the only ones. 

 

 

Say no to cable clutter. 

No matter how you slice it, we still need cables to get devices powered up.  Our frustration brought on by unsightly consumer electronics led us to the design of the QUBE.  

 


We envisioned an interior design object, and went one step beyond.

We created a product that can charge your tech and be beautiful at the same time. The best of both worlds. Not only can you save your battery and stay clutter-free, you can also save space. We’ve designed it to be able to charge anywhere within your home, for your smartphone, air pods and even a smart watch. 

That is true design!  

 

Our QUBE fits all USB power supplies

We ship our QUBE with a long braided USB power cable that can be plugged into any USB power supply like a computer, USB power adapter or wall socket with integrated USB port. Excluding the power supply makes the product truly international and earth-friendly. 
 


MANU X ZENS® 

Our partnership with A-brand and CE market leader ZENS®  makes the QUBE not only powerful and reliable but also extremely fast. QUBE is officially Qi and Apple licenced and based on over 15 years of experience in wireless charging technology. Qi is the standard for charging smartphones and other peripherals that require wireless power. 

QUBE is a unique collaboration where interior design and technology invigorate.

Tech specs, charge fast, simultaneously and safe

Both QUBE elements uses smart technology that auto-detects your device’s input. So it’s always charging at maximum speed. Over-current, over-voltage, and foreign object detection ensures complete safety for you and your devices.

The QUBE base holds a 5W wireless charger which fully powers an iPhone X within 3.5 hours.

The QUBE’s top 10W fast wireless charger fully chargers the iPhone X within 2 hours and combined with a powerful battery pack can fully charge an iPhone X up to 5 times.  

The QUBE top ‘powerbank’ will recharge when the base and top are fused together again. Making it possible to simultaneously charge your device on top as well as the powerbank itself.
 

 

Remember the magic of playing with wooden blocks as a child? A cube has an amazing form factor with symmetry depicted from whichever direction you look at it.  You can build amazing structures with a cube and is therefore the base of any foundation.

 

 

Most ideas start with a problem. But once we managed to turn that insight into a proposition the sketching started. 

 

 

Once we figured out the formfactor of what later became QUBE we started making a lot of basic mock ups. Shaping these from foam block was easier than 3d printing.

 

 

In the final phase of the design we upgraded the prototypes to 3d prints. The first came out of our own printer. Later we also outsourced the printing to a more refined model maker.

 

We now have finished the whole design, engineering phase and finished tooling. We are expecting First out of Tool samples end of July 2019. 

UPDATE August 2019: We received first out of tool samples of all parts. It is amazing to see the QUBE built from actual manufactured parts instead of 3d prototyped parts. Next phase will be adding texture to tooling and getting the right blue color.  

 


Why order your MANU QUBE?

Become a pioneer of remarkable technology by owning a MANU QUBE, making a statement of tasteful design and functionality.  Usher in the age of a better living environment for you and others with a QUBE wireless fast charger and power bank. The QUBE serves as an attractive centerpiece in your living space, and a conversation piece when out and about.  

Order now and be one of our very first proud QUBE consumers during the introductory phase, which will facilitate our first production run.  Price per product is reflective of the tooling investments that we implemented for the QUBE. On-time shipping for this fantastic product is available to all our backers in the US and EU regions, and many more will be added in the near future.

 

Will you help us out?

Like any other business we need the support of our customers. We created MANU QUBE for you to enjoy and you can trust us when we say "This will be the best charger you have ever owned". Keep you posted... Hendrik & Edo

 


For media requests:

info@manu.nl

On-time shipping for this fantastic product is available to all our backers in the US and EU regions, and many more will be added in the near future. Will you help us out?Like any other business we need the support of our customers. We created MANU QUBE for you to enjoy and you can trust us when we say "This will be the best charger you have ever owned". Keep you posted... Hendrik & Edo For media requests:info@manu.nl

story:
USB DAC for Macbook, Nexus phones using the new Type-C plug

Hifimediy have been making affordable audio equipment since 2010 and we have had great success with our popular Sabre DACs including the Android dac which connects directly to the microUSB plug of Android devices.

We've recently received some enquires about making a DAC with the new USB Type-C connector and we thought this could be a good opportunity to have you guys decide if this is a something we should go ahead with.


The new type C plug is the biggest update to USB since USB was first launched and it's now starting to be used on phones and computers. 

This DAC will connect without any adaptors to the new Nexus phones, the new Macbook and any other computer using Type-C USB ports.

The DAC

Hifime are making a new Sabre 9018 DAC that will feature the ESS Sabre 9018 chip at a very affordable price! The DAC will be available with the regular USB plug for sure, so this campaign is just a chance to get it with Type-C plug.

We have picked the most important features to include in this DAC to be able to make a incredible sounding DAC at this low price. The most important parts in a DAC is the DAC chip, the headphone driver (if any), the power supply and the circuit. We are using a great sounding pair (ES9018k2m DAC+SABRE9601 driver) and have added extra noise reducing capacitors to smoothen the USB power. 

It will come in this new nice looking plastic case which is still simple and keeping cost down.


Features

  • Sabre ES9018k2m DAC chip and SABRE9601 headphone and line out driver
  • Works and sound great with most headphone (including low impedance IEM and high impedance headphones) and all line level devices (preamps, amplifiers)
  • No drivers required for Windows, Mac, Linux, Android, iPhones
  • Accepts 32kHz, 44.1kHz, 48kHz, 88.2kHz and 96kHz
  • Volume controlled by computer vol +/- keys
  • Optical output
  • 122dB SNR 
  • 110dB THD+N: 2Vrms @ 600 ohm load
  • 100dB THD+N: 30mW @ 32 ohm load
  • 40-80 mA power usage (depends on volume and sample rate)
  • Dimensions: 5.5 x 3.5 x 1.8 cm (without cable)
  • Weight 30 gram

The Sabre 9018 DAC can play any format (MP3, AIFF, FLAC etc) from CD quality up to 96kHz and 24 bit. It does not support 196k or 384kHz natively, nor does it play DSD files. Why? Most people does not have 192/384/DSD files. You do not benefit from a 384kHz capable DAC when playing CD quality (or high resolution 96kHz) files. If you need a 192kHz/384kHz/DSD DAC then we have other options for you. We have intentionally omitted this for all of our customers that don’t play 384kHz/DSD so you can save and get a better sounding CD quality DAC.

I thought higher resolution is better??

If you have bough high resolution 192kHz or 384kHz files then yes it is better to have a DAC capable of decoding 192/384kHz without downsampling. If you play CD’s, MP3, FLAC, Apple lossless, Spotify, Tidal high resolution etc then you will not benefit from a 192/384kHz capable DAC.

The benefits of 96/24 include:

  • No drivers required!
  • Responds to system volume level in detailed 64 steps
  • It works with the USB isolator to further reduce noise from the computer and improve clarity and sound quality
  • Don’t pay extra for what you don’t need

How you can help

We need to order several thousands of the Type-C cables. As this is a new plug it is fairly expensive at this time.

If we receive enough preorders then we will go ahead with it and take the chance that we'll sell the remaining eventually. 

All preorders are shipped first with registered mail.

As we have already started making the DAC, we will be able to order the type C cables and finish them quickly. It will be ready in January about 3 weeks after the campaign end.

The Impact

You can be one of the first to get a USB type C DAC for your Nexus or Macbook ! 

USB type C is for sure a great step forward and although you can use an adaptor instead of a native cable it's very convenient to plug it directly.

Any risks?

The DAC is already in production. If there is not enough interest for the type C plug, then we are still making the same DAC with the normal USB plug and you can consider getting it instead.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please spread the word to your audiophile friends with new Nexus phones, new Macbooks or other laptops with the type C USB!
