story:
Perfect if you care about your health and protecting your precious iPhone

We thought holding something to your mouth, ears and face that is dirtier than a toilet seat, a rail on public transport, door handles or the soles of your shoes is a little... gross. Fact is, on average, all these items are cleaner than your smartphone.  

Antibacterial case & glass screen

PureCase is the first antibacterial case AND glass screen that protects you from germs and your iPhone (5/5S and 6) from drops and scratches. Both, the durable casing and ultra-thin glass screen protector have been enriched with microsilver particles, which are naturally antibacterial.


Health & hygiene

Did you know that our phones often have fecal bacteria, E.coli and other pathogens on them? We felt that having a clean phone should be like washing hands or having regular showers – normal. Of course there are also a lot of your own, healthy skin bacteria on your phone but it's those harmful pathogens that cause illnesses and that we want to contain. And not to mention that keeping personal items clean could also help you, your family, your kids or people with weak immune systems fight of nasty colds that go round school or circulate around the subway with all the sneezing folks.

Dropping, breaking, scratching...

But the case and glass screen aren’t just for germaphobes, health workers or frequent travellers, the focus is very much also on functionality and design. Our smartphone is one of the most used item each day, we activate it more than 150 times. 

We don’t just take our phones everywhere including bathrooms, we drop them while out jogging or throw them in our handbags or pockets with keys in. We give them to our kids and often they end up skidding over sidewalks or other unpleasant surfaces. The result: broken screens, scratched up cases and expensive repairs (if at all possible). Ouch. Totally unnecessary heart-ache when this is so easily avoided with PureCase & Screen at a fraction of the cost. PureCase will safe us clumsy multi-taskers from misery, 

Verena, one of our friends immediately put one of our prototypes to the test: „I accidently dropped my brand new iPhone 6 while out for a run. I’d had it for 3 days and luckily put on the case and glass screen the day before. The glass broke but my iPhone screen didn’t. Already worth every cent.“

Air bubbles good-bye

Remember those annoying air bubbles from cling film-like plastic screen protectors? You can say good-bye to those. The PureCase glass screen is extremely thin, really easy to apply and feels just like the original glass underneath. It is equally touch sensitive as your iPhone's touch screen underneath and you won’t even notice it's there. It not only gives your smartphone an extra layer of protection from drops and scratches but is of course also antibacterial - because your touch screen is where it matters most!

Simple, stylish, state of the art

PureCase puts the focus on the classy gadget itself, in this case the iPhone 5/5S and 6. It doesn't distract from the precious Apple design, which is what people are willing to spend hundreds of dollars on. That’s why both case and glass screen protector are available in transparent and anthracite / graphite only. State of the art polyurethane and tempered glass both enriched with micro silver technology give you that extra layer of protection.

Who we are

We are a bunch of good friends (3 guys, 1 girl) centered around our „mastermind“ Moritz. We are from Munich in Germany (Oktoberfest, rings a bell?) and Salzburg in Austria (if Sound of Music and Mozart mean anything to you...). We’ve always wanted to do something together, which we started discussing at various nights out over our favourite drink gin & tonic. Go figure. And because we have always been very entrepreneurial minded, Moritz eventually came up with the idea for PureCase. Sadly the occasion wasn't the happiest: a close friend was diagnosed with cancer and had to undergo chemotherapy, which really weakens the immune system. After learning about the amount of germs on our smartphones and considering how often we touch them - PureCase was born. Ever since we’ve been working our butts off, and can’t look at subway rails, door knobs or our iPhones the same way. You can learn more about each team member further below. 

Basti (top left), Kurt (top middle) and Verena (bottom left) are good friends who helped us with the video shoot and other grass-root stuff. The PureCase team: Alexis (top right), Moritz (bottom middle) and Martin (bottom right) - the fourth member, Catherine, unfortunately isn't in the photo.

What We Need & What You Get

We’ve invested our initial funds and a lot of time in testing the casing, glass screen and antibacterial micro silver coating. All that’s now ready for tooling and mass production. We  now have super cool prototypes but to order the first batch of products we need your help.

Perks

We’ve got some special perks for you in store. Besides our „Early Birds“ at 30% discount for our first 100 supporters, we’ve also included some travel perks for our high rollers. A week at an exclusive apartment in Salzburg or Vienna – how about making the most of these once in a lifetime opportunities? We are excited to meet you.

What the money will be used for

(in order of priority)

  • Production tools
  • First product batch
  • First packaging batch
  • Website including shop system

The team

From left to right: Moritz, Alexis, Martin, Catherine

Moritz

Moritz has been working in the medical industry for 8 years. He’s specialized in project management and optimizing operational processes. Job description aside, he’s the hands-on, follow through, go-to guy that holds any project or business together.

Alexis

Alexis is our shiny and vibrant social media peacock. He loves to connect people and creating win-win situations. He’s also the „doer“ and can turn ideas into reality faster than you can press „like“ on Facebook.

Martin

Tell Martin about an idea and he’ll see a finished video in his head. He’s our visual artist and video production guy with a vivid eye for detail, patience and stamina that will knock out a bull on steroids.

Catherine

Catherine sees the bigger picture. Never shy of a vision to change the world she can pull together a mind blowing strategy from a few notes on a piece of napkin and get started on exciting the world about it. PR, marketing and content are her home turf.

The vision (for the future)

"We want to create something that not only aids everyday personal hygiene but also protects people's precious high-tech investments, without distracting from the beautifully designed product underneath." Which is why PureCase & Screen is just the first product... let's see what's next. We would also like to offer PureCase for Samsung owners and we will be looking into other gadgets like iPads/tablets too. Another idea would be to focus on applications in the health industry like in hospitals or pharmacies to protect people with weak immune systems. We'd love to hear your thoughts and ideas.

Other Ways You Can Help

We really appreciate any help at all, any contribution, may it be financial, or a share, like, tweet on your social media networks, you telling your Mum and Dad about us or auntie Ruth, any word of mouth, mention or article will be a valued addition to our project.

If you have any questions or want to get in contact, email us at info@purecase.net


FAQs


PURCHASING & SHIPPING

How do I choose my iPhone model and PureCase color?

Once you have purchased a perk, go to www.purecase.net/color enter the email address that you registered for Indiegogo and select your model and color. We can’t process or ship your order until you have finished the order process by selecting both.

When will I receive my PureCase?

Our aim is to start delivering soon after the campaign finishes (mid June). However please be patient with us as we may have to make unforseen changes, tweeks and optimizations to the first batch of production.

Where do you ship to?

Worldwide.

Is shipping included?

Shipping is included for countries of the European Union, United States and Canada. All other countries please purchase the "Rest of the world shipping" perk of $ 5 on top of your regular perk.

Is PureCase available for Samsung?

Unfortunately the production tools for each type of case are incredibly expensive, which is why we are crowdfunding. We are starting with the case and glass screen for the iPhone 5/5S and 6 but as soon as we have enough funds we will aim to produce PureCase for Samsung too. If you want to stay up to date and get notified, subsribe to our newsletter on www.purecase.net 

Is there a warranty for PureCase & Screen?

We have done many tests and had great results when phones were dropped. Most times there was not a scratch on either PureCase & Screen or the phone underneath. Sometimes the PureCase glass screen protector broke but the iPhone screen was completely unharmed. So with proper use and care of your PureCase & Screen you will get an added layer of protection for your smartphone. However we can not be held responsible or liable for any damage to your phone in any shape or form (e.g. if it is dropped etc.).


PURECASE – CASE AND GLASS SCREEN

What material is the case made of?

It is synthetic, polyurethane to be more precise.

Can I attach the glass cover myself?

Of course you can. The cover comes with an alcoholic cleaning cloth and a micro-fabric cloth to remove dirt, stains and bacteria before you easily attach the glass screen to your iPhone display.

How stable is the glass screen?

The screen is made of glass, which means that if you drop your phone on a hard floor, the glass may break. However with the added layer of protection, your phone screen is much less likely to break.

Does the glass screen affect the touch functionality of my iPhone?

Not all all. The touch screen works exactly the same. In fact, it makes the screen feel even smoother.

Is the glass cover visible?

When you look really closely you might see the edges oft the glass cover. Overall, it is almost invisible and you won’t even feel it. 

Is PureCase waterproof?

No. As with most electronic devices, you should keep your phone away from water, with or without PureCase & Screen. Even though the case has protective covers for openings such as the head phone jack, water might still get in.


BACTERIA PROTECTION

How long will the antibacterial effect last?

The antibacterial effect has a life time of 40 years.

How does the protection work?

PureCase uses the highly effective micro silver technology. It is odorless and transparent, so you wont even notice it is there. 

Will my iPhone be completely free from bacteria?

The micro silver technology has a strong antibacterial impact. It is even effective against bacteria like MRSA, E-Coli or EHEC. It also eliminates odors created by bacteria. Although it is almost impossible to make anything completely free of bacteria, PureCase will SIGNIFICANTLY reduce the number of bacteria on your phone.

Will I never get sick again?

Unfortunately no one can guarantee you to never get sick again. What PureCase does is to limit the amount of bacteria you transfer from all sorts of sources e.g. door knobs, toilets or handrails onto your phone (your most often used item) and on to your face, hands, nose, mouth etc. PureCase therefore is an important part of daily personal hygiene just as washing your hands, cleaning your teeth or showering regularly is.

I hardly ever get sick – why would I need PureCase?

PureCase not only protects you from bacteria but also other people you interact with each day by limiting the transfer of bacteria. This especially helps people with weak immune systems. 

Does PureCase also protect me from good bacteria?

When you are a healthy person your body usually ensures that all good bacteria you need are there. PureCase protects you from spreading any kind of bacteria and it is harmful bacteria and pathogens that cause illnesses and that we want to contain. Just like showering or hand washing PureCase won’t throw your natural and good bacteria balance off course.

Antibacterial case & glass screen

story:
What is Oktopod Studio?

Oktopod Studio is a development platform for mechatronics, robotics and automation, which enables creating and controlling low voltage electronic devices, models and home applications /in an extremely simple way/.

Oktopod Studio enables students to meet the practical problems of a technical nature and to solve them. If students through simple technical systems understand the working principle of the sensor, LED lighting, actuators (motors), later they will be clear and principle of operation of complex technical systems. Here's the core of the Oktopod Studio, which introduces students to the world of Robotics and Mechatronics.


How Does It Work?

There are two parts of the system: The hardware unit Oktopod_Board and the software Oktopod_Control.


Hardware:  

Oktopod_Board presents a Programmable Logic Controller (PLC), which features plug and play inputs and outputs for connecting low voltage electronic devices, like: LED lights, DC & servo motors, electromagnets, switches, photo, temperature and magnetic sensors, and so on.


Tecnical characteristics:  

  • 8x Powerful analog output
  • 2x DC motor driver
  • 3x Servo motor driver
  • 4x Digital inputs (short circuit and over-voltage protection)
  • ATmega16 microcontroller
  • USB/Bluetooth communication module
  • Power supply input 6-12 V (reverse polarity protection)
  • On board 3 A fuse

Software:  

Oktopod_Control is an application for computers and mobile phones, which allows manual control and programming the board (currently for Windows and Android).

Manual mode: - the software can be used as a wireless remote control for the board, like a virtual dashboard! In this case the desired actions are executed in real time, by moving the sliders and pressing the buttons.


Programming: - enabled by unique, simplified creating “WishLists”. This is a unique, simplified way of programming. When the board is connected, you can set the desired output actions and to add them to your WishList. When all of the actions are added to your list, just DOWNLOAD or click PLAY, and watch what happens!

Of course you can also program the board  in C with your favorite IDE. 

Open Source 

All the design files and source codes will be made available on our website www.oktopodstudio.com/download/! So you will be able to develop your own applications, or customize the recent ones. 

We are excited to see your own projects built with hacking Oktopd Studio!

Mission and Vision  

Thinking and creating are one of the most important things in our life. By constructing robotic applications you can express yourself in a very unique and creative way. Expands the horizons!

Robotics connects  different fields and different people: artists with scientists, hobbyists with professionals, young with experienced... Our hope is to build a creative community, where people can share their projects and ideas, to discuss and to help each other.

What are the Funds For

We've finished the research, design, and prototyping. We were even able to try out Oktopod Studio in several schools and workshops. We are now prepared for manufacturing and shipping!

Production Plan

May: INDIEGOGO project Launch (36 day)

June: Agreements with manufacturing partners, ordering the tools and components.

July: Manufacturing begins

August: Testing of first production batch and preparing for shipping

September: All orders are shipped. Start to play!!!

 

International shipping costs are already included into our pledges, so you don't have to worry about it. Worldwide shipping is guaranteed!


Stretch goals

12.000 eur - more sensors and gadgets

15.000 eur - MikroE clicks and Arduino compatibility

20.000 eur - WiFi and BLE connectivity 

25.000 eur - Oktopod Mini: new mini board version


Perks

Discovery kit

The kit contains:

  • 1x Oktopod Board
  • 1x Bluetooth communication modules
  • 1x Mini servo motor
  • 1x DC motor + propeller
  • 1x Alarm-buzzer
  • 1x Traffic light PCB
  • 5x Color LEDs
  • 5x Resistors for the LEDs
  • 1x Light bulb 12V
  • 1x Photo-resistor
  • 1x NTC resistor (temperature sensor)
  • 1x Reed contact (magnetic sensor)
  • 1x Neodymium magnet
  • 1x Cable set
  • 1x Thermal tube


Robot mobile

The kit contains:

  • 1x Oktopod Board
  • 1x Bluetooth communication modules
  • 2x Geared DC motor for mobile car
  • 1x LiPo battery with charger (1800 mAh)
  • 1x Omni directional wheel
  • 1x Zip ties set
  • 1x Cable set
  • 1x Thermal tube
Robotic arm

The kit contains:

  • 1x Oktopod Board
  • 1x Bluetooth communication modules
  • 2x Servo motor
  • 2x Extension cable for servo motor
  • 1x Set of parts for arm manipulator
  • 1x Foam pedestal
  • 1x Electric magnet
  • 1x Cable set
  • 1x Thermal tube

story:
"3DTuning Edition Pro" is the second generation of "3DTuning", photorealistic car configurator app for iOS and Android. The app has been downloaded over 3.5 mln times , reaching #1 place in Entertainment category in 26 countries in the 6 months since its launch.

Thanks to feedback from numerous fans we know how to take our configurator to the next level. 

With your help, we will build a "must have" app for all the car enthusiasts!



"3DTuning Edition Pro" will get a complete redesign, brand new functionality and new fully configurable cars with new options. It will be free to use, with in-app purchases. 

Cars 

Exclusively for "3DTuning Edition Pro" we will create 50, 100 or 150 (depending on the goal reached) fully configurable models. The models will be available as in-app purchases. 

As a minimum, we will create the following 5O fully configurable cars:


Below is the list of cars which we will create in case we achieve stretch goal 1 and stretch goal 2:



In addition to that, all 800+ models available on current "3DTuning" mobile app will be available on "3DTuning Edition Pro" as free-to-use models. You can check out currently available models on www.3DTuning.com or "3DTuning" mobile apps (App Store   Google Play).

And last but not least... TOP 10 most requested cars by our user, which are about to be introduced in "3DTuning" mobile app, will be upgraded with all the new parts and features and will come in "3DTuning Edition Pro" as free-to-use models!

Please welcome, "the most wanted":


Car parts

All models created for "3DTuning Edition Pro" will come with the following configurable parts:


*available only for Trucks/SUVs



Night Mode

All models created for "3DTuning Edition Pro" will come with special "night mode" option, which makes the use of headlights, neon and special backgrounds even more exciting.



Camber (separate front and back wheels)

All non Truck/SUV models from the list will have separate front and back wheel camber available for specific wheels. Two individually selected angles of positive camber will be available.



Off-set (separate front and back wheels)

All cars from the list will have separate front and back wheel off-set available for all the wheel models. Two individually selected off-set positions will be available.





Brand New Design

"3DTuning Edition Pro” new functionality is enhanced by a totally new design with 'Ease of use’ being our main criteria.  It will fit perfectly with both smartphones and tablets.

And introduced especially for "3DTuning Edition Pro" - landscape and portrait modes! You will be able to enjoy all the functionality of the app in whichever mode is more comfortable for you.


Brand new functionality - "Social" features

On "3DTuning Edition Pro" your tuning masterpieces can be viewed, commented and Liked by your friends and millions of our users from all over the world.

With "Friends", "Timeline" and "Tuning Gallery" interaction between car enthusiasts has never been so easy or so fun!


Brand New functionality - "Tuning Challenge"

if we reach our 1st stretch goal, in addition to 50 more cars we will introduce PVP Tuning Challenge. You will be able to challenge your friend to see who's tuning masterpiece will get more likes from our tough but fare 3DTuning audience! 

And let the best tuning win! :)



Brand New functionality - "Groups and Blogs"

If we reach our 2nd stretch goal, in addition to 50 more cars (150 cars in total), we will introduce Groups and Blogs functionality. You will be able to create and manage your specific blog or a fan club, join an existing team of  fellow minded car enthusiasts, share and discover unique content and participate in exciting car discussion.





Our team is already working on "3DTuning Edition Pro", but we need your help to make it happen! 

IF WE REACH OUR FUNDING GOAL, THE MOBILE APP WILL BE RELEASED IN SEPTEMBER 2015!




We really hope you will find one of our perks suitable for you!

The idea of 3DTuning came to us back in 2007, when one of our friends wanted to change the front grill of his already pretty old SUV, but could not find an easy way of visualizing the final result. This is how the 3DTuning story started for us and thanks to all of our users from 214 countries all over the world - it seems like we are just at the beginning of this exciting journey!


Today, 3DTuning.com and "3DTuning" mobile app is a unique photorealistic car configurator with more than 800 car models, millions of monthly visitors and ten million individual car projects generated by our users.





Pretty obvious, but non the less, WE LOVE CARS AND WE LOVE 3DTUNING :)

All key members of our team have been with 3DTuning since the very beginning of our project in 2007.

Currently we are a team of 30 full time programmers and 3D specialists, covering the web site and the mobile app, with almost 40% of our team being female (not a typical picture in "car tuning" project ;)) 


You can see almost all of our team members in the video below, so it is very nice to meet all of you :)

If with your help we will be succeful in raising the necessary funds, we will be able to increase the current team by 30%, which will allow us to form a dedicated team working solely on "3DTuning Edition Pro". It will reduce our development time by at least 4 months. We know how to increase the team very fast without compromising the quality of the project. During the course of the project we have used a number of free-lance resources and subcontractors, who are already familiar with our requirements and high standards of modeling. 



The purpose of this campaign is not to make money, but to make "3DTuning Edition Pro" happen. 

We are investing approximately the same amount we have requested and 75% of the requested funding will go to additional and dedicated employes salaries. Below is the overall breakdown:

1) modeling costs                 45%  $ 42 000  3 months   10 people  

2) programming costs       30%  $ 29 000  3 months    7 people

3) hardware                           15%   $ 14 000    additional computers & render farm

4) buffer                                  10%  $ 10 000






In this kind of projects usually two type of risks are outlined:

1) functional - not all of the announced features can be realized;

2) timing       - it takes much longer than initially expected.

There are several facts mentioned below, that we believe dramatically reduce any project risks for "3DTuning Edition Pro":

a) experienced team: the core members of our team have been with us since the very beginning of the project in 2007;

b) level of prototyping: we already have designs and prototypes for all of the key features and functions of "3DTuning Edition Pro";

c) quality of additional resources: all the additional resources required for this project already have 3DTuning project and technologies experience;

d) and probably the most important one, motivation: we currently have more than 1.5 million monthly unique visitors on all our platforms from all over the world. Our users motivate us to continuously improve our car configurator.


WE ARE DOING THIS FOR 8 YEARS ALREADY AND WE KNOW WHAT WE ARE DOING! AND WITH YOUR HELP WE CAN TAKE THIS APP TO A NEXT LEVEL AND IN MUCH SHORTER TIME!



Your comments and suggestions have helped us from day one. Please continue being our most valuable consultants by giving your feedback and leaving your comments on this project. 

If you find "3DTuning Edition Pro" project interesting, please share it with your friends and colleagues. The more people find out about this project, the more car enthusiasts can help us make "3DTuning Edition Pro" happen!

So...

...we have signed the contract from our side, we hope you will do it as well :)

With sincere gratitude,

Every member of Team 3DTuning!

story:
Short Summary

Our company was founded on a simple concept - security needs to be easy, or people won't use it.

The Gordian Vault is a solution to a problem - how can one securely handle data, when one can't trust the device it's running on?

Our CEO, Kate Gray, has dedicated her career to security, building solutions to protect companies and users from hackers.  She has worked as a security consultant and engineer, building solutions to security problems big and small.

One of the biggest issues facing end-users and organizations right now is how to handle security in apps.  Android and IOS are designed to isolate applications from each other for security (so your games can't read your online banking data, for example), but this very protection keeps security software from being able to scan your device for threats.  Tools to help users root and jailbreak their devices use the same exploits that hackers do; if you can root your device with one of those tools, someone who steals your phone can, too.

In industry, when something needs to be secure, we use a smart card.  Smart Cards are dedicated security computers, designed from the ground up to protect their keys from hackers, destroying themselves before they give up their secrets.  When satellite providers want to protect their feeds, they use a smart card.  When banks want to protect their credit cards (and your money) from cloning, they use a smart card.  From parking meters to laundry machines, printer refills to classified military systems, smart cards provide needed protection, even when the device itself can't.

Our Hardware Security Module provides the same degree of security, with hardware that meets Payment Card Industry standards, in a form factor compatible with Moto Z phones, and making it available to application developers.  This lets us provide a very high level of security, and protects the keys from viruses or other rogue applications as well as physical attack.

Bitcoin Vault
 

We're passionate about security, and working to protect our users.  That's why we are launching the Gordian Vault with support for Bitcoin - digital currency for the digital age.

Storing your Bitcoin keys in your Gordian Vault ensures that no application can steal your keys.  Transactions are confirmed on a dedicated security e-Ink display, and the keys never leave the vault.  Our vault is compatible with the Trezor protocol, making it easy for developers to support, and we will be launching with a supported wallet.

When you send Bitcoin, the address and amount are confirmed on the secure display, ensuring that you are sending money to where you want it to go.  When you receive Bitcoin, your address is displayed on the secure display, ensuring that the address shown belongs to you.

What We Need & What You Get

We are accepting pre-orders in order to negotiate volume discounts, and to help offset the cost of development.  With your help, we can finalize the schematic, help fund development of the mobile-specific functionality, and work with our partners to finalize and manufacture the final form factor.

We have an existing HSM (Hardware Security Module) design based on the Kinetis K81 processor, which we are leveraging in order to bring the Gordian Vault to market quickly.

Purchasers of the Gordian Vault will get the Vault, as well as access to Bitcoin wallets and Authentication software compatible with Google Authenticator (OATH HOTP).

For users who do not yet have a Moto Z phone (such as users of the Moto G and Moto Z phones), we offer a dock that permits the mod to be used by bluetooth.  You can upgrade at any time without using any keys.

Moto Mods™ snap onto any Moto Z to give it a whole new superpower. They transform your phone allowing it to do things other phones can’t. To learn more visit www.motomods.com.

The Impact

We will be releasing our technology an open API for any application (or manufacturer) to use without cost.  This API permits applications to store their data and keys, and mark them as secured - ensuring that they can not be extracted.  Our HSM has significant amount of storage space for keys, permitting it to be used for multiple wallets, and other applications (such as Google Authenticator-compatible authentication codes).

Risks & Challenges

Building hardware is hard.  We have a great team, but a project like this takes time and money.

We will likely require several revisions on our PCB.  Those take time.  By sharing technology between the Gordian Vault and our other technologies, we are able to offset much of the cost.

Our design is expensive to build.  We use a high-end processor, a high-end screen, and we can't cut corners.  It means our margins are smaller, and it means that we will need to secure additional capital to fully complete the product.  We have raised over $50,000 in addition to this campaign, and will be raising additional funds, as well as contributing personal funds.

We have a long-term commitment to our Hardware Security Module platform, and will be using the same technology to provide security to other products and devices.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you know someone who could benefit from next-generation security available for their mobile device, please pass this campaign along.  Indiegogo has tools to make sharing easier.

Thank you for your support!

story:
Inclusite is a Web Based Accessibility Tool & Search Engine that provides Blind and Disabled People independent internet accessibility to the world of information on the web.  

By uploading Web Pages to our platform to provide the  Inclusite Service.  This means that every time a Blind or Disabled Person wants to access a certain web page or information, they will be able to do so! One of the KEY ingredients here is that they can do it from ANY COMPUTER, in REAL TIME, ANYWHERE!  

For example:  Let's say Richard is a Blind person that wants to surf the web and he needs a specific web page to do so....Richard already knows about Inclusite and knows that, by accessing www.inclusite.com,  he can search the Web Page for his need and be able to access this Web information.  Richard also knows that he doesn't need any peripherals  to have access the web, just his computer.  Inclusite works with your breath, voice or keyboard.

For this to happen we need the proper funding to be able to upload, support and maintain every web page in the planet.

Also, we provide a Web Accessibility Tool for Services, Information and transactional Web Pages.  This Tool may be included in any web page that wants Inclusite Service with out the modification of their content.  This will allow the Blind and Disabled people to visit a certain Web Page directly with out visiting our web page first.  This Tool can be as a Pop Up, Personalized Icon, Inclusite Icon, etc. 

Some Examples: 


That's why Inclusite was created: 

To provide Web Accessibility for the Blind and Disabled People around the World, from any computer, in real time and with out modifying the Web Pages.


There are over 190 million people in the World that cannot access the Web on their own!  And if we add the people who have difficulties accessing the web like seniors, the number exceeds 1 billion people (15% of World population).

Today there is no Web Based Software that can compare with Inclusite.  This means that we don't only have the opportunity to support this Human Right, but the OBLIGATION to do so.                                         

WHY A CROWDFUNDING CAMPAIGN? 

With this campaign, we want to raise awareness of the technology, gain your support and trust and show that the World needs a Web Accessibility Tool for the blind, disabled and elderly people.  

In many ways we are like a version of Google translate, but for the blind and disabled. What Inclusite needs is your HELP to get to a critical mass of people to create awareness and continue to make this possible for all.  

Access to the web is a Basic Right and is becoming a Law in many countries around the world.  

We want to get 10,000 crowdfunding backers to help impact this much needed right, so we need you to join us! With your support we will reach our fundraising goal and will be able to create history together.

Thank you for taking your time to read our story and helping us reach 1B People with disabilities.

                                      With respect,  
                                                              Dr. Fernando Hernandez (Founder of Inclusite) 
          

                                      How many people are you willing to help?

                                           Be the reason someone smiles today!                                                

                                             


                       


Inclusite has its current operations in Spain, Argentina, Mexico and has just opened an office in The United States.  As of today, Inclusite has been successful by creating relationships with public and private companies who have websites that everyone would like to access.

These companies choose to upload Inclusite directly on-top of their website, allowing traffic to flow directly through their own web page without modifying anything.  

However, Inclusite's GOAL is to provide this needed service WORLD WIDE to every current Web Page by supporting the transitions, by uploading  the  ‘most viewed’ 100,000 web pages in the World and by building our own Data Center in The United States.  We call  this "INCLUSTING"

KEY FACT: The more funding we have, the more web pages get Inclusited and more access to information for all. This is great for businesses as well, as they get to tap into this vast unrealized market of consumers!


Click our blog links below 

How does Inclusite work?           

What is it for?                        

It Works! Because...

Screen Shots of our different user Interfaces.

Our commitment is to apply 100% of your donation towards free Inclusite service to the Web Page of your Choosing.

Like this Example Demos, we intend to do the same for you...so to try it out!!!!

Huffington Post /  http://www--huffingtonpost--com.accesible.inclusite.com/


For the physical Perks: Existing donors are covering the cost of sending a Perk to you or a person with disabilities accessing the internet.      

                   If you own your own web page pre-purchase 1 year of service:   

                                    

                For eCommerce web pages and larger sites, please contact us!

                                   Twitter English: https://twitter.com/inclusiteusa

                                   Twitter Spanish: https://twitter.com/inclusite

                                LinkedIn Spanish: https://www.linkedin.com/in/inclusite          

                                                                                                                          

Is it a LAW to make the internet accessible for everyone?

Yes, it is. Please view attached Wikipedia link: Right to Internet. This is why every dollar we raise counts towards increasing global awareness. 

What has Inclusite done so far?

       

With this kind of past success why should I help? 

The majority of our partners receive this service for free like Wikipedia. We are seeking additional outside funding to continue to grow people's awareness to this important cause. These funds will be used to partner with hundreds of new websites around the World.

Is this an international campaign? 

Yes, it is. We are an international company with global aspirations. 

Can I contribute from outside the USA? 

Yes, You can donate with either an international credit card, not debit cards.  Or with PayPal!! You can send us a wire transfer by calling PayPal at 888.221.1161. 

If I have an eCommerce website how do I get Inclusited?

Please contact ppasque@inclusite.com to discuss. 

Do you include shipping with perks? 

Yes to anywhere in the world!! 

How do I get help? 

Just contact us for any further information or question, we will support you. 


There are many ways to contribute! Even if you don't have the money right now, you can help us by sharing this campaign with your family & friends. Just click on any of the Facebook, Twitter, and other sharing buttons and  let the world know about our awesome campaign.
story_txt:
Inclusite is a Web Based Accessibility Tool & Search Engine that provides Blind and Disabled People independent internet accessibility to the world of information on the web.  



By uploading Web Pages to our platform to provide the  Inclusite Service.  This means that every time a Blind or Disabled Person wants to access a certain web page or information, they will be able to do so! One of the KEY ingredients here is that they can do it from ANY COMPUTER, in REAL TIME, ANYWHERE!  
For example:  Let's say Richard is a Blind person that wants to surf the web and he needs a specific web page to do so....Richard already knows about Inclusite and knows that, by accessing www.inclusite.com,  he can search the Web Page for his need and be able to access this Web information.  Richard also knows that he doesn't need any peripherals  to have access the web, just his computer.  Inclusite works with your breath, voice or keyboard.


For this to happen we need the proper funding to be able to upload, support and maintain every web page in the planet.
Also, we provide a Web Accessibility Tool for Services, Information and transactional Web Pages.  This Tool may be included in any web page that wants Inclusite Service with out the modification of their content.  This will allow the Blind and Disabled people to visit a certain Web Page directly with out visiting our web page first.  This Tool can be as a Pop Up, Personalized Icon, Inclusite Icon, etc. 
Some Examples: 



That's why Inclusite was created: 
To provide Web Accessibility for the Blind and Disabled People around the World, from any computer, in real time and with out modifying the Web Pages.




There are over 190 million people in the World that cannot access the Web on their own!  And if we add the people who have difficulties accessing the web like seniors, the number exceeds 1 billion people (15% of World population).



Today there is no Web Based Software that can compare with Inclusite.  This means that we don't only have the opportunity to support this Human Right, but the OBLIGATION to do so.                                         


WHY A CROWDFUNDING CAMPAIGN? 
With this campaign, we want to raise awareness of the technology, gain your support and trust and show that the World needs a Web Accessibility Tool for the blind, disabled and elderly people.  
In many ways we are like a version of Google translate, but for the blind and disabled. What Inclusite needs is your HELP to get to a critical mass of people to create awareness and continue to make this possible for all.  
Access to the web is a Basic Right and is becoming a Law in many countries around the world.  
We want to get 10,000 crowdfunding backers to help impact this much needed right, so we need you to join us! With your support we will reach our fundraising goal and will be able to create history together.
Thank you for taking your time to read our story and helping us reach 1B People with disabilities.

                                                              Dr. Fernando Hernandez (Founder of Inclusite)

story:
What is this?

Hello!

         The SES Mobile Accessories Type I is a keyboard attachment designed to work for a majority of smartphones to help increase productivity of its users through the usage of a physical keyboard and stylus. For years, consumers have bought specific smartphones only due to their physical keyboards or stylus attachments. Without these key attributes, no one would buy these overpriced, outdated phones. We aim to bring the physical keyboard and stylus to any phone so you can enjoy the perks of modern phones such as stunning cameras, large screens, support from carriers and manufacturers and the fastest processors.

The Keyboard

           The keyboard is designed for a tactile feel to help the user’s be able to type faster. With a physical keyboard, the screen is not covered by the virtual keyboard and is fully usable. Plastic keycaps and a color adjustable backlight lead to a high quality typing experience. The keyboard is built with a 1000mAh battery which lasts 100 hours and can be charged in 2-3 hours using USB-C. Functions which do actions such as adjust volume and brightness help make using your phone easier.

The Slider

           The slider is designed to work for over 100,000 slides over its lifetime, meaning the Type I can be used over a long period of time and still work while being moved from phone to phone.

The Stylus

              Attached to the back of the slider is a mount that holds an included stylus. Not only is the stylus usable on your smartphone, but the other end is a ballpoint pen for writing on paper. Extendable for more comfortable usage, this stylus is a tool for signing papers – on paper and on a PDF.

Water and Dust Resistant*

               You need your keyboard to be able to take on the daily splashes and spills of daily life. That's why the keyboard component of the Type I will be water and dust resistant so you don’t need to worry about your TYPE I becoming damaged from dust or water from everyday usage.

Assembly

               The SES Mobile Accessories TYPE I is very easy to assemble. Use the included screwdriver to attach the keyboard to the slider. Then, using the same screwdriver, attach the screws to the mounts on the slider and the holes on the silicone casing.

How It Works

               The keyboard is attached to the slider using two screws which line up on an adjustable mount which helps the Type I accommodate all phone sizes. The screws also attach to two holes that attach to the silicone bumper. The silicone bumper is stretchy enough to accommodate most phones (some even in their cases) and also provides some protection to the phone if ever dropped.

About Us

               SES Mobile Accessories is a company that aims to transform the way the world uses smartphones through innovative ideas and designs that improve the productivity and usability of the tool we all use every day. Based in the Chicago area, home and birthplace of our founder, we are proud to design and develop our products in the area surrounding America’s second city.

Why support us?

             By supporting our campaign, you will be supporting an idea originally created in 3 years ago in an old notebook and developed, tweaked, redesigned and redesigned again to fit the changing needs of smartphone consumers. The one constant that has never changed during our development is the revolutionary goal of freeing the physical keyboard from the phone. Users shouldn't need to buy hardware that is outdated and expensive in order to get the physical keyboard which is why we are here to change that.

What We Need & What You Get

Where the money goes

          We will need $120,000 to fund the initial run of TYPE I attachments, the top 3 expenses being the development and manufacturing of the keyboard, development and manufacturing the slider and packaging. 

The Impact

           By supporting SES Mobile Accessories, you will show the world that the physical keyboard isn't a feature that belongs on old phones or niche products, but a powerful tool that can and should be used on today's newest smartphones. No more having half your screen blocked when typing, no more needing to look at the screen while you type, no more losing time from slower typing. By supporting the TYPE I, you say goodbye to these issues and focus on productivity so you can spend time on more important matters. The stylus is a similar case. Other phones come with a stylus which are either incredibly expensive or lacking in specs. You can now choose whatever phone you want to have a stylus by supporting the SES Mobile Accessories TYPE I!

Risks & Challenges

          The biggest issue will likely be making this all work with a very small team that is delivering its first product, which will drive us to work as hard as we can to make a lasting and strong impression! We are all perfectionists and have spent the past year working to make sure that this device is as perfect as we can make it and have calculated the costs over and over again to make sure they are correct. Thank you for supporting us and we will make sure there is a TYPE I in your hands if we reach the goal!

Share Us!

LinkedIn - https://www.linkedin.com/company/ses-mobile-acc...

Twitter -  https://twitter.com/ses_mobile

Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/sesmobileaccessories/

Reddit - https://www.reddit.com/user/sesmobileaccessories

Website - sesmobile.com

YouTube - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCGsk1k2SQ3yyfg...

*SES cannot guarantee at this time the degree of waterproofing or dustproofing that the TYPE I will be certified at or if certified at all.

story:
PRIVAT in 360°

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

What is the difference between PRIVAT and other security smartphones?

PRIVAT is the only smartphone in the world to offer a security system based on hardware that guarantees 100% the efficiency of its security functions. Other security smartphones in the market are based on software functions, to encrypt or create access keys to files, making them vulnerable of trespassing. In addition, some security smartphones do not allow new apps to be installed, reducing the use of the smartphone.

 Can I receive calls when the security camera is on?

Yes, when the security camera is being used, you can receive a call and answer it, because there is an alert (audio + led), so you could change to normal mode.

Which hardware resources share both boards?

Every electronic board (private camera board and smartphone board) has their own processor, storage, and operative system. However, they share secondary hardware resources that accomplish specific functions and under no circumstances do they put at risk the isolation of both boards.

These shared resources are the battery, display, microphone, speakers, cameras, and USB connector. The active board is the one that takes control of the shared resources.

Can I take photos and post them directly on my social networks?

Yes, when your PRIVAT is in normal mode, it works the same as any other smartphone. You can take your photos and share them immediately.

The Smartphone board will control the camera at that moment, and there will be no functionality restriction nor apps use.

What guarantees will I not lose control of my photos and videos?

All photos and videos you have taken on private camera mode will be captured and stored in the electronic board, which is designed for that purpose, and it has no connection to the conventional board, where you will find applications and no connectivity to wired or wireless networks. You can be 100% sure your photos and videos stored on the private camera board are safe.

How can I extract my photos and videos from the private camera memory?

There are three ways:

- Saving or copying them to the private camera SD card.

- Connecting a USB cable to a USB port being on camera private mode.

- Through the floating internal memory, files can be copied in a secure way between both electronic boards (private camera and smartphone). This floating internal memory is never shared at the same time with both boards or operative systems, which ensures a safe copy.

Can I copy files from the smartphone board to the private camera board?

Yes, you can do it directly using the floating memory. This is a practical and safe way of copying files between both boards.

What kind of files can I store in the security board or the private camera board?

All kinds of files can be stored. There is no limitation on that. However, you can only open photos and videos files.

Does the private camera have Wi-Fi or Bluetooth connection?

No, there is no connection module, no Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, or cellular data. The only way to extract files from this board is through a manual action made by the user. 

Can the two boards be activated at the same time?

No, only one board can be activated at a time. But some functionalities can remain in operation, like messages or calls, when using the private camera.

How does the anti-spy mode work?

It physically disconnects the cameras and the microphones, so it is impossible for spyware to turn them on.

What is the physical disconnection of the GPS for?

It avoids being accurately tracked, so it could be possible to know his daily routine.

What guarantees will I receive my PRIVAT Smartphone?

The crowdfunding campaign has a fixed goal, which means Indiegogo will only send the money if the goal is reached; otherwise, it will be returned to the backers. Also, the project is already in an advanced phase.

Will PRIVAT work in my country?

Yes, its communication modules work with the technologies used by cellular operators around the world. In addition, it has FCC and CE certification in accordance with the standards of the industry.

Will PRIVAT be unlocked to work with any operator?

Yes, it will not have any restrictions.

Is there any restriction for installing apps?

There is no restriction. In the normal mode, you can install and use the apps like any other smartphone.

Does the privacy screen protector come with PRIVAT?

Yes, it is an accessory that comes with all PRIVAT Smartphones, and it is up to the user to use it.

How does the privacy screen protector work?

The privacy screen protector keeps the person next to you from seeing what you are doing on your PRIVAT, because the protector reduces the angle vision up to 45°, which means it can only be seen by its user.

Can I charge my PRIVAT Smartphone with a wireless charger?

You can use that kind of charger on your PRIVAT Smartphone.

 

         

 

contact@privat-smartphone.com

 

Thank you for your support !
story_txt:
PRIVAT in 360°
 
 



 
 



 
 




 



 

 
 

 

 
 



 
What is the difference between PRIVAT and other security smartphones?
PRIVAT is the only smartphone in the world to offer a security system based on hardware that guarantees 100% the efficiency of its security functions. Other security smartphones in the market are based on software functions, to encrypt or create access keys to files, making them vulnerable of trespassing. In addition, some security smartphones do not allow new apps to be installed, reducing the use of the smartphone.
 Can I receive calls when the security camera is on?
Yes, when the security camera is being used, you can receive a call and answer it, because there is an alert (audio + led), so you could change to normal mode.
Which hardware resources share both boards?
Every electronic board (private camera board and smartphone board) has their own processor, storage, and operative system. However, they share secondary hardware resources that accomplish specific functions and under no circumstances do they put at risk the isolation of both boards.
These shared resources are the battery, display, microphone, speakers, cameras, and USB connector. The active board is the one that takes control of the shared resources.
Can I take photos and post them directly on my social networks?
Yes, when your PRIVAT is in normal mode, it works the same as any other smartphone. You can take your photos and share them immediately.
The Smartphone board will control the camera at that moment, and there will be no functionality restriction nor apps use.
What guarantees will I not lose control of my photos and videos?
All photos and videos you have taken on private camera mode will be captured and stored in the electronic board, which is designed for that purpose, and it has no connection to the conventional board, where you will find applications and no connectivity to wired or wireless networks. You can be 100% sure your photos and videos stored on the private camera board are safe.
How can I extract my photos and videos from the private camera memory?
There are three ways:
- Saving or copying them to the private camera SD card.
- Connecting a USB cable to a USB port being on camera private mode.
- Through the floating internal memory, files can be copied in a secure way between both electronic boards (private camera and smartphone). This floating internal memory is never shared at the same time with both boards or operative systems, which ensures a safe copy.
Can I copy files from the smartphone board to the private camera board?
Yes, you can do it directly using the floating memory. This is a practical and safe way of copying files between both boards.
What kind of files can I store in the security board or the private camera board?
All kinds of files can be stored. There is no limitation on that. However, you can only open photos and videos files.
Does the private camera have Wi-Fi or Bluetooth connection?
No, there is no connection module, no Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, or cellular data. The only way to extract files from this board is through a manual action made by the user. 
Can the two boards be activated at the same time?
No, only one board can be activated at a time. But some functionalities can remain in operation, like messages or calls, when using the private camera.
How does the anti-spy mode work?
It physically disconnects the cameras and the microphones, so it is impossible for spyware to turn them on.
What is the physical disconnection of the GPS for?
It avoids being accurately tracked, so it could be possible to know his daily routine.
What guarantees will I receive my PRIVAT Smartphone?
The crowdfunding campaign has a fixed goal, which means Indiegogo will only send the money if the goal is reached; otherwise, it will be returned to the backers. Also, the project is already in an advanced phase.
Will PRIVAT work in my country?
Yes, its communication modules work with the technologies used by cellular operators around the world. In addition, it has FCC and CE certification in accordance with the standards of the industry.
Will PRIVAT be unlocked to work with any operator?
Yes, it will not have any restrictions.
Is there any restriction for installing apps?
There is no restriction. In the normal mode, you can install and use the apps like any other smartphone.
Does the privacy screen protector come with PRIVAT?
Yes, it is an accessory that comes with all PRIVAT Smartphones, and it is up to the user to use it.
How does the privacy screen protector work?
The privacy screen protector keeps the person next to you from seeing what you are doing on your PRIVAT, because the protector reduces the angle vision up to 45°, which means it can only be seen by its user.
Can I charge my PRIVAT Smartphone with a wireless charger?
You can use that kind of charger on your PRIVAT Smartphone.
 
         
 
contact@privat-smartphone.com
 
Thank you for your support !

story:
MY BACKGROUND

My background includes 15 years in "corporate America" and 15 years in more entreprenurial roles. I love solving problems as evidenced by my 9 patents and many FDA-cleared medical devices. The Small Business Administration trusted me enough to approve a $1.6 million loan on a business that I bought and recently sold and paid-back the loan. 

I invented a digital tag tag system for dentures called DentureID.com. Since then, many people said I should develop a similar system for valuables. So I secured the domain "itag.com" and developed a robust cloud-based data storage and retrieval system. FOREVER TAG uses this system and unique QR codes to save and retrieve personal identfication information.

My hope is that you will support the project to help me:

  • Fund commercial quantity of inventory
  • Develop awareness and trial of the product
  • Create new applications on a variety of materials

YOUR REWARD

I guarantee you will get the reward(s) that you select. Even if I don't reach the project goal, you will get your reward because I have already made some inventory in low (expensive) batch quantities. Your enthusiasm and funding will give me confidence to make lower cost inventory in larger quantities.

PEOPLE ARE TRUSTWORTHY

There are a few studies that show up to 80% of people would return a valuable item if they could easily contact the owner of the item. When you fund this project, and help me promote the brand, you will help prove that most of humanity is trustworthy and kind.

RISKS

The software has been fully developed and the tags have been tested and proven to work with any modern mobile device with a camera app that recognizes QR codes. So there is no risk that the system will not work. It works now!

FOREVER TAGS are not active tracking devices. They are for identification only. Some potential customers may be confused about this. The tags are for identification only.

HELP MAKE IT A UNIVERSAL STANDARD

Everybody needs this product! How many people have smartphones? Laptops? Wireless earbuds? Pets? Purses? Luggage? Backpacks? Sports equipment? Lunchboxes? Do these items get lost? Ask TSA at the airport!

Why not take a photo of all of your pets required tags (rabies, etc.) and upload them so your pet has only one tag...eliminate the "jingle."

How many people move? FOREVER TAG is the last tag you will ever need because you can electronically change the address anytime at no cost.

I need your help to make FOREVER TAG the world standard for valuables identification. Use SOCIAL MEDIA! Make fun videos with FOREVER TAG! Get your friends excited!

story:
Story

 

 

FOLDV is the world’s first foldable structured cable. This cable has an Auto Folding System so you can quickly and simply use and organize the cable. With the super-slim design, you can store it neatly in any place and it’s easy to carry around. With this patent-pending foldable structure, you won’t have the same messy, entangled cable problems

 

Auto folding system with neodymium

Fast, simple, and intuitive function

Extremely fast organizing speed

A short yet long cable, like magic 

Minimum 50,000 time guaranteed(more test video link)

Fast charge; Quick charge 3.0 (Tested with Galaxy 10)

 

The new foldable cable which breaks the stereotype that cables shouldn’t be folded.

Great durability which can endure a minimum of folding/unfolding 50,000 times.

Probably the last joy that you can get from a cable before the wireless era.

 

4 features

 

FOLDV has 4 special features to give you the best user experience. Its slim design and Auto Folding System features especially show its real worth when you have to use several cables or use a portable battery.

 

USE with

 

 A portable battery

A multi USB HUB & charger

A plug & Power strip

A plug in car

 

Technical Specifications

Supported plug types

 Maximum charging current & data transfer rate

Dimension & length

A demonstration of a fast charge

 

 

Accessories

The Supporter helps the cable stay folded when it’s hanging in the air. With the supporter, you can keep the cable more organized by keeping a distance from the floor and reducing mess, especially after charging with a plug or power strip.

 

Perks

 

 

 

 

Stretch Goal

 

When it reaches the funding goal then other options become available, you can choose the cable length, and the charging type. When you want to change the cable length, or the charging type, then there is an additional fee. An additional $4 will be charged when you change the cable length from 3ft to 6ft, an additional $3 will be charged when you change from Quick Charge 3.0 to USB PD. Final option selection and additional payment will be available through the survey sent by email after the campaign. After 14 days from the campaign’s end, the basic product (with no changes) price will be paid first. After that, through the survey in the email we sent, you can pay the additional fee for optional changes.

 

Event

When the funding amount reaches $100,000, an additional 1 cable will be provided to early bird single funding participants. (Please share this project to your friends & family if you want)

 

Shipping

 

Every shipment will be charged an international shipment fee. Due to COVID-19, shipment fees and available countries may change. Before the end of the funding campaign, we will add a notice on shipment fees for each country on the update section and story page. You can change the final shipment location through the survey.

 

Timeline

 

 

R&D history

 

The foldable cables's first prototype began in 2017, and through constant research and development, the design has been upgraded and the final prototype was completed in 2019. Due to its foldable structure, we had to do detailed durability tests. So we made a tester machine ourselves to test the cable. When the cable is folded, it makes a gradual curve so it can endure a minimum of 50,000 times of folding/unfolding.

                                                  Folding durability tester (3D printed, Self DIY)

 

About us

Our company SPACEPION  LLC started with the moto “Renovate Your Space”. Through small renovations, we want to solve the discomforts which are accepted naturally in our daily lives, and we hope we can deliver small happinesses and enjoyment to the world by sharing it with other people.

FOLDV is the first step of SPACEPION, and we would like to begin with you.

 

Risks and challenges

 

It’s not easy to make a product that doesn’t exist in the world. Especially when it’s a mass-produced product, if any unexpected problems occur, then there can be even longer delays. In FOLDV production procedure, we care about COVID-19 the most. Among FOLDV’s production procedure, by-hand assembly is the most important part to complete the procedure. But if the assembly has been delayed due to COVID-19, then it affects the entire process. But except for COVID-19, there are no problems that can affect the process. FOLDV is designed so it can be produced in existing cable factories and using existing production processes. As you can see, there are already tons of cables on the market, producing a cable isn’t special technology, and already there are lots of factories producing lots of cables.

story:
APLUG, a 100cm USB  charger/data cable for iPhone 5-6

Blue led, the smartphone is totally charged.
Red led, the smartphone is charging or the led is not working properly : )

Colors


How it works

Plug and play...


What We Need & What You Get

You get aplug, nothing more nothing less.

The Impact

There's nothing so special about Aplug. It's just a plug! And it's even less important to everyone around you who already has a fully charged phone.
The impact to the world is negligible.

Risks & Challenges
It's a plug.

Other Ways You Can Help

Buy more aplugs.

Remarks

We are talking about a USB cable, there are a lot out of there, you should choose this one because you really rock for us! for just 12$

story:
（Video for Backers in China, 大陆用户请看YouKu视频）


----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

Tutorial Videos of Using FAMBO

（Videos For Backers in China, 中国大陆用户，访问YouKu视频） 

FAMBO is very easy to use. It takes less than 5 min to make FAMBO work in your house. Watch the short video below to learn how.       


Video Call & Video Conference


Use the Security Alarm Feature


Use FAMBO as Your Private Cloud

Remote Surveillance and A/C Control



Install a hard disk into FAMBO by yourself


FAMBO has 3 cameras, which give you a full view of the room where FAMBO is. 

 



 


Massive Storage

FAMBO has a 16GB  internal storage and a tank for a 2.5-inch hard disk. It supports a maximum of 2TB hard disk. FAMBO II has a 16GB internal storage and a 1TB pre-installed hard disk. 

You can install a hard disk into FAMBO yourself. It is very easy and takes less than 5 min. See the video below: 

A security log contains 3 snapshots of the alarm event. You can scroll them to check what happened at that moment.

 




----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

Birth of FAMBO

It takes us 2 years to create the prototype of FAMBO. During the past 2 years, we have tested 12 different ARM chips, including Rockchip, AllWinner, Samsung, and Amlogic. 

We tested the video encoding and decoding performances, to make sure FAMBO have excellent video streaming performance. We changed the drivers in Android source code, so that it can support all the 3 cameras and the ZigBee chip provided by TI. 

We also developed applications for FAMBO and smartphones. 




----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

A Highly Integrated Smart Home System

FAMBO is designed as the in-home control center of the smart home system. All the popular wireless communication protocols are supported, including: 

  • WIFI
  • Bluetooth
  • ZigBee

WIFI is the most widely used wireless technology. Bluetooth is used in many new devices. In addition, we add ZigBee module into FAMBO, which does very good in low-power consumption and in-house communication. Here is the summarizing of ZigBee and Bluetooth: 

(See: http://www.greenpeak.com/Company/Opinions/CeesL... )


More ZigBee accessories will be added in near future, which makes the FAMBO system more powerful and interesting. 



----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

PERKS

$19 - BlackPearl   (without infrared control) 30% OFF
$29 - BlackPearl X(with infrared control) 30% OFF 
$49  - VERY EARLY BIRD for FAMBO
$99 - EARLY BIRD for FAMBO

$149 - FAMBO (40% OFF). Regular retail price will be $249.

$179 - FAMBO (30% OFF). Regular retail price will be $249.

$199 - FAMBO II (1TB storage, 50% OFF). Regular retail price will be $399.

$279 - FAMBO II (1TB storage, 30% OFF). Regular retail price will be $399.

$850 - 5x FAMBO  (SAVE $400)
$1600  - 10x FAMBO  (SAVE $900)


A Standard FAMBO Package: 

  • A FAMBO host;
  • A power adapter;
  • An HDMI cable;
  • An IR remote;
  • A USB camera (Logitech HD 720p)


BlackPearl

BlackPearl has no infrared control;

BlackPearl X has infrared control;

Both have temperature sensor and motion detector. 



Flying Mouse

Add $30 as Additional Gift in any FAMBO perk to get a flying mouse, which let you control the FAMBO more freely. 


----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Share the story of FAMBO with your husband, wife, parents and kids.  
  • Send this link to your friends on Facebook, Twitter, etc, or by e-mail: https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/fambo-put-you-closer-to-your-family/
  • Tell the story of FAMBO to your friends when you meet them;
  • Try to make FAMBO known to more people.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

TIMELINE



----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

ABOUT US

The FAMBO team has been working on smart home systems since 2011. Most of the engineers have worked more than 10 years either in software or hardware development. Tens of ARM chips have been tested. Dozens of PCBs have been designed, made and tested. Hundreds of software versions have been developed. All these work contributes to the first prototype of FAMBO. 

But the FAMBO team is still a small team. All the team members work with interest and enthusiasm. We all believe that we can make a difference to this world. 

We design the product, make and test the hardware, modify Android source code, and develop FAMBO applications. In addition, we make our introduction videos ourselves. 




----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

Why we need your help?

We are a group of new parents. We developed the FAMBO to help you spend more quality time with your kids and store every good memory. 
To start mass production, we must raise enough funds to make 2000 units. With your valuable support, we can achieve economies of scale and keep the product cost low, so that more people can enjoy their family life with FAMBO. 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

Risks & Challenges

Our team has been working on FAMBO for 2 years. The FAMBO and BlackPearl you see above are REAL WORKING prototypes. We will continue refining the hardware and upgrading software before and after mass production of FAMBO. 


During the past years, we have built very good and stable relationship with our hardware suppliers in Shenzhen, China. As our team is based in China, we can have much more control over our OEM factories. 

Of course, no project is without any risk and challenges but we are doing our best to minimize them. We felt that we have done all the necessary preliminary work prior to launching a project on indiegogo. 



----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

FAQ

Q: Is it difficult to set up the FAMBO? How to do it?

A: No. Setting up FAMBO is very easy. It takes less than 5 min!!! 

See the above video: 'FAMBO: Setup and Initialization'


Q: How can I get the FAMBO APP? Is it free? 

A: We will make our APP available on iOS APP Store and Google Play Market. It is totally free!


Q: Can my parents or kids use FAMBO? They even do not know how to use a smart phone.

A: Yes. FAMBO is designed as an easy-to-use device. Most of its key features are designed for the kids or the elder people, who probably do not known how to use a smartphone. 

For example, when you connect FAMBO from your smartphone to start a video call, FAMBO pick up the incoming call automatically. Your parents/kids have to do nothing! Just sit in front of the TV and chat with you.  


Q: Can I install a hard disk for my FAMBO myself? 

A: Yes. It is very easy to install a hard disk into a FAMBO. This video shows how. 


Q: I am lazy and do not want to install the hard disk myself. How can I get a FAMBO with a massive storage? 

A: FAMBO II has a 1TB hard disk pre-installed. You can buy this one. 


Q: Is it safe to do video call via FAMBO? I do not want my image captured by someone else. 

A: Video data is NEVER stored anywhere! Peer-to-peer technology is used to connect your smart phone with FAMBO. 


Q: Why is ZigBee used to connect FAMBO and BlackPearl? 

A: ZigBee is a wireless communication protocol designed for the home automation. It can cover a much wider area in your house than WIFI and bluetooth. Meanwhile, it consumes less power. And a ZigBee product is very cheap. 


Q: Are there new accessories of the smart-home system, besides BlackPearl? 

A: Yes! Absolutely! New ZigBee accessories will be made in near future. e.g. door sensor, gas sensor, power socket. 


Q: How to charge BlackPearl?

A: The BlackPearl is charged by any 5V/1A DC power source. 


Q: What is the battery life to BlackPearl?
A: BlackPearl has a 1500 mAh battery, which can last 4~6 months depending on the use. BlackPearl is ZigBee device, and consumes very little power. 

Q: Does FAMBO work in EU, or Japan?
A: Yes. Of course (もちろん). It works anywhere on this planet, as long as it has the Internet access.
