$179 - FAMBO (30% OFF). Regular retail price will be $249.
$199 - FAMBO II (1TB storage, 50% OFF). Regular retail price will be $399.
$279 - FAMBO II (1TB storage, 30% OFF). Regular retail price will be $399.
$850 - 5x FAMBO  (SAVE $400)

$1600  - 10x FAMBO  (SAVE $900)





A Standard FAMBO Package: 

A FAMBO host;

A power adapter;

An HDMI cable;

An IR remote;

A USB camera (Logitech HD 720p)






BlackPearl

BlackPearl has no infrared control;
BlackPearl X has infrared control;
Both have temperature sensor and motion detector. 





Flying Mouse

Add $30 as Additional Gift in any FAMBO perk to get a flying mouse, which let you control the FAMBO more freely. 



----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 


Other Ways You Can Help

Share the story of FAMBO with your husband, wife, parents and kids.  
Send this link to your friends on Facebook, Twitter, etc, or by e-mail: https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/fambo-put-you-closer-to-your-family/

Tell the story of FAMBO to your friends when you meet them;
Try to make FAMBO known to more people.




----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 


TIMELINE







----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 
ABOUT US



The FAMBO team has been working on smart home systems since 2011. Most of the engineers have worked more than 10 years either in software or hardware development. Tens of ARM chips have been tested. Dozens of PCBs have been designed, made and tested. Hundreds of software versions have been developed. All these work contributes to the first prototype of FAMBO. But the FAMBO team is still a small team. All the team members work with interest and enthusiasm. We all believe that we can make a difference to this world. We design the product, make and test the hardware, modify Android source code, and develop FAMBO applications. In addition, we make our introduction videos ourselves. 







----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 


Why we need your help?
We are a group of new parents. We developed the FAMBO to help you spend more quality time with your kids and store every good memory. 
To start mass production, we must raise enough funds to make 2000 units. With your valuable support, we can achieve economies of scale and keep the product cost low, so that more people can enjoy their family life with FAMBO. 


----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 


Risks & Challenges


Our team has been working on FAMBO for 2 years. The FAMBO and BlackPearl you see above are REAL WORKING prototypes. We will continue refining the hardware and upgrading software before and after mass production of FAMBO. 


During the past years, we have built very good and stable relationship with our hardware suppliers in Shenzhen, China. As our team is based in China, we can have much more control over our OEM factories. 

Of course, no project is without any risk and challenges but we are doing our best to minimize them. We felt that we have done all the necessary preliminary work prior to launching a project on indiegogo. 




----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 



FAQ
Q: Is it difficult to set up the FAMBO? How to do it?
A: No. Setting up FAMBO is very easy. It takes less than 5 min!!! 
See the above video: 'FAMBO: Setup and Initialization'

Q: How can I get the FAMBO APP? Is it free? 
A: We will make our APP available on iOS APP Store and Google Play Market. It is totally free!

Q: Can my parents or kids use FAMBO? They even do not know how to use a smart phone. 
A: Yes. FAMBO is designed as an easy-to-use device. Most of its key features are designed for the kids or the elder people, who probably do not known how to use a smartphone. 
For example, when you connect FAMBO from your smartphone to start a video call, FAMBO pick up the incoming call automatically. Your parents/kids have to do nothing! Just sit in front of the TV and chat with you.  

Q: Can I install a hard disk for my FAMBO myself? 
A: Yes. It is very easy to install a hard disk into a FAMBO. This video shows how. 

Q: I am lazy and do not want to install the hard disk myself. How can I get a FAMBO with a massive storage? 
A: FAMBO II has a 1TB hard disk pre-installed. You can buy this one. 

Q: Is it safe to do video call via FAMBO? I do not want my image captured by someone else. 
A: Video data is NEVER stored anywhere! Peer-to-peer technology is used to connect your smart phone with FAMBO. 

Q: Why is ZigBee used to connect FAMBO and BlackPearl? 
A: ZigBee is a wireless communication protocol designed for the home automation. It can cover a much wider area in your house than WIFI and bluetooth. Meanwhile, it consumes less power. And a ZigBee product is very cheap. 

Q: Are there new accessories of the smart-home system, besides BlackPearl? 
A: Yes! Absolutely! New ZigBee accessories will be made in near future. e.g. door sensor, gas sensor, power socket. 


Q: How to charge BlackPearl?
A: The BlackPearl is charged by any 5V/1A DC power source. 


Q: What is the battery life to BlackPearl?
A: BlackPearl has a 1500 mAh battery, which can last 4~6 months depending on the use. BlackPearl is ZigBee device, and consumes very little power. 

Q: Does FAMBO work in EU, or Japan?

A: Yes. Of course (もちろん). It works anywhere on this planet, as long as it has the Internet access.

story:
Pi HomeGuard (Pi HG)

Pi HG is a cheap flexible Raspberry Pi (model B, B+ and Zero) wireless sensor add-on to help monitor your family or property.

 

Why do I need Pi HG, what can it do ?

  • Intruders - be alerted if your home has unexpected visitors, are your kids at school ?

  • Relatives - check if an elderly relative is up and about making their breakfast.

  • Frost - get an early alert of low outside temperatures.
     
  • Flood - get an early warning of flooding before your property & possessions are damaged.
     
  • High Power use - get alerted if your cooker or oven has been left on !
     
  • Footfall analysis - find out what areas of your shop floor are busy at particular times.


Pi HG sensors and features:

Sensors:  
Power kWatts usage * current & average power
PiR motion detection * range of 7m
Door Open/Close * once triggered will transmit a series cycle of multiple pulses
Toilet Flush * useful to detect if someone is up and about
Flood * place sensor in basement or building foundations for early flood warning
Ext Temperature & Humidity * only uses a single channel
Pi HG Temperature * on board temp, can be used to detect room temperature
Rain Gauge * uses Maplins N25FR Rain Bin

Wind speed *

 uses Maplins N25FR Anemometer
Features:  
Lan connectivity Yes **
WiFi connectivity Yes **  
3g connectivity Yes *** 
Power costs Yes *
   
Low Battery Indication Yes *
Sensor Battery Life 1 - 2 years using AA batteries
Sensor Data hosting Internally to Pi or selected external clouds.
   

*  Custom notification alerting on all sensors with real-time chart analysis.
** Requires Raspberry Pi for full functionality.
*** Requires an e220 modem dongle with suitable sim for 3g connectivity.

With the right sensors and configuration the following timely alert situations can be detected by Pi HG and sent direct to your mobile device in seconds.
 
  • High power use after 5.30pm - Cooker left ON !
  • Front door left OPEN !
  • No Kitchen activity by 9am, is your relative ok ?
  • Property activity detected when you are at work or on Holiday !
  • Flood or Rain alert !
  • Hot water tank temperature cold, forget that hot bath !
  • 6am Frost alert - outside temp below freezing !
  • High wind speed - possible damage to property !
  • Heavy rainfall - possible flooding !
  • Sensor X battery voltage low !

The software will be provided for a nominal admin charge initially on SD card and I am now in a position to share the hardware platform to every Raspberry Pi user for an incredibly low price.

What we need & What do I get ?

For a successful campaign and to make initial production viable I need sufficient funds to manufacture 500 PiHG boards. Many campaigns stall and fail by the initial high manufacture costs but because all boards are ready to go and with sensors being sold in DIY format - this will not happen. The Raspberry Pi was built and sold to improve learning & education and Pi HomeGuard will continue with this theme. All sensors will initially be self build following a set of simple instructions. The complexity is now handled by the sensor board firmware making the construction possible with only a few cheap component modules.
As an example when a door opens, to ensure detection, the open event has to be held ON for several transmit cycles. On my first version I needed a 555 timer delay circuit to hold the signal ON for at least 30 seconds. This added cost and complexity and the 555 circuit was not easy to build. This is now all handled in the firmware and we now only need two components, a 9901 sensor board and the magnetic door switch !

As a default Pi Homeguard monitors power usage on sensor 0 and board temperature on sensor 10. Up to nine other sensors can be added, but the humidity/temperature sensor only uses one channel.

Basic HG System connected by USB to Raspberry Pi B+
Basic system also includes Power clamp and wireless Transmitter but it does not include the above shown USB cable or cased Raspberry Pi.

As a starter this gives you a basic power monitor on sensor 0 and temperature on sensor 10. Even this basic system is useful to detect kettle power spikes, power highs like cooker left on and property temperatures.

Pi Connectivity:
You have two Pi connection options;
 
  • USB - using the PL2303 cable you can connect to the Pi by USB.
     
  • GPIO - or for the more technical direct to the Pi GPIO. This is very useful on the Pi Zero where the single usb port can then be used for 3gmodem or wifi dongle.


Pi HG connected to Pi Zero by direct GPIO connection

The less technical can use the below PL2303 cable for a cleaner USB connection.


Note: If using a Pi Zero or GPIO connection the above cable is not necessary.

Sensor Build:
After selecting the basic system you then decide what additional wireless sensors you want to add to your system. Only minor soldering skills are necessary, they are all very easy to build and use minimal components, but please remember to select the correct sensor board firmware (990x) for the sensor being built.


All sensors use the same wireless board transmitter to send data to the Pi and the sensor battery condition is also transmitted meaning you can spot batteries getting flat before they fail. This can of course be added as a sensor alert when the voltage of sensor# falls to a determined value.

Sensor firmware ref and build components used:
9901 Door Open/Close - Sensor board and Magnetic door switch
9901 can also be used for Toilet Flush - Sensor board and float sensor
9902 Humidity/Temperature - Sensor board, DHT22/11 sensor & 10k resistor
9903 Not allocated...................................................
9904 PiR movement - Sensor board, HC-SR501 sensor, 5v power board
9905 Wind speed - Sensor board, Maplins N25FR Anemometer
9906 Rain Gauge - Sensor board, Maplins N25FR Rain Gauge
9907 Flood - Sensor board, Flood level sensor

Initially only six sensor designs will be launched, but other sensors will be made available as demands dictate. One possible next version is for Carbon Monoxide.
Note: a comprehensive build document is sent with each sensor type.
 
PIR motion sensor and Humidity/Temperature sensor:

The HG PIR sensor (shown left) is small, wireless, portable and with a 7m range can be placed in any suitable room location, hidden from view and yet fully functional. The Humidity/Temperature sensor (shown right) has the same attributes and can operate with the cheaper DHT11 (blue) or more accurate DHT22 (white) digital sensors.
 

Sensor Battery Life:
The battery life greatly depends upon sensor activity, but on test the door sensor has an estimated life of three years. The battery life of the humidity/temp sensor is however much less and a life of around 9 months can be expected. The life of a PiR sensor depends on activity in the area being monitored. One option as used in the door sensor video is to use "sleep mode" which only transmits data when triggered. The down side is you only get a battery voltage reading when the sensor is triggered, but for most situations this should be ok, the choice is yours.

Hosting Data:
The sensor data can be hosted internally on the Pi which is stored in a Round Robin Database (rrd) format and is sized for ten years. But other options are available to store the data externally with CurrentCare, Xively or with EmonCMS. The external options are triggered by adding the appropriate API key to the config file.

How does it all work?

    1. First get your Pi HomeGuard hardware with SD card
    2. Follow the self build sensor instructions
    3. Load the SD card into your Raspberry Pi, connect to your network and apply power
    4. Using your browser load http://Pi-Local-IP        (Pi-Local-IP?  see Faq's)
    5. Pair all your sensors to their respective channels
    6. Edit the sensor config file and change labels & colours as necessary
    7. Load the Pi Local address (eg: 192.168.1.xx ) in your browser and watch the data appear
    8. If necessary amend the graph layout or amend your alerts at: http://Pi-Local-IP/editor
    9. To host your Pi data on the internet see Faq's
    10. To send your data to external hosts see Faq's
     

    Software:

    Depending on your requirements the software is totally flexible and can be used in several different ways. The default config has your Pi running, data collection, processing, raw data hosting and data alerting. The internal Pi data is stored in a Round Robin Database (rrd) format and is sized for ten years. I've been running the default Pi hosting software on my Pi for nearly three years, the presentation is a little primitive but it does work and has proved to be very useful and reliable. Each raw chart take about one second to generate which is amazing considering all the other stuff the Pi is running.

    The top header block shows the current power usage & temperature as at timestamp.


    The next block shows nine labeled sensors with the last reading and battery voltage. The colours help identify each sensor on the following charts.


    If necessary click the left magnify icon to expand last timestamp list.

    Activity charts then give a timeline presentation which show which sensor has been triggered recently and the colours help identify room activity.



    The Power usage chart shows the 3kW kettle spikes at 6am.



    We also have charts for temperature & humidity.


    Wind speed & rainfall.
     
    and lastly - powers costs per hour / day / week.
    The above chart timelines can be easily changed (eg: Last 2h,7d,12w,3m) or disabled.

    You can see a working live example at:  http://www.pihomeguard.com
     
    EmonCMS Dashboard
    But you could have the data hosted elsewhere, at for example Emoncms. All you do is add your API key to the config file and see the same data presented as on the below dashboard link:
    https://emoncms.org/jamieg/homeguard
     


    CurrentCare Dashboard
    Or using a different API key in the config have the data hosted to the Current Care dashboard:


    Virtual Cottage
    Yet another way to present the same data is to use the internal virtual cottage, all current main sensor data is presented on the one virtual icon;


    The chimney smoke, windows and door all change depending on sensor activity.  No room activity for 15mins & one panel grey, 30mins two panels grey, no activity for over one hour and curtains close.  Image can be displayed on your mobile device and gets updated every 5 mins.

    View a live presentation at:   http://www.pihomeguard.com/cottage

    Sensor Alerting
    One powerful feature is to have full control of any alerting on any sensor with the ability to have multiple alerts for the same sensor.
    • Any Day 1730-1930 High power use - Cooker left ON !
    • Any Day anytime - Front door left OPEN for >5mins !
    • Any Day No Kitchen activity by 9am, Is Mum Ok ?
    • Mon-Fri 0900-1700 Property Activity when you are at Work !
    • Any Day at 0900 - Battery Voltage of sensor# is below 2.2v !

    Once a sensor alert has triggered you can decide when to repeat any further alerts. Sensor alerts currently have the option to use "IFTTT" or "Pushover", again configured by adding the appropriate API key to the config file.

     

    Cacti
    Ye another internal option is to use Cacti which has the ability to drill-down to a particular date and time and view any sensor data using your browser.

     

    Q and A

    How do I find the Pi local IP address?
    Best way is to use a $6 IC Keypad Plate display, but with no display the Pi local IP can be found a number of ways:
    1.  using a port scanner software like http://www.advanced-port-scanner.com
    2.  or a mobile App called "Fing" for Android & iOS. 
    Fing Android:
    https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=c...
    Fing iOS:
    https://itunes.apple.com/gb/app/fing-network-sc...
     
    The power sensor is supplied ready made, why don't you supply all sensors in same fashion?
    This may happen eventually but the cost for sensor molds would hold back the launch. The final cost would also have to add sufficient margin to make the business risk worthwhile making most sensors cost double the kit price.

    I don't have broadband but do get a good 3g signal, can I still use HomeGuard?
    Yes the Pi software is configured to run as cable network, WiFi or even a 3g dongle.
    ( Note: Recommended 3g dongle is the e220 )

    How can I host my Pi data on the internet?
    You would normally need a fixed IP to host on the internet but another feature is the ability to use duckdns to allow external hosting. All you do is register your DuckDNS address at https://www.duckdns.org and then add your Duck DNS Token to your PiHG config file. You also have to configure your router to forward port 80 from your Pi-local-IP.
     
    How can I post my Pi sensor data to external clouds on the internet?
    PiHG is currently pre-configured to post data to; Emoncms, Xivley and CurrentCare
    They all follow the same process where you register on their site and get an API key code. This code is then added to the PiHG config file and data will be automatically posted to your chosen external cloud.
     
    Is my site secure?
    Unless someone knows your site name eg: MyNiceName.duckdns.org  it is unlikely to be found by anyone. But even if found the name and information will not mean anything to anybody. If someone found your site and tried to hack the site the utility Fail2ban has been installed to ban any further activity from the hacker IP. But if you are concerned PiHomeGuard can be configured to just post data to the local Catci or external clouds like EmonCMS which all have their own userid & password control.
     
    How many sensors do I need?
    This is a personal choice but even the basic power monitor system which comes with temperature monitor can be very useful. It can detect kettle power spikes, power highs like cooker left on and property temperature.

    I want PiHG but cant solder, can you provide ready made sensors?
    The initial goal is to raise enough funds to manufacture the PiHG board. If the campaign is successful providing ready made sensors could become an option. But you could buy a simple $10 soldering kit and learn yourself. Who knows, it could be the first step to a new career and open other opportunities. 
      
    Is it possible to add a display?
    Yes and this is recommended. For an additional $5 ( ebay search "I2C display pi" ) you can add your own I2C Keypad Plate direct to the Pi header.  Note: also works with Pi Zero.

    Using the on-board buttons this gives you the ability to:
    • Up  - Check your IP address & update duckdns.
    • Hold Right - Shutdown & Restart.
    • Hold Down - Shutdown & Halt.
    • Select - Display last sensor readings and help with sensor pairing.
    • Left - not used (yet).

    The software is pre-configured to run the above I2C Keypad Plate as default, the display is not needed but for the extra $5 you may find it very useful.
     
    What models of Pi are supported ?
    I've tested the current software running on the old Model B, newer B+ and Pi Zero.

    Will PiHG work on the Pi Zero ?
    Yes, PiHG can connect direct to the GPIO saving the Pi Zero usb port for 3gmodem or WiFi.
     

    How did all this start ?
     

    This is me and my Mum, taken before she took ill. We all have something we care about in life but the most important thing we value is usually our family and friends.

     

    About 3 years ago mum, then a widow, aged 89 was told by her doctor she could "go" at anytime and she was told to give up driving. Mum had Leukemia and her blood cell count levels had dropped sharply prompting her doctor to take action. Luckily I live nearby and although I visited her regularly I still wondered if I could do more to monitor her well being. Just by chance I'd been working on a power monitoring system at home using the Raspberry Pi and a Current Cost monitor. One of the first things I noticed when using this was the large 3kW kettle spike it gave when someone turned on their kettle, which shows the person is up and about making their breakfast. I thought this was ideal for checking that mum was all right. I decided to take things further and developed sensors for motion detection (PiR) and a door sensor to detect open/close activity.  Using the internet on my mobile I could then interrogate the system from home, at work and even when on holiday abroad and view mum as she went about her normal busy schedule.  
    An early version was called HomeCare Guardian;

    The vivid colours on the timeline identify movement in each room and the red line flags Front Door activity as mums heads out on her normal busy schedule. I ran this system for 18 months before mum sadly passed away. She died peacefully with her family at her side. She was very brave. After some months I thought maybe more people might have a similar need. My sister and I certainly found HomeGuard a great comfort and it helped alert us to several worrying situations.

     

    Risks

    PiHomeGuard is a low risk fixed funding project all we need is to sell enough boards to cover the manufacture costs, no heavy investment is needed.
     

    Other Ways You Can Help

    • Please get the word out and make your friends aware of the PiHG campaign.

    Many thanks and I look forward to your support,
    jamie

CurrentCare DashboardOr using a different API key in the config have the data hosted to the Current Care dashboard:
Virtual CottageYet another way to present the same data is to use the internal virtual cottage, all current main sensor data is presented on the one virtual icon;The chimney smoke, windows and door all change depending on sensor activity.  No room activity for 15mins & one panel grey, 30mins two panels grey, no activity for over one hour and curtains close.  Image can be displayed on your mobile device and gets updated every 5 mins.View a live presentation at:   http://www.pihomeguard.com/cottage

Sensor AlertingOne powerful feature is to have full control of any alerting on any sensor with the ability to have multiple alerts for the same sensor.
Any Day 1730-1930 High power use - Cooker left ON !
Any Day anytime - Front door left OPEN for >5mins !
Any Day No Kitchen activity by 9am, Is Mum Ok ?
Mon-Fri 0900-1700 Property Activity when you are at Work !
Any Day at 0900 - Battery Voltage of sensor# is below 2.2v !
Once a sensor alert has triggered you can decide when to repeat any further alerts. Sensor alerts currently have the option to use "IFTTT" or "Pushover", again configured by adding the appropriate API key to the config file. CactiYe another internal option is to use Cacti which has the ability to drill-down to a particular date and time and view any sensor data using your browser. Q and A
How do I find the Pi local IP address?Best way is to use a $6 IC Keypad Plate display, but with no display the Pi local IP can be found a number of ways:
 using a port scanner software like http://www.advanced-port-scanner.com

 or a mobile App called "Fing" for Android & iOS. 
Fing Android:https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=c...Fing iOS:https://itunes.apple.com/gb/app/fing-network-sc...
 
The power sensor is supplied ready made, why don't you supply all sensors in same fashion?This may happen eventually but the cost for sensor molds would hold back the launch. The final cost would also have to add sufficient margin to make the business risk worthwhile making most sensors cost double the kit price.I don't have broadband but do get a good 3g signal, can I still use HomeGuard?Yes the Pi software is configured to run as cable network, WiFi or even a 3g dongle.( Note: Recommended 3g dongle is the e220 )How can I host my Pi data on the internet?
You would normally need a fixed IP to host on the internet but another feature is the ability to use duckdns to allow external hosting. All you do is register your DuckDNS address at https://www.duckdns.org and then add your Duck DNS Token to your PiHG config file. You also have to configure your router to forward port 80 from your Pi-local-IP. 
How can I post my Pi sensor data to external clouds on the internet?PiHG is currently pre-configured to post data to; Emoncms, Xivley and CurrentCareThey all follow the same process where you register on their site and get an API key code. This code is then added to the PiHG config file and data will be automatically posted to your chosen external cloud. 
Is my site secure?Unless someone knows your site name eg: MyNiceName.duckdns.org  it is unlikely to be found by anyone. But even if found the name and information will not mean anything to anybody. If someone found your site and tried to hack the site the utility Fail2ban has been installed to ban any further activity from the hacker IP. But if you are concerned PiHomeGuard can be configured to just post data to the local Catci or external clouds like EmonCMS which all have their own userid & password control. How many sensors do I need?This is a personal choice but even the basic power monitor system which comes with temperature monitor can be very useful. It can detect kettle power spikes, power highs like cooker left on and property temperature.I want PiHG but cant solder, can you provide ready made sensors?The initial goal is to raise enough funds to manufacture the PiHG board. If the campaign is successful providing ready made sensors could become an option. But you could buy a simple $10 soldering kit and learn yourself. Who knows, it could be the first step to a new career and open other opportunities.   Is it possible to add a display?Yes and this is recommended. For an additional $5 ( ebay search "I2C display pi" ) you can add your own I2C Keypad Plate direct to the Pi header.  Note: also works with Pi Zero.Using the on-board buttons this gives you the ability to:
Up  - Check your IP address & update duckdns.
Hold Right - Shutdown & Restart.
Hold Down - Shutdown & Halt.
Select - Display last sensor readings and help with sensor pairing.
Left - not used (yet).

The software is pre-configured to run the above I2C Keypad Plate as default, the display is not needed but for the extra $5 you may find it very useful. What models of Pi are supported ?I've tested the current software running on the old Model B, newer B+ and Pi Zero.
Will PiHG work on the Pi Zero ?Yes, PiHG can connect direct to the GPIO saving the Pi Zero usb port for 3gmodem or WiFi. How did all this start ? This is me and my Mum, taken before she took ill. We all have something we care about in life but the most important thing we value is usually our family and friends. About 3 years ago mum, then a widow, aged 89 was told by her doctor she could "go" at anytime and she was told to give up driving. Mum had Leukemia and her blood cell count levels had dropped sharply prompting her doctor to take action. Luckily I live nearby and although I visited her regularly I still wondered if I could do more to monitor her well being. Just by chance I'd been working on a power monitoring system at home using the Raspberry Pi and a Current Cost monitor. One of the first things I noticed when using this was the large 3kW kettle spike it gave when someone turned on their kettle, which shows the person is up and about making their breakfast. I thought this was ideal for checking that mum was all right. I decided to take things further and developed sensors for motion detection (PiR) and a door sensor to detect open/close activity.  Using the internet on my mobile I could then interrogate the system from home, at work and even when on holiday abroad and view mum as she went about her normal busy schedule.  An early version was called HomeCare Guardian;The vivid colours on the timeline identify movement in each room and the red line flags Front Door activity as mums heads out on her normal busy schedule. I ran this system for 18 months before mum sadly passed away. She died peacefully with her family at her side. She was very brave. After some months I thought maybe more people might have a similar need. My sister and I certainly found HomeGuard a great comfort and it helped alert us to several worrying situations. 
Risks
PiHomeGuard is a low risk fixed funding project all we need is to sell enough boards to cover the manufacture costs, no heavy investment is needed. 

Other Ways You Can Help
Please get the word out and make your friends aware of the PiHG campaign.
Many thanks and I look forward to your support,jamie

story:
BangleCharger is the first iPhone USB charger you can carry at your wrist!

BangleCharger is a lightning cable you can use as a stylish bracelet and always have with you.


Do you often travel around and find yourself lacking battery juice for your iPhone?
BangleCharger is made just for you.

  • Carry your cable always with you, as a nice bracelet
  • High charge capacity, as fast as the official Apple cable
  • High quality elastomer and nickel free plate
  • Charge and sync functions


Design

BangleCharger is designed to be handy and useful, while keeping its nature as a fashion element.

It's not just a techie product or a cable you wrap around your wrist, it's an elegant piece of design you can wear anywhere and anytime, without worrying about it.

BangleCharger is available in two colors: deep black and snow white.


Specifications

However, BangleCharger is not a common bracelet.

When your iPhone needs some charge, just unwrap your BangleCharger and plug it into your phone and on a power outlet - a battery bank, or a wall plug.

BangleCharger features a lightning connector on one side and a classic USB plug on the other side. That makes it a fully featured USB cable.

The USB plug is golden plated to guarantee a fast charge and file transfer up to 480Mbps

The Lightning plug is just like the official Apple plug. It offers full iPhone, iPad and iPod compatibility and supports fast charge - if the power source can handle that!

Manufacturing

We found materials, pieces, manufacturer and logistic companies to help us in this adventure. BangleCharger is going to enter the manufacturing state in the first weeks of May - if this campaign goes well enough! That's why we're here on Indiegogo: we'd like to get our first pre-orders and some money to purchase our further goals. Stretch goals will be available later this month, feel free to get in touch with us with your suggestions!
Here you are some photos of our manufacturing company, in the phase of assembling a product and testing a cable (that's a BangleCharger prototype).

We already have final prototypes and they are simply amazing. However, we are just three young guys from Italy, not a big company. BangleCharger production might suffer from some delays depending on material availability.

Anyway, the manufacturing company has shown to be very reliable and fast, so we're really, really confident that everything will follow our plan.

The Team

The BangleCharger team is made of three people, two engineers and an industrial designers.

We are Michele, Mariarita and Luca, the inventors of BangleCharger. We designed it to be handy and nice, and to offer high technology specifications.

story:
Introducing KoJack

Bluetooth Everything, Everywhere!

Kojack is the worlds most affordable Bluetooth audio jack!

If you're like me, you were surprised to find out that you couldn't plug your headphones in to your brand new phone that you just dropped all that money on! You have that ultimate stereo system that you wish you could send music to from your phone without all those extra cords? Are you fumbling for your phone to plug into the aux cable in your car to listen to your tunes? Perhaps worst of all, those expensive headphones you just bought won't work with your device now!

How Can Kojack Help You?

You don't need to go out and buy new speakers, headphones or stereo equipment to hook up to Bluetooth devices anymore. Heck, with Kojack you don't even need a Bluetooth device to send audio over Bluetooth. You read that right. Kojack offers 2 versions! We are offering a KoJack Rx (which is a Bluetooth receiver) and a KoJack Tx (which is a Bluetooth receiver). This way I can use the KoJack Rx to send Bluetooth audio from my laptop which is not Bluetooth enabled to my home audio system, which also does not have built in Bluetooth. Therefore making the sending and receiving gear Bluetooth capable which previously was not!

KoJack is a very small and versatile device, 

Which means that you can take it with you anywhere!

 

Features of the KoJack

  • Transmitter & Receiver available
  • Incredibly Small
  • aptX Capable
  • A2DP Capable
  • Universal Micro USB Charging
  • Simple Single Button Control
  • Automatic Pairing

 

How Does KoJack Save You Money?

No need to buy expensive Bluetooth capable devices because the KoJack can be connected to any audio device to add Bluetooth capabilities. The KoJack devices can save you money because you won't need to replace your expensive audio equipment. You can simply add KoJack! Not to mention with as affordable as KoJack is, you can buy multiple transmitters and receivers to live up to our tag line; Bluetooth Everything, Everywhere!

What does KoJack come with?

In order to keep prices down, we have decided to keep the package simple. With each KoJack Rx or KoJack Tx Device will come a Micro-USB charging cable and a 3.5mm Aux cable only as all other adaptrers are readily available at nearly any local electronics store. So what are you waiting for?

story:
NanoGtech™ is applied as a film to the back of a smartphone or on the inside of a case. As the NanoGtech™ material stays in contact with the back of the device, it effectively dissipates heat from the smartphone. The temperature is reduced and tests show that a device with NanoGtech™ can last up to 20% longer than a device without NanoGtech™

 

During this campaign, we will be supporting the iPhone devices below. Please note that you choose you model after you select your perk. We are pleased to announce that we offer free world-wide delivery.

*iPhone 7 (also works for iPhone 6) 

*iPhone 7 Plus

*iPhone 8

*iPhone 8 Plus

*iPhone X

NanoCase's™ slim design fits your iPhone perfectly and adds protection in addition to saving your battery. NanoSticker™ in grey graphene is the perfect choice if you want to change between different cases, but still save battery by up to 20% thanks to the graphene material.

FACTS BEHIND THE SUPER-MATERIAL GRAPHENE

• Graphene is a form of carbon similar to graphite, but is unlike graphite only one atomic layer thick. It was discovered in the 60’s and was first investigated in 2004 by Andre Geimand Konstantin Novoselov, who won the 2010 Nobel Prize in Physics for this. Scientists and industry call graphene "a new super material". Graphene is 100 times stronger than steel but is extremely light, thin and flexible. The material conducts electricity more efficiently than copper and 200 times better than silicon.

• Graphene is one atom-layer thick. A gram of Graphene can cover a football field. 

• It conducts heat 10 times better than copper. 

• At room temperature, it can conduct electricity faster than any known substance and 250x more

than silicon. 

• Graphene, a monolayer of carbon atoms in a honeycomb lattice, is the thinnest material ever isolated and studied. It has unique electrical, mechanical and optical properties governed by unusual and fascinating physics that until a few years ago existed only in the minds of theoretical physicists. The material is today one of the hottest research topics in the world,

• Graphene is a wonder material with many superlatives to its name. It is the thinnest known material in the universe and the strongest ever measured. Its charge carriers exhibit giant intrinsic mobility, have zero effective mass, and can travel for micrometers without scattering at room temperature. Want to know more? Download Pdf here.

Shield Patrol is both a supplier and manufacturer of mobile accessories with brands such as Copter™, CasePower™, Trophy™. We offer expertise within power, screen protection, sound and cases. Our latest addition is an innovative graphene technology called NanoGtech™ with products such as NanoCase™ and NanoSticker™.

How do I select the device type?

Once you hit the perk you want, you can choose your iPhone model

Does the NanoCase™ and NanoSticker™ come in any other colors?

Right now, we can offer solid matte black NanoCase™ and dark grey NanoSticker™.

Can I still use my headphones with the NanoCase™

Yes, absolutely, the case will not affect this part.

Can I use my own case with NanoSticker™?

Yes, if you have a case that you like, use the NanoSticker™ and save up to 20% battery.

What device do you support?

During this campaign, you can choose NanoCase™ and NanoSticker™ for iPhone:

*iPhone 7 (also works for iPhone 6)

*iPhone 7 Plus

*iPhone 8

*iPhone 8 Plus

*iPhone X

Will you support other devices?

Yes, we are developing for other devices right now. Subscribe to our newsletter to get the latest info and updates.

How does it work?

The graphene on the back of the case / sticker dissipates heat and cools your electronic device, which extends the battery life of a smartphone with up to 20%

Why not use a battery case?

Battery cases are a lot thicker and bulky. If you want a really thin and nice device use the NanoSticker™, if you also want more protection use the NanoCase™ 

Will the NanoCase™ and NanoSticker work with wireless charging?

Yes, this will still work perfectly.

Why did you launch on Indiegogo?

Indiegogo is a fantastic way to launch new products and reach new audience. This is also a good way for us to raise money to develop cases for more phones and more innovative products.

When will shipping begin?

We will start to ship right after the campaign is over. Mid Feb 2018.

Can I change my delivery address?

Full instructions on how to make adjustments to your delivery address can be found here

If you still have questions?

You can either post a comment or email: info@nanocase.com 

 

Risks and Challenges

The advantage of this project is that we have finished products ready to ship. We have quality assured and adjusted minor changes and improved both the case material of NanoCase and the adhesive surface of NanoSticker. This means there are few risks with this project because the product already exists. The challenges that may arise are longer delivery times if demand is high.

 

Thank you!

Thank you for supporting us on this project. If you have any questions, feel free to contact us info@nanocase.com

We have quality assured and adjusted minor changes and improved both the case material of NanoCase and the adhesive surface of NanoSticker. This means there are few risks with this project because the product already exists. The challenges that may arise are longer delivery times if demand is high. Thank you!Thank you for supporting us on this project. If you have any questions, feel free to contact us info@nanocase.com

story:
Welcome MacBook users!

Since the far 2006, the reliable and convenient connector for the power cable - MagSafe - has appeared in the MacBook laptop line. They key advantage was the presence of a magnet holding MagSafe during charging and if you accidentally hit the cable, the connector disconnected, preventing the laptop from falling and cable damage.

White and stylish power supply had a significant drawback - when the cable or connector was damaged, you had to buy a new one and it’s quite expensive.

 

Since 2012 Apple has changed the power plug standard. This way the new MagSafe 2 appeared. Retaining the benefits of magnetic plugs, MagSafe 2 turned out to be incompatible with the former MacBook models. In 2016 Apple gave up on MagSafe type of power plugs in new laptops in favor of USB-C plugs. The new improvement of Apple power adapters enabled to disconnect the charging cable, but left the former MacBook models incompatible.

Anwires cables have solved the problem of the indispensability of the "Apple" MagSafe connector! Now you can recharge the MacBook’s using any power source with a USB-C connector, which is very easy to find today.

We, the ANWires team, decided to combine all the benefits of the Magsafe, Magsafe 2 and USB-C connectors in an innovative cable to charge your MacBook with a new power supply.

ANWires Cables is a simple idea, but we believe it can impact the world in a BIG way.

 

We’re still a new start up that's been launched with our personal savings so that’s why we need your help. You can support by pledging and sharing the campaign on social media.

 

We are ready instant shipment first part ANWires cables, immediately after finish funding!


Please, if you have any questions or inquiries, visit our site www.anwires.com or send us a e-mail: anwires.ee@gmail.com and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

story:
Oh my goodness. We know when it comes to missing chargers, #thstruggleisreal!

“Where’s my charger?”

“Who took my charger?”

“Did you take my charger?”

Sound familiar?

Yep, we KNOW how frustrating it is when your phone is about to die and you go to plug it in only to find out someone else took your charging cord...AGAIN! We feel your pain - that’s why we invented USBthere!

 

 

This super simple system is Apple, Android and USB C compatible and locks charging cords and cube into the wall. The USBthere system includes a special security screw so no one can swipe it.

With USBthere, your charging cord will ALWAYS be there!

The USBthere kit includes:

✅ USBthere bracket

✅ 3-in-1 retractable USB cord (Apple, Android & Type C compatible)

✅ 5V, 1A charging cube

✅ Security screw and key

What We Need:

  • We have been approached by an As Seen on TV producer and are seeking $25,000 to launch an As Seen on TV campaign.
  • Funds will be used to produce a 2-minute commercial and air-time for the campaign.
  • Money raised will also go toward manufacturing additional units as well as updating current packaging to make it retail-ready. 

The Impact:

  • USBthere solves a real, every-day problem for families, as well as businesses (hospital waiting rooms, cafes, coffee shops, libraries, etc.). In the first 45 days on the market, we've had more than $5,000 in sales. We KNOW there is a need, we just need help spreading the word that a SIMPLE solution is here!

  • Our initial marketing efforts on Facebook took off like wildfire. We've had more than 230 shares of our ad and reached 43K people. We've had more than 1,000 website visits within the first 10 days.

    In addition to selling directly on our website, we are now also available via Amazon Prime.

 

Risks & Challenges

Like any start-up there are risks, but we are confident we have a product that solves an everyday problem. The USBthere is currently manufactured in Bradenton, Florida. The kits are packaged in our home #startup. We are in the process of looking into out-sourcing the packaging process in order to keep up with the demand.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you're not able to financially back our project we'd appreciate you helping us spread the word by following us on social media and sharing it with a friend (or 5,000!)

FB.com/USBthere

IG.com/USBthere

www.USBthere.shop

Oh my goodness. We know when it comes to missing chargers, #thstruggleisreal!
“Where’s my charger?”
“Who took my charger?”
“Did you take my charger?”
Sound familiar?
Yep, we KNOW how frustrating it is when your phone is about to die and you go to plug it in only to find out someone else took your charging cord...AGAIN! We feel your pain - that’s why we invented USBthere!



 

 


This super simple system is Apple, Android and USB C compatible and locks charging cords and cube into the wall. The USBthere system includes a special security screw so no one can swipe it.
With USBthere, your charging cord will ALWAYS be there!
The USBthere kit includes:
✅ USBthere bracket
✅ 3-in-1 retractable USB cord (Apple, Android & Type C compatible)
✅ 5V, 1A charging cube
✅ Security screw and key



What We Need:

We have been approached by an As Seen on TV producer and are seeking $25,000 to launch an As Seen on TV campaign.
Funds will be used to produce a 2-minute commercial and air-time for the campaign.
Money raised will also go toward manufacturing additional units as well as updating current packaging to make it retail-ready. 



The Impact:

USBthere solves a real, every-day problem for families, as well as businesses (hospital waiting rooms, cafes, coffee shops, libraries, etc.). In the first 45 days on the market, we've had more than $5,000 in sales. We KNOW there is a need, we just need help spreading the word that a SIMPLE solution is here!

Our initial marketing efforts on Facebook took off like wildfire. We've had more than 230 shares of our ad and reached 43K people. We've had more than 1,000 website visits within the first 10 days.
In addition to selling directly on our website, we are now also available via Amazon Prime.



 

Risks & Challenges
Like any start-up there are risks, but we are confident we have a product that solves an everyday problem. The USBthere is currently manufactured in Bradenton, Florida. The kits are packaged in our home #startup. We are in the process of looking into out-sourcing the packaging process in order to keep up with the demand.

Other Ways You Can Help
If you're not able to financially back our project we'd appreciate you helping us spread the word by following us on social media and sharing it with a friend (or 5,000!)
FB.com/USBthere
IG.com/USBthere
www.USBthere.shop

story:
Why we invented the Pocketsy?

Women clothing mostly comes with small or without pockets. So we end up carrying a handbag, despite there being so many things that are more enjoyable when our hands are free- And that’s seriously annoying!  For that reason over 80% of women may carry valuables in their bra, where it looks bulky, is not very comfortable and items such as phones might get sweaty- No more!!! 

 

Hi- I’m Paula, I’m the co-founder of the pocketsy. I didn’t like carrying a bag when I was out and using a bra to carry my valuables came with too many disadvantages. But I still thought that a Bra was quite the perfect spot for a woman to put her stuff. So I started searching for a bra with pockets, that would be my perfect all-in one solution. But it DIDN’T EXIST! All the pocket bra’s I found had three main problems:

 

They looked functional and not like something I’d want to wear.

The pockets were to small or not integrated. 

The pockets weren’t easily accessible, and you kind of had to take off your clothes to access them … not very practical. 

 

So I teamed up with Dilara, my co-founder, who had been looking for the perfect mug-safe Bra for traveling. 

And this is how we got on our way to develop a STYLISH, SAFE, COMFORTABLE and SWEAT PROOF bra with pockets. - The Pocketsy! 

 

 

 

 

3 Pockets for your daily adventure

 

Slide Pocket

 

Money Pocket

 

Zipper Pocket

 

Our Pocketsy Styles

 

Lace Bralette

             

 

 

Lace Bralette with customizable accessories (choose from straps, chains, ribbon) 

            

               

 

All Jersey Bra-Top

               

All Jersey Bra-Top with customizable accessories (choose from straps, chains, ribbon) 

 

Our Mission

Our Mission is to make high quality products that facilitate women daily lives. 
Our products are sourced and manufactured in a way that is good for our community and  
environment. 

Risks & Challenges

The last 10 months have been an incredible rollercoaster, full of learnings. But we are so proud and happy to finally be able to make our first production. We understand and acknowledge that no project comes without risks and challenges. Despite our planning, there are circumstances that may be out of our control. If we are met with these, we promise to communicate with full transparency to you. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Visit us on instagram: https://www.instagram.com/pocketsy_cologne/
  • Share our Campaign page
  • Share us on Social Media
  • contact us info@pocketsy.de

story:
Leave it to Azpen to recreate the meaning of a Docking Station! 

If most people are like us, then they have cords and adaptors all over the house and office to keep all of their fancy technology charged. You might have an adaptor in one AC outlet with your phone plugged to it, then another adaptor plugged in for your tablet. Then you have your Bluetooth speaker system plugged into another wall and even a few more plugs to charge a kids tablet and a portable speakerphone for conference calls. 

It’s very ironic that we are in the age of “Wireless”, yet we have so many “Wires” all over the house. It’s time to condense these wires to a more manageable amount. The Azpen DockAlls main goal is to just do that. It’s purpose is to give you a central location to charge your phones, tablets as well to be your media headquarters with a near HIFI quality Bluetooth speaker system plus more. Azpen does all of this with just one simple plug into an AC outlet. 

The DockAll is a simple to use docking station that looks wonderful anywhere in the house.  In fact, when you start using it, you will find that you will want more than one throughout your home or office.

A relatively small device, measuring nearly 7 inch (173mm) square, but this small package is loaded with features. The main features of the Azpen DockAll D1300 are: 

  • Qi Wireless charging built-in
  • Wired charging (MFI Certified Lightning & MicroUSB Magnetic Adaptors)
  • 4.0 Bluetooth HIFI Speaker System (5 watts x 2)
  • Two HIFI Speakers with dual reflex ports in back 
  • LED Light/Lamp 
  • Can support phones and tablets up to 13 inches
  • Phone and music controls 
  • Speakerphone 
  • Two USB jacks in back for additional charging use 
  • MicroSD card slot in back for direct playback of music 

The Azpen DockAll D1300 is a full featured docking station for your latest technology, but all of this design is not coming at an incredibly out-of-reach price. The DockAll should retail for less than $100 in most design forms at a retailer near you. 

Once customers see the versatility of the Azpen DockAll, they will quickly find out that they will actually want more than one in their home.

 

Detailed Specs:

  • Processor: CPU: CW6687E 
  • Bluetooth 4.0: Support MP3/SBC/WMA decoder
  • Bluetooth Stereo Speakers: 5 Watts x 2
  • Wireless Charging: BQ50002 BQ500511
  • DC: 9V 3A 
  • Buttons: Capacitive touch Play/Pause Next/Last Mode
  • USB Port: USB1 1A USB2 2A
  • MFI Certified Lightning plug: 1A 
  • MicroSD Card Slot: Support up to 64GB 
  • Qi Wireless Charging Supported Mobile Phone/Tablet: Samsung Galaxy S7, S6/Edge, S5, Note 4 Google Nexus 4-7 LG, Sony, HTC and Motorola phones (Must have built in wireless charging feature) (Dockall Qi default layout is configured for the Samsung S7, all other devices might need to be placed at different angles for optimal charging speeds) 
  • Wire Charging: Lighting Connectors iPhone 5s/6s/6 Plus iPhone 7 and other iPad with MFI Certified Lightning connector adaptor.  MicroUSB Connectors All tablets or phones with micro USB connectors 
  • Size: 172mm x 173mm x 95mm - 6.77" x 6.81" x 3.74" 
  • UPC: 859592006217

 

Risks and possible challenges:

Our management team has the ability to create, design, and implement these solutions with a proven track record of bringing new technologies and products to market and making them available to our customers.

We have been testing the beta version of the DockAll for a month and are glad to inform you that we are in the final stages of this process and can’t wait to bring this new variation of the Docking Station to our Indiegogo contributors. We don’t foresee any delays but need the help of our community to stay on track and launch this product.

With our strong development team, production capabilities, logistic partners, and highly trained employees, were fully confident on getting this product to market on time.

* MFi Program.  Apple Inc.'s MFi Program ("Made for iPhone/iPod/iPad") is a licensing program for developers of hardware and software peripherals that work with Apple's iPod, iPad and iPhone. The name is a shortened version of the original long-form Made For iPod.

story:
About Realstrategy

Realstrategy is a premium Video On Demand platform that teaches you strategy and how to apply it in business, marketing and politics. It offers an interesting and entertaining teaching format. You can learn in an engaging way the most efective techniques and tactics used by the big political, business and marketing strategists worldwide. You can access our comprehensive content library on strategy on any device: smart TV, mobile, tablet or your computer in a clear and user-friendly format.

The service is currently available in Spanish and Portuguese, but we are aware of the needs of the English-speaking market and with your help as a partner we will translate and create new content in English.

What we need from you

Producing and creating new content worthy of the Realstrategy quality seal requires not only the technical skills, but commitment to one’s dreams. As a platform and as a team, we understand this and we develop strategies for each phase for our project. For this particular phase we need you: what’s at stake is more than the future of our platform, it’s the success of your strategy.

As a platform and as a team, we understand this and we develop strategies for each phase for our project. For this particular phase we need you: what’s at stake is more than the future of our platform, it’s the success of your strategy.

Our team

Content creation

Writers specialized in strategic content for each of our channels. We take the content a step further, delving into big ideas but using a simple, down-to-earth language.

Audiovisual production.

Here’s where our content comes to life, through movement, animation and the best production. It’s through our audiovisual esence that we achieve the entertaining touch of our content. The producers, animators and makers of our team will make sure you won’t take your eyes off the screen.

Digital arts

Realstrategy has a team of digital artists, designers and illustrators that give our content its unique identity, worthy of the quality seal of our brand.

Web development

Developers are the ones involved in designing, coding and keeping the final user’s needs in mind. RealStrategy’s team has an ever-evolving group of developers that guarantees an outstanding product and an unforgettable experience with each click.

Social media

With the development of clear strategies and the choice of content, each of our areas works under our team of community managers. They apply their knowledge of digital marketing and audiences in the creation of communities and manage these communities based on our content.

How we will use the funds

  • Translation (20%)
  • Dubbing (40%)
  • Artwork translation (20%)
  • Audiovisual production (20%)

story:
IThanks®

IThanks is a personalized service, that allows users to be grateful to each other. Thank people and they will get real money. It’s absolutely free for you. Each person who received gratitude will get money from our company. Each IThanks is worth 0,10 $.

Be the change you want to see in the world. We humbly ask to be grateful to the world and the world, undoubtedly, will be grateful in return. Every person is important. That is why we created this product – to improve everyone’s life.

 

Product/Service Details

IThanks - Service of the World of Grateful People
Service allows its users to express gratitude to each other by sending IThanks. IThanks can be earned by completing tasks provided through the IThanks app by our partners or bought online. Depending on IThanks received the Citizen (IThanks user) can increase his rating and get other awards. IThanks allows Citizens to communicate by sending text, photo and video messages.

Citizen can find places on map to post comments and thoughts on their work and thank them.
IThanks is available to any device with internet connection (Portal and Site), there are native apps for IOS and Android also. 


IThanks allows additional monetization of online and offline businesses. Any business owner can register as an IThanks partner and receive thanks from Citizens. This will be a significant form of gratitude unlike simple likes, okays and other forms of gratitude. 


 

 

Traction & Accomplishments

IThanks is a unique system that any person or any company can join. People can join by registering as a Citizen of Ithanks by using IOS, Android app or Portal. Companies can join by registering on a website. After confirming their credentials information about a new partner will be added to IThanks service.
Any online business can use IThanks button so that their customers and users can express their gratitude directly on the web.

Any complex social network or application can use IThanks complex integration to allow its users to thank each other. This way our partner also receives a financial reward as well as a Citizen who received an IThanks.

How We're Different

Every successful project has a strong financial side as well as social recognition. Big projects improve people’s life. We strive to make a better life on planet, but individual support is essential for global changes. We are searching for people who share IThanks vision and want to create a World of Grateful People.


If you like the project please send us your e-mail on https://soon.ithanks.com/, so you’ll let us know that you support us. Please, if you can, tell your friends about our system and support us with money. Each dollar can help us develop our system and help billions of people.

 

Test Product


If you want to look at our product, please, follow this link for Android, or send me your e-mail for IOS version of the app.

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=r...

story:
HyCarb, "The Battery With A Conscience"!

Imagine... being part of something bigger than yourselves... Something with unlimited potential for growth that will help power future generations in our ever more mobile society. By donating what you spend on just one night out on the town you will help create a movement that will help bring this and other clean technologies to fruition. One that you can be proud of. An outcome that you, your children and your children's children will benefit from. This is an opportunity to be part of a legacy, a dream campaign that touches nearly every aspect of life.

Can something as simple as a battery change the world as we know it? It has before.  

Even though tech has grown & changed over the last 100 years one thing that has not been keeping up is the battery that we use to run it all. 

Imagine... A battery

* that will last 5X longer on a single charge

* that will charge 5X faster

* that is less toxic

* that is almost 100% recyclable, and

* that won't catch fire

HyCarb, Inc., was created to change the way we generate, store, and use energy. The name “HyCarb” is a combination of the words “Hydrogen” and “Carbon”. Our vision is to help minimize the carbon footprint on the planet. Your contributions will play a significant role in this paradigm shift from dirty to clean energy harvesting, storage, and end-use technologies. With your help, HyCarb will launch our next-generation batteries.

HyCarb’s first product will be a less toxic, long-lasting, environmentally-friendly and safer battery to alleviate the universal pain point of antiquated energy storage systems (i.e. batteries) The battery touches every aspect of our lives in this exciting, new “Digital Age”. HyCarb is using one of the newest, most advanced carbon materials from its four (4) exclusive, all-fields-of-use, patents that will allow us to build you this improved, innovative battery.

Ask yourself, “Would I enjoy my phone, camera, and laptop more if my batteries lasted five (5) times longer, charged five (5) times faster, and didn’t have to be replaced for up to five (5) plus years?” …and ask yourself, “Would I feel better using my electronic devices knowing that they are safer, less toxic, and recyclable?” 

Our patented graphene and carbon nanotube technologies have been proven in state-of-the-art labs. What we need NOW is $50,000 to complete our first five (5) prototype, coin-cell batteries. The successful completion of these coin cell batteries will allow us to create jobs in America and compete for a slice of a 6 Billion Unit per year market.

Use of funds:

Total Indiegogo Goal - $50,000

  • SPECIAL FORMULATION & FABRICATION OF HYCARB, INC.’S FIRST 10 ELECTRODES (5 ANODES, 5 CATHODES) - $25,000
  • ASSEMBLY & TESTING OF FIRST 5 COIN CELL BATTERIES - $10,000
  • TRAVEL AND MARKETING MATERIALS TO MEET WITH SERIES A INVESTORS TO BUILD 10 DIFFERENT SIZED PROTOTYPE BATTERIES AND/OR SUPERCONDUCTORS FOR CELL PHONES, VIDEO CAMERAS, ELECTRIC VEHICLES, ETC. - $10,000
  • ATTORNEY AND ACCOUNTANT FEES - $5,000
All funds raised in excess of the $50,000 will go towards minimizing the the $3 Million dollars necessary to complete the business infrastructure & personnel needed to continue innovating the other different types of batteries for cell phones, cameras, tablets, and laptops to start.
We would like to invite you to be part of the movement out there supporting solutions to pollution by contributing to HyCarb's campaign...!  

Please stay tuned for other exciting innovations from HyCarb once we get this battery into your hands... 

So you may ask, what's next on the horizon?...

...Our mission is to find uses for carbon that are so valuable that it makes no sense to waste carbon dioxide out our smokestacks and tailpipes when we burn fossil fuels. “Hydrogen” is a pollution-free fuel. “Carbon” is a precious element found in diamonds and will be used by HyCarb to create: 

  • Batteries
  • Brand new solar panels
  • Supercapacitors
  • Electrolyzers
  • Sensors
  • Filters
  • Fuel cells
  • and much, much more.

HyCarb is using one of the newest, most advanced carbon materials from its four (4) exclusive, all-fields-of-use, patents that will allow us to build you this improved, innovative battery.
Ask yourself, “Would I enjoy my phone, camera, and laptop more if my batteries lasted five (5) times longer, charged five (5) times faster, and didn’t have to be replaced for up to five (5) plus years?” …and ask yourself, “Would I feel better using my electronic devices knowing that they are safer, less toxic, and recyclable?” 
Our patented graphene and carbon nanotube technologies have been proven in state-of-the-art labs. What we need NOW is $50,000 to complete our first five (5) prototype, coin-cell batteries. The successful completion of these coin cell batteries will allow us to create jobs in America and compete for a slice of a 6 Billion Unit per year market.
Use of funds:
Total Indiegogo Goal - $50,000

SPECIAL FORMULATION & FABRICATION OF HYCARB, INC.’S FIRST 10 ELECTRODES (5 ANODES, 5 CATHODES) - $25,000

ASSEMBLY & TESTING OF FIRST 5 COIN CELL BATTERIES - $10,000

TRAVEL AND MARKETING MATERIALS TO MEET WITH SERIES A INVESTORS TO BUILD 10 DIFFERENT SIZED PROTOTYPE BATTERIES AND/OR SUPERCONDUCTORS FOR CELL PHONES, VIDEO CAMERAS, ELECTRIC VEHICLES, ETC. - $10,000

ATTORNEY AND ACCOUNTANT FEES - $5,000

All funds raised in excess of the $50,000 will go towards minimizing the the $3 Million dollars necessary to complete the business infrastructure & personnel needed to continue innovating the other different types of batteries for cell phones, cameras, tablets, and laptops to start.
We would like to invite you to be part of the movement out there supporting solutions to pollution by contributing to HyCarb's campaign...!  
Please stay tuned for other exciting innovations from HyCarb once we get this battery into your hands... So you may ask, what's next on the horizon?...
...Our mission is to find uses for carbon that are so valuable that it makes no sense to waste carbon dioxide out our smokestacks and tailpipes when we burn fossil fuels. “Hydrogen” is a pollution-free fuel. “Carbon” is a precious element found in diamonds and will be used by HyCarb to create: 

Batteries
Brand new solar panels
Supercapacitors
Electrolyzers
Sensors
Filters
Fuel cells
and much, much more.

story:
The purpose of this campaign is to fund the first serial production of the product.

Product description
The product consist in a high efficiency solar film attachable to mobile phones or similar portable devices to eliminate the need of recharging, or extend the battery capacity (by 62% for bussiness user in low light environments) and life.
This eco-friendly product reduces the disposal of Li-ion bateries whichs contaminates soil and pollutes the water.
The device provides a micro USB connection (standard on most of the portable devices) and a female micro USB plug-in to avoid disconnecting the product for data exchange or even to connect an external charger. Optional Apple Lightining connector available.
The installation is simple! Paste the film to the back of your device and plug the micro USB connector, and you are ready to go.

Product Characteristics

Connector: micro USB or Apple Lightning (male for charging - female to host other devices)

Size: 60 mm x 104 mm (2.36" x 4.09") - Suitable for Iphone 5

Width: 2.58 mm (0.10")

Weight: 35g (1.2 oz)

Project status
A proof of concept has been successfully prototyped and tested. The final product is ready for serial production.
First serial sample tested.
The product delivery is planned to start 30 days after the project funding.

You can select the design of the cable from the film to your device from the following designs:

We will contact you to know your selection.
As an accesory, you can have the an USB data cable with the same design.

story:
Remember back in 80s when you spent hours at the gaming centre on those coin-op arcades, and dove deep into the world of video games features simple 8-bit music?  We love the 80s as much as you do, that’s why we set out to create GameSir Marsback, the device for you to turn your smartphone into a Mini Arcade in Seconds!

We are living in the age of smartphones, but swiping your oily finger on the smartphone screen might not be the best way to achieve top performance. With GameSir Marsback, simply slide your phone into it, and it will instantly be transformed into a mini Arcade, and you can relive the golden age of video games with a mini arcade that fits in the palm of your hand.  

Transform In Seconds!

The GameSir Marsback is unlike anything you have ever seen before. All you need to do is connect your phone to Marsback via Bluetooth, you can start experiencing the fun of playing by its joystick and buttons. GameSir Marsback brings back the nostelgia!

Infinite Compatibility

Longing for more retro game? We’ve got you covered! Happy Chick Emulator is the No.1 choice for gamers, whether Android phone or iPhone can run this emulator app smoothly. With this emulator installed, you will have unlimited access to classic games that recall your childhood memories. Forget about finding space for a full arcade cabinet!

Unmatched Flexibility

We’ve spent years on product optimization, and both the joystick and button responsiveness are adjusted based upon gamer comments. There will be no input lag.

Take It Anywhere You Go

We have carefully designed the look of Marsback and strive for the perfect balance between a retro look and pocket-friendly size. This palm’s tiny gadget features interface slot that allows you to play anytime and anywhere.

Simple Is The Best

It is easy to get caught in the rat race of modern life, and our society’s addictive pattern of life has extended to gaming; modern games are designed to squeeze the most of your time and money. Marsback adheres to the ideology is “simple is the best”, you can enjoy the original retro games without a catch!

Use GameSir Marsback To Play Games On Android Phone

Use GameSir Marsback To Play Games On iPhone

GameSir is a leading innovative technology company engaged in smart devices, game
development and platform services. The sales of GameSir controller has been crowned top among online e-commerce platforms as of today. GameSir's products are designed to optimise the user's gaming experience and create more fun to life. The latest Marsback a mini classic arcade console is dedicated to add more colour and convenient in a fast-paced world.

Through the collaboration with the manufacture, we are able to refine and shape our product to ensure its quality, and make it a step closer to perfection. To make sure our supporters can promptly receive their orders, we dispatched our staff to the factory for site progress inspection, and to keep up with the progress of the project.

To improve backers’ satisfaction, we’ve stepped up the release of project updates and inspections, logistic arrangements have also been made. However, there are risk factors beyond our control, including:

1. Product Certification Delay - Each part of our product must be tested and approved by an independent agency.

2. Lead time delay - Our manufacturer is in China, and this year’s CNY falls in February, the factory will close for days and it may affect the lead time. However, we are confident that we can deliver the product in time. If there is any delay in the production, we will promptly  inform our backers and keep our progress transparent to the community.

story:
“The motivation behind the berry was simple; create a modern plug-n-play device which refines economy and power”

– Aaron Hunter, Berry Robotics Founder


The Berry system is the world’s most advanced automotive computer system.  By modifying your vehicles existing computer, the berry is able to intelligently refine your engine to increase engine performance by proven tests of up to 28% or decrease fuel consumption by up to 10%.  With smartphone Bluetooth connectivity, users are also able to connect wirelessly to any smartphone to view real time performance data, fuel consumption, engine gauges and a whole lot more!

Easy Installation:

With a one button installation, anyone can install a berry in a matter of minutes.  As the Berry system does not change ANY factory settings on the vehicles default computer, it will not void manufacturer’s warranty and is reversible at any time by simply removing the system from the On Board Diagnostic connection found under the steering wheel column of most makes.


Your choice of 3 Berry's


Automotive manufacturers deliberately de-tune an engine’s ECU (Engine Control Unit) by utilizing a ‘generic’ setting within the software so that tuning can be safely averaged for mass produced vehicles not tailoring for individual circumstances. For this reason, engines are not able to run at optimum power and efficiency due to varying factors including climate, fuel quality variations, laws & restrictions, altitude and driving habits.
The Berry system automatically interprets data from various sensors within the engine and provides the ECU with a world first live modified map within the software to give the absolute optimum efficiency of the vehicle for not only fuel economy, but torque, power and throttle response. 

About the Founder

" From his teenage years as an avid fanatic with everything from advanced mechanical projects and auto-motives to computer programming and design, Aaron later become a member of the Australian army studying military surveillance and security. After an honorable discharge, he completed a trade and studied in Mechanical Engineering. Currently, in his late 20's, he is further developing his skills in advanced micro controllers, mechatronics, programmable logic and broadening his design engineering skills."

Prototypes

Aaron has previously developed a highly advanced system specifically for diesel engines and began steps to manufacture the item for consumers in 2013.  Though due to its intrusive nature by having to intercept various engine sensors (Throttle Position, Fuel and manifold pressure, air temp, EGR and air flow) in an under-the-bonnet installation he decided not to release the product on the consumer market which was already flooded with intercept chips (though nowhere near as advanced).  This reason further pushed for research into the workings of the factory system and how to harness a vehicles existing mapping software.


With Aaron’s obsessive nature to develop a product that’s not only the most intelligent electronic plug-in device available, but a product that well exceeds anything else available on the market.  A very extensive array of prototypes have been developed (and failed Aaron’s Expectations) leaving an incredibly refined, highly effective and aesthetically pleasing product.

Manufacturing

Berry Robotics are truly satisfied that every avenue has been explored to have a product ready for production in its entirety.  The final prototype of the Berry in all aspects including design, hardware, programming, enclosure, manufacturing processes including highly expensive injection mold tooling and testing have been complete!  The system is active and tested to date on all OBD2 compliant vehicles with results continually exceeding expectations.  Estimated expenses have exceeded the original budget, though the end result has proven to be worth the sacrifice, with over 5 years of dedicated research and countless man hours poured into developing a truly refined product.  Manufacturing tenders were placed in April 2016 focusing purely on quality, with most of the successful partners from Australia.

Manufacturing Locations:

  1. The Aluminum enclosure will a be produced by a quality manufacturer in China
  2. The molded lid for the enclosure will be produced in Australia
  3. Chipsets and circuit board to be assembled in Australia
  4. Software programming will be in Australia
  5. The entire assembly process will be performed in Australia
  6. All products will have final inspection by Berry Robotics in Australia for quality assurance
  7. Any unlikely warranty claims will be fully assessed by Berry Robotics in Australia


Risk and Challenges

Any project is never immune to problems, though if issues were to arise with production errors, Berry has taken the initiative to have ‘backup’ manufacturers in place to counter any possible delays with getting the product to the consumer as quickly as possible.  Expected delivery dates on the campaign are set later than the expected completion date of the product as a safe guard for any potential delays in the manufacturing.  Berry have fortunately had various experiences with production processes and are very familiar with lead times and manufacturing protocols, rest assured your kickstarter backing is in good hands!


Thank you!

Thanks for checking out our project.  We hope you too can enjoy the benefits of what we think is a super cool little device.  Wish us luck!
