story:
OXY is an Android™ powered SmartWatch that can run custom WatchFaces and Android applications. OXY can run in standalone mode or in conjunction with your smartphone. It supports phones running Android™ 4.3 or higher, iOS© 8 or higher and Windows 10 (all via Bluetooth).

  • OXY is made of CNC finished 316L Stainless Steel
  • You can execute any application compiled for Android Lollipop 5.1.1 and most of the applications compiled for Android WEAR
  • All perks include US, EU and UK USB chargers and if mentioned, the OXY Docking Station
  • OXY includes a 1 year limited warranty on hardware issues and full support for ELF OS SDK (Software Development Kit) released by Ingenic Semiconductors
  • The code is available for Download on an Open Source BitBucket repository and maintained by the OXY Team and Ingenic Semiconductors
  • The price of our perks is exclusive to this Indiegogo campaign
  • Free applications and WatchFaces will be available online using the OXY companion app
  • Now we need your help to make the OXY SmartWatch a reality!

We are a relatively small team of technology enthusiasts and SmartWatch experts. Because you need more than just a few techies to develop a SmartWatch though, we partnered with some of the most innovative companies in the industry. However, we are still looking for brilliant minds to expand the OXY team! If you’re a software developer or an electrical engineer, and you’d like to work with us in our office in Bristol, make sure you contact us!

The OXY SmartWatch is designed to be the first SmartWatch that truly looks like a watch! We used the most advanced hardware solutions available and an Android powered operating system that was developed specifically for wearable devices.

In collaboration with Ingenic Semiconductors, we have designed a SmartWatch that promotes the open source ideology, virtually works with every smart phone, is made of only high-quality materials, and - most importantly - looks and feels amazing on your wrist.

OXY is beautifully crafted and comes in two shapes - Round and Square - and in two colors - Black and Silver. All models are, besides the different shape, identical in terms of hardware and software. All versions of OXY are equipped with high-resolution AMOLED displays and super-durable Corning Gorilla Glass.

To ensure that OXY satisfies even the highest quality standards, we decided to manufacture it using CNC finished 316L Stainless Steel - the same material used by established watch makers such as Tissot, Omega and Gran Seiko. It provides OXY with a high resistance against sweat and corrosion and also creates a very elegant look.

In Summary

  • Watch Material
    CNC finished 316L Stainless Steel
  • CPU
    Ingenic M200 Chipset (up to 1.2 Ghz), Ultra-low powered CPU
  • Memory
    1GB RAM + 8GB Flash Drive for an higher user experience and a bigger storage
  • Sensors
    Sensor Hub for low power pedometer always on, dynamic heart rate
  • OS
    Android 5.1.1 ELF OS customized by OXY (E-mails, Calendar, Notifications, Phone Calls, Weather, Speech Recognition and more)
  • Input
    Voice input with Microsoft Cortana API
    Touch input with TouchOne keyboard (a dedicated keyboard for Smartwatches)
  • Phone compatibility
    Android 4.3 or above, iOS 8 or above, Windows 10 Mobile
  • Open Source Platform
    OXY OS is available on BitBucket and can be fully customized
  • Battery
    2 days or more in Ambient Mode
    5 days or more in Standby Mode (not paired with a Phone) 

OXY works with custom WatchFaces that can be changed easily according to your mood. You can download new WatchFaces for free and the 8GB memory enables you to install all of your favorite ones without running out of space.

We are collaborating with multiple graphic designers and WatchFace-makers to assure that there will be a large selection of WatchFaces openly available when you receive your OXY.

OXY makes monitoring your health and your fitness level as easy as it can be. You can use OXY to check and monitor your heart rate, or you can take it a step further and analyze the calories you burned, the miles you ran and the time you spent for each exercise. All data OXY collects can easily be transferred to your phone and shared with Google Fit - or any of your favorite fitness applications.

With the OXY phone app you can receive calls, send a response to a missed call and speak through the microphone in your watch. While all features are embedded, you can choose which ones suit you and disable the rest.

When using a SmartWatch, your smart phone notifications are probably the most relevant information that can be displayed, which is why we put a lot of emphasis on them when developing OXY. You can select which apps can send notifications to your wrist and which ones can not. Plus, we created a notification system that is easy to understand - whether you are an expert or OXY is your first SmartWatch.

Some of the most important notifications are calendar and task reminders. That is why OXY can display all appointments and tasks available on your phone's calendar, send custom reminders and notify you when needed. Additionally, OXY is equipped with a set of speakers and a vibration motor, which you can configure according to your preferences.

You'd like to talk to your watch or even have more interaction? Using OXY's integrated voice control feature, you can execute searches, dictate text and even activate applications without any effort and without even using your smart phone. We are actively working with Microsoft to implement their intelligent personal assistant software Cortana and their language and visual Artificial Intelligence OXFORD to make OXY the smartest Smartwatch on the market!

If you want to know more about Microsoft OXFORD and Microsoft LUIS you can follow these links:

  • Microsoft OXFORD Platform
  • Microsoft LUIS Platform

OXY is based on an open source philosophy and powered by Android™ and ELF OS. Therefore, there are already countless applications available on the market, with the number of apps growing every day. We work closely with the best Android developers around the world to deliver even more custom apps that you can use with your OXY.

ELF OS has already been adopted in Asia and, in collaboration with Ingenic Semiconductors, we have developed a custom version that will boost the adaptation of the innovative wearable operating system.

This is just a small list of what is already available for ELF OS.

In addition to touch and voice control, OXY also comes with a gesture detection feature. This makes it easy to interact with your applications and also to turn OXY on and off. To make sure that everyone can use gesture control, it can be activated with your right and your left hand.

At this point, OXY has been in development for over one year. We partnered up with multiple established hardware manufacturers to achieve the most durable and well-designed result.

We started with the PCB (circuit board) and went on to testing multiple display solutions (AMOLED, LCD, TFT). We then partnered with Ingenic Semiconductors and designed a complete Developer Kit, which allowed for a much faster and more efficient prototyping process.

The OXY Smartwatch is powered by a high performance Ingenic M200 microchip created specifically for wearable devices.
Ingenic M200 features an innovative, energy-saving architecture that is based on a dual-core XBurst processor where one high-performance CPU runs at 1.2 GHz while one low-power CPU runs at 300 MHz. M200 also includes a fully-featured multimedia subsystem which integrates dedicated graphics, video and imaging engines. You can read more about the M200 this blog article from imagination.
Ingenic xburst cpus are built using the MIPS32 architecture designed by Imagination Technologies.
Imagination is a global technology leader whose broad range of silicon ip (mips, powervr, ensigma) has been used to create the socs that power many iconic mobile, consumer and embedded electronics. The imagination community includes companies such as AllWinner technology, Amazon, Apple, Broadcom, Google, Intel, Mediatek, Microsoft, Qualcomm, Rockchip, Samsung, Sony, Tsmc, Toshiba and many others.

OXY is equipped with standard smart phone and tablet chips and sensors, such as a gyroscope, an accelerometer, Bluetooth and WiFi chips, and many more.

To ensure that OXY can truly be your daily companion, we wanted to make it possible to use it under any circumstances that you would also use your traditional watch under. We tested OXY under the shower and many other conventional places to test its limits.

As a result, we certified OXY to be IP67 water resistant. This means you can use your OXY under the shower, at the beach or when you wash your car, but not for diving and similar activities - at least for now.

One of the toughest challenges we had to overcome during the development of OXY was finding the best possible charging system.
Some SmartWatches use NFC charging technology (also known as 'wireless charging' or 'inductive charging') to supply their device with power. The biggest disadvantage of such a solution is the lack of connectivity between the watch and your computer and the extra space required to host the NFC module. NFC charging does not allow for a USB connection mode, which is very important for OXY's open source development.

Now you probably ask yourself: Why not a physical USB port? We wanted to make OXY the first SmartWatch that genuinely looks and feels like a traditional watch, which is why it was very important to us that OXY is water resistant. A physical USB port drastically reduces the water resistance of any SmartWatch and was therefore not an option.

To solve both issues, we decided to power OXY using a magnetic charging solution. Similar to other watch makers, such as Huawei, Pebble and LG, we realized the potential of magnetic charging for developers, while also ensuring IP67 water resistance for your OXY.

To provide an alternative charging system for the OXY SmartWatch, we also developed a Docking Station, which can be ordered separately during this campaign. Besides providing OXY with a safe place to be stored, it makes charging your watch while you sleep or work at your desk much more convenient.
Initially, the OXY Docking Station was designed to allow for a more convenient way for developers to create and test their software for OXY. However, after using the Docking Station for a while our realized that it can be useful for everyone - not only our developers.

We believe that a good SmartWatch deserves an operating system that is designed specifically for wearable devices to ensure that all potential features of the device can be used.
At the same time, however, we wanted to use an operating system that works with every smart phone, that can be configured very flexibly depending on your preferences, and that makes it possible to share our code with the global developer community - in other words, to make it Open Source.

This is why OXY is running on ELF OS (Android Lollipop 5.1.1) and IWDS SDK, which provide developers with comprehensive sets of APIs to make the interaction between your smartphone and your OXY as effortless as possible.
We wanted to achieve maximum compatibility, which means that you can use OXY with any device running Android 4.3 KitKat (or higher), iOS 8.0 (or higher) and Windows 10! In order to work with OXY, your smartphone only needs to be able to establish a Bluetooth connection and have the OXY Companion App installed.

To make sure that even the most complex WatchFaces can be run by OXY's ELF OS, we integrated a strong, specially dedicated GPU. By using the OXY Companion App and our free OXY marketplace, you can easily download your favorite WatchFaces directly to your OXY SmartWatch.

The most important aspect of any SmartWatch operating system is the way you can navigate through the different menus and functions. While all notifications need to be available instantly, they should also not distract you from your important tasks or cost you too much time to find.

The OXY interface navigation system is designed using the X3 concept, which was originally created by LokiFish, one of our most dedicated community members. The X3 concept guarantees that it will never take you longer than three steps to activate any function or application on your OXY SmartWatch!
The concept is simple: never take more than 3 steps to achieve something. With this concept we have created a smart home launcher capable to achieve any operation with maximum 3 steps.

In the following section, you can check out a sample configuration of the X3 navigation principle. When customizing your OXY, you can use the companion app to assign different applications and functions to each gesture, based on your personal preferences.

Swipe Right

Swiping right will activate OXY's Navigation. It will give you map directions without the need of taking your smartphone out of your pocket. This is really helpful, especially when you are on your scooter or bike.

Swipe Left

By swiping left, you can access the Notification Timeline of your OXY SmartWatch. This screen displays all your phone's notifications and, of course, you can easily configure which app's notifications you will see in your Notification Timeline. You can see the details of each notification and interact with them by simply tapping them on your screen.

Swipe Up

When you swipe up, your OXY will start the integrated Phone application. This app allows you to keep track of your call history, grants access to your phone's contacts and also lets you start and accept phone calls.

Swipe Down

Swiping down on your OXY display activates the Device Summary and the Quick Access function. These two applications are used to grant you a quick, easy-to-find overview of your OXY's and your phone's status. You can use this overview, for example, to interact with your favorite media player, change the luminosity of your phone and your watch, access your most recent notifications and monitor the battery status of both of your devices.

Long Tap

A long tap (holding) on the display of your OXY, while the current WatchFace is visible, will activate the WatchFace manager. With this integrated application you can easily swap different WatchFaces and access the specific settings of each one of them!

Holding the Power Button

Holding down the Power Button of your OXY will activate the main menu. Through OXY's menu, you can access your installed applications or change important settings of your watch, such as brightness, vibration, volume, WiFi, Bluetooth and many more.

Apps

The OXY SmartWatch is powered by the custom operating system Android Lollipop 5.1.1 ELF OS. This will enable you to install any application developed for Android Lollipop by default. All you have to do, in case you backed the round version, is make sure that the application's user interface also supports a round display.

Check out this video of our Round prototype executing the famous Doodle Jump apps:

The OXY SmartWatch was created with our developers' needs and preferences in mind. We wanted to create a SmartWatch that truly represents the open source ideology and makes it easy to develop applications and WatchFaces. This is why OXY is IDE (Integrated Development Environment) friendly and comes with the full source code of our Android ROM, available for download on BitBucket. You can use either Eclipse or Android Studio to create custom WatchFaces and applications - OXY supports both!

Thanks to our extensive collaboration with Ingenic Semiconductors, we could release a fully descriptive, free-to-download API documentation. We want everybody to be able to create their own WatchFaces and apps, which is why we are working on providing tutorials and articles explaining how to code for OXY.

In addition to the API documentation, we created an XDA community where you can discuss your results, get advice and feedback, or download all available materials, such as sample apps, to speed up your learning process.

However, we did not just want to improve the way you can develop your own apps for OXY, we also wanted to limit the effort of sharing your apps and WatchFaces with the OXY community!
This is why we created a marketplace, where you can easily upload your software and download the ones other developers provided for free.

Every donation gets us closer to bringing the OXY SmartWatch to life! We are grateful for every pledge and appreciate all the support we have received through our community so far.
You are the best!

Get the OXY Dock, available in Silver and Black! This package also includes an additional magnetic charger and is exclusive to this Indiegogo campaign.

Get the OXY SmartWatches, available in Silver and Black! You can get the OXY Round or the OXY Square. This package also includes a magnetic charger and is exclusive to this Indiegogo campaign.

Get the OXY Pro Package, available in Silver and Black! You can get the OXY Round or the OXY Square. This package also includes a magnetic charger, three additional wrist bands and a watchmaker kit!

Want two OXYs? Get the Me & You Package and receive two OXY SmartWatches, two magnetic chargers and one OXY Dock! This offer is exclusive to our Indiegogo campaign and limited to 1,500 units!

We have a clear plan in mind when it comes to the future development of OXY. Our vision is to create an open source wearables platform for developers and users alike. We are dedicated to keep you, our backers, involved during every step along the way!

Our manufacturing system is already in place and we can produce a maximum of 20,000 to 50,000 units every month, starting in January 2016. After production, we will send all produced units to Bristol once a month to avoid high shipping costs. In the UK, we will control the quality of every OXY and manually package each unit, before sending it directly to you. We will start shipping your OXY between June 2016 and July 2016- No matter where in the world you are located!

OXY will also have CE and FCC certifications, our PCB Design Company is already working on getting all the papers done before OXY will be delivered to your home.

You will receive your very own OXY including the free Companion App. The app works with virtually any modern smartphone (only Bluetooth connectivity is required), whether it runs on Android™, iOS© or Windows 10.

Our Software Roadmap does not include changes made by the Open Source community.

Net Architectures ltd.

Our team at Net Architectures is based in Bristol and in charge of the software of your OXY. Our team members are not just in Bristol though, we are also based in Spain, Germany, Hungary, Turkey, Argentina and many other beautiful places. A special thank you goes to our designers Joao, Sebastian, Daniel and Karl, who have done an amazing job so far!

BitHussar

Bithussar is our VFX partner! That means they made our amazing video footage and animations.

All In Mobile

We’ve partnered with AllInMobile to develop the final companion app for iOS and Android. Their team has been an amazing help so far and we are looking forward to further develop OXY with them.

Ingenic Semiconductors

Lastly, we'd like to thank the great team of Ingenic Semiconductors. They have worked very closely with us and shared their invaluable knowledge, trust and expertise during the entire process of making OXY come to life.

Our team mainly consists of software developers and hardware enthusiasts, which is why we have a lot of experience with developing mobile applications and systems. We are working with established hardware manufacturers in Asia and our production process is already in place. Therefore, we can estimate the target shipping date very well and also know exactly how many OXY SmartWatches can be manufactured every month.

OXY has gone through numerous tests and QA (quality assurance) sessions, which were done by our manufacturers in China and also by our team of software engineers. In addition, Ingenic Semiconductors has provided us with a custom Hardware Development Kit months ahead of this campaign, so we could precisely simulate how our hardware and software would work together. OXY™ is a Registered Trademark in the United Kingdom, while the MIPS M200 CPU is patented by Ingenic Semiconductors and IMGTEC.

By following the open source ideology we also commit to the highest possible level of transparency. We will regularly keep you updated about any changes, developments and news. After all, you are the ones who are making the OXY SmartWatch possible! If you have any questions or concerns, you can always contact us through our social media channels and via email (support@oxytechs.com).

How can I purchase OXY?

OXY is only available on Indiegogo at the moment. By pre-ordering it through our campaign, you can save up to 35% towards the future retail price!

What will the future price of OXY be?

OXY’s final retail price will most likely be $299.

Is OXY water proof?

OXY is certified to be IP67 water resistant! This means that you can use OXY under the shower, at the beach or other occasions you’d also wear your traditional watch for. You can’t use OXY for diving or similar activities though - at least for now!

Which smartphone operating system is OXY compatible with?

You will be able to use your OXY in conjunction with phones running Android™ 4.3 (or higher), iOS© 8.0 (or higher) and Windows 10. That means you can use OXY with virtually any modern smartphone!

What is Android™ and ELF OS?

Android™ is an open-source operating system, developed by Google, which is used to power many of the latest smartphones and tablets. The full name of Android™ is AOSP, which stands for Android™ Open Source Platform.
ELF OS is a set of APIs and applications, which is built on top of AOSP 5.1.1 Lollipop. This means that ELF OS is a so-called Android ROM, a customized version of the standard Android™ system, which is specifically designed for wearable technologies and SmartWatch screens.
ELF OS is maintained by the OXY team and by Ingenic Semiconductors. It is entirely open source, customizable and documented, so anybody can download the source code.

Will OXY receive updates after the campaign?

Yes! As soon as there is a new feature, patch or OS version for your OXY, we will release it to our community. You can install them using a direct connection to your computer or by using the OXY Companion App (available for Android, iOS and Windows). In the future, you might also be able to directly update your OXY through your WiFi connection.

Can I Jailbreak my OXY?

It already is, with some security precautions! You can download the entire source code of ELF OS through our developer website and customize it however you want. Then, using our Bootloader available for Ubuntu and Windows, you can easily install your own operating system or customize an existing one. There is no limit to what you can do!

How do I connect OXY to my smartphone?

OXY is equipped with a Bluetooth 4.1 (BLE) antenna, which can connect to Android, iOS and Windows. You can pair OXY with your smartphone by using the QR-code reader of the OXY Companion App. Simply scan your OXY’s QR-code and you’re ready to go!

Can I change OXY's wristband?

Yes! Because OXY is equipped with a standard 20/22mm LUG (depending on the model), you can use any standardized wristband with your OXY! You can order a selection of custom high quality wristbands from us, but it is compatible with most other available models as well. You can make OXY look any way you want!

How can I charge my OXY?

You can charge OXY using the custom magnetic charger. Simply attach it to the back of your OXY and plug the USB-side of your cable into your computer - or directly into the wall using the A/C adapter. If you are a developer, or if you just want to have a specific place to charge your OXY at, you can also use the specially designed OXY Dock. This way you can use the screen of your OXY while it is charging. Oh, and it also looks pretty good!

Can I answers calls or text messages using OXY?

Yes! You can reply to text messages using applications for SMS, Whatsapp, Hangouts and Facebook Messenger. We are also working on adding additional messaging platforms to ELF OS in the future.
When it comes to phone calls, you have two options: You can either use your OXY just like a traditional Bluetooth headset (using the integrated microphone and speakers), or you can answer using a configurable list of answers that will be sent to your caller as a text. You could, for example, send ‘I am in a meeting right now. I will call you back after‘ or ‘I am currently not available. Please try again tomorrow’. Of course, you can also just decline the call directly through your OXY.

Which fitness app can I use with OXY?

OXY has an integrated fitness application! However, we are also working in integrating popular health tracking apps like Google Fit, MyFitnessPal and RunKeeper.

Do I need to add shipping costs to my pledge?

When you select your region, Indiegogo will automatically add the corresponding shipping costs to your pledge. You can find the respective shipping costs in the table below. Before being sent to you, every package will be re-checked manually, and then provided with a tracking number and insurance from our courier DHL. We will start shipping your OXYs in June 2016.

Do other costs apply to my pledge?

OXY is classified as an electronic device. Some countries have import taxes for electronics, which are unfortunately not under our control. If you are not aware of the current legislation in your country, check out this website to find the import tax for your country. Note that you’ll be importing from the United Kingdom and that the amount you have to declare is your total pledge, minus the shipping costs for your region.

Is there a manufacturer warranty for OXY?

Our manufacturer offers a one-year limited warranty on all hardware related issues. Every defective product will be analyzed by our Quality Assurance department and replaced with a new OXY, in case of any hardware defect.

How can I choose which OXY I want?

After the campaign, we will send out a backer survey. In this survey you will be able to indicate whether you want the OXY Round, or the OXY Square. You can also choose the color of your OXY then.

What if my question was not answered here?

If you have any questions that were not answered in our FAQs or on our page, make sure to contact us through our social media channels or directly via email. You can reach us at support@oxytechs.com. We’re looking forward to hearing from you!

Follow us to be among the first to receive exclusive updates and exciting news!

  • Our Website
  • Facebook
  • Google+
  • Twitter
  • Instagram
story_txt:
OXY is an Android™ powered SmartWatch that can run custom WatchFaces and Android applications.
    OXY can run in standalone mode or in conjunction with your smartphone. It supports phones running Android™ 4.3 or higher, iOS© 8 or higher and Windows 10 (all via Bluetooth).




OXY is made of CNC finished 316L Stainless Steel
You can execute any application compiled for Android Lollipop 5.1.1 and most of the applications compiled for Android WEAR
All perks include US, EU and UK USB chargers and if mentioned, the OXY Docking Station
OXY includes a 1 year limited warranty on hardware issues and full support for ELF OS SDK (Software Development Kit) released by Ingenic Semiconductors
The code is available for Download on an Open Source BitBucket repository and maintained by the OXY Team and Ingenic Semiconductors
The price of our perks is exclusive to this Indiegogo campaign
Free applications and WatchFaces will be available online using the OXY companion app
Now we need your help to make the OXY SmartWatch a reality!





    We are a relatively small team of technology enthusiasts and SmartWatch experts.
    Because you need more than just a few techies to develop a SmartWatch though, we partnered with some of the most innovative companies in the industry.
    However, we are still looking for brilliant minds to expand the OXY team!
    If you’re a software developer or an electrical engineer, and you’d like to work with us in our office in Bristol, make sure you contact us!








    The OXY SmartWatch is designed to be the first SmartWatch that truly looks like a watch!
    We used the most advanced hardware solutions available and an Android powered operating system that was developed specifically for wearable devices.


    In collaboration with Ingenic Semiconductors, we have designed a SmartWatch that promotes the open source ideology,
    virtually works with every smart phone,
    is made of only high-quality materials, and - most importantly - looks and feels amazing on your wrist.



    OXY is beautifully crafted and comes in two shapes - Round and Square - and in two colors - Black and Silver.
    All models are, besides the different shape, identical in terms of hardware and software.
    All versions of OXY are equipped with high-resolution AMOLED displays and super-durable Corning Gorilla Glass.


    To ensure that OXY satisfies even the highest quality standards, we decided to manufacture it using CNC finished 316L Stainless Steel - the same material used by established watch makers such as Tissot, Omega and Gran Seiko.
    It provides OXY with a high resistance against sweat and corrosion and also creates a very elegant look.


In Summary



Watch MaterialCNC finished 316L Stainless Steel

CPUIngenic M200 Chipset (up to 1.2 Ghz), Ultra-low powered CPU

Memory1GB RAM + 8GB Flash Drive for an higher user experience and a bigger storage

SensorsSensor Hub for low power pedometer always on, dynamic heart rate

OSAndroid 5.1.1 ELF OS customized by OXY (E-mails, Calendar, Notifications, Phone Calls, Weather, Speech Recognition and more)

InputVoice input with Microsoft Cortana APITouch input with TouchOne keyboard (a dedicated keyboard for Smartwatches)

Phone compatibilityAndroid 4.3 or above, iOS 8 or above, Windows 10 Mobile

Open Source PlatformOXY OS is available on BitBucket and can be fully customized

Battery2 days or more in Ambient Mode5 days or more in Standby Mode (not paired with a Phone) 






    OXY works with custom WatchFaces that can be changed easily according to your mood.
    You can download new WatchFaces for free and the 8GB memory enables you to install all of your favorite ones without running out of space.


    We are collaborating with multiple graphic designers and WatchFace-makers to assure that there will be a large selection of WatchFaces
    openly available when you receive your OXY.



    OXY makes monitoring your health and your fitness level as easy as it can be.
    You can use OXY to check and monitor your heart rate, or you can take it a step further and analyze the calories you burned, the miles you ran and the time you spent for each exercise.
    All data OXY collects can easily be transferred to your phone and shared with Google Fit - or any of your favorite fitness applications.



    With the OXY phone app you can receive calls, send a response to a missed call and speak through the microphone in your watch.
    While all features are embedded, you can choose which ones suit you and disable the rest.



    When using a SmartWatch, your smart phone notifications are probably the most relevant information that can be displayed, which is why we put a lot of emphasis on them when developing OXY.
    You can select which apps can send notifications to your wrist and which ones can not.
    Plus, we created a notification system that is easy to understand - whether you are an expert or OXY is your first SmartWatch.



    Some of the most important notifications are calendar and task reminders.
    That is why OXY can display all appointments and tasks available on your phone's calendar, send custom reminders and notify you when needed.
    Additionally, OXY is equipped with a set of speakers and a vibration motor, which you can configure according to your preferences.


    You'd like to talk to your watch or even have more interaction?
    Using OXY's integrated voice control feature, you can execute searches, dictate text and even activate applications without any effort and without even using your smart phone.
    We are actively working with Microsoft to implement their intelligent personal assistant software Cortana and their language and visual Artificial Intelligence OXFORD to make OXY the smartest Smartwatch on the market!



If you want to know more about Microsoft OXFORD and Microsoft LUIS you can follow these links:

Microsoft OXFORD Platform
Microsoft LUIS Platform


    OXY is based on an open source philosophy and powered by Android™ and ELF OS.
    Therefore, there are already countless applications available on the market, with the number of apps growing every day.
    We work closely with the best Android developers around the world to deliver even more custom apps that you can use with your OXY.


    ELF OS has already been adopted in Asia and, in collaboration with Ingenic Semiconductors, we have developed a custom version that will boost the adaptation of the innovative wearable operating system.


This is just a small list of what is already available for ELF OS.

    In addition to touch and voice control, OXY also comes with a gesture detection feature.
    This makes it easy to interact with your applications and also to turn OXY on and off.
    To make sure that everyone can use gesture control, it can be activated with your right and your left hand.





    At this point, OXY has been in development for over one year.
    We partnered up with multiple established hardware manufacturers to achieve the most durable and well-designed result.


    We started with the PCB (circuit board) and went on to testing multiple display solutions (AMOLED, LCD, TFT).
    We then partnered with Ingenic Semiconductors and designed a complete Developer Kit, which allowed for a much faster and more efficient prototyping process.



    The OXY Smartwatch is powered by a high performance Ingenic M200 microchip created specifically for wearable devices. 
    Ingenic M200 features an innovative, energy-saving architecture that is based on a dual-core XBurst processor where one high-performance CPU runs at 1.2 GHz while one low-power CPU runs at 300 MHz.
    M200 also includes a fully-featured multimedia subsystem which integrates dedicated graphics, video and imaging engines.
    You can read more about the M200 this blog article from imagination.
    Ingenic xburst cpus are built using the MIPS32 architecture designed by Imagination Technologies.
    Imagination is a global technology leader whose broad range of silicon ip (mips, powervr, ensigma) has been used to create the socs that power many iconic mobile, consumer and embedded electronics.
    The imagination community includes companies such as AllWinner technology, Amazon, Apple, Broadcom, Google, Intel, Mediatek, Microsoft, Qualcomm, Rockchip, Samsung, Sony, Tsmc, Toshiba and many others.



    OXY is equipped with standard smart phone and tablet chips and sensors, such as a gyroscope, an accelerometer, Bluetooth and WiFi chips, and many more.



    To ensure that OXY can truly be your daily companion, we wanted to make it possible to use it under any circumstances that you would also use your traditional watch under.
    We tested OXY under the shower and many other conventional places to test its limits.


    As a result, we certified OXY to be IP67 water resistant.
    This means you can use your OXY under the shower, at the beach or when you wash your car, but not for diving and similar activities - at least for now.


    One of the toughest challenges we had to overcome during the development of OXY was finding the best possible charging system. 
    Some SmartWatches use NFC charging technology (also known as 'wireless charging' or 'inductive charging') to supply their device with power.
    The biggest disadvantage of such a solution is the lack of connectivity between the watch and your computer and the extra space required to host the NFC module.
    NFC charging does not allow for a USB connection mode, which is very important for OXY's open source development.


    Now you probably ask yourself: Why not a physical USB port?
    We wanted to make OXY the first SmartWatch that genuinely looks and feels like a traditional watch, which is why it was very important to us that OXY is water resistant.
    A physical USB port drastically reduces the water resistance of any SmartWatch and was therefore not an option.


    To solve both issues, we decided to power OXY using a magnetic charging solution.
    Similar to other watch makers, such as Huawei, Pebble and LG, we realized the potential of magnetic charging for developers, while also ensuring IP67 water resistance for your OXY.



    To provide an alternative charging system for the OXY SmartWatch, we also developed a Docking Station, which can be ordered separately during this campaign.
    Besides providing OXY with a safe place to be stored, it makes charging your watch while you sleep or work at your desk much more convenient. 
    Initially, the OXY Docking Station was designed to allow for a more convenient way for developers to create and test their software for OXY.
    However, after using the Docking Station for a while our
    realized that it can be useful for everyone - not only our developers.





    We believe that a good SmartWatch deserves an operating system that is designed specifically for wearable devices to ensure that all potential features of the device can be used.
    At the same time, however, we wanted to use an operating system that works with every smart phone, that can be configured very flexibly depending on your preferences, and that makes it possible to share our code with the global developer community - in other words, to make it Open Source.


    This is why OXY is running on ELF OS (Android Lollipop 5.1.1) and IWDS SDK, which provide developers with comprehensive sets of APIs to make the interaction between your smartphone and your OXY as effortless as possible.
    We wanted to achieve maximum compatibility, which means that you can use OXY with any device running Android 4.3 KitKat (or higher), iOS 8.0 (or higher) and Windows 10!
    In order to work with OXY, your smartphone only needs to be able to establish a Bluetooth connection and have the OXY Companion App installed.


    To make sure that even the most complex WatchFaces can be run by OXY's ELF OS, we integrated a strong, specially dedicated GPU.
    By using the OXY Companion App and our free OXY marketplace, you can easily download your favorite WatchFaces directly to your OXY SmartWatch.



    The most important aspect of any SmartWatch operating system is the way you can navigate through the different menus and functions.
    While all notifications need to be available instantly, they should also not distract you from your important tasks or cost you too much time to find.



    The OXY interface navigation system is designed using the X3 concept, which was originally created by LokiFish, one of our most dedicated community members.
    The X3 concept guarantees that it will never take you longer than three steps to activate any function or application on your OXY SmartWatch!
    The concept is simple: never take more than 3 steps to achieve something.
    With this concept we have created a smart home launcher capable to achieve any operation with maximum 3 steps.


    In the following section, you can check out a sample configuration of the X3 navigation principle.
    When customizing your OXY, you can use the companion app to assign different applications and functions to each gesture, based on your personal preferences.


Swipe Right



    Swiping right will activate OXY's Navigation.
    It will give you map directions without the need of taking your smartphone out of your pocket.
    This is really helpful, especially when you are on your scooter or bike.


Swipe Left



    By swiping left, you can access the Notification Timeline of your OXY SmartWatch.
    This screen displays all your phone's notifications and, of course, you can easily configure which app's notifications you will see in your Notification Timeline.
    You can see the details of each notification and interact with them by simply tapping them on your screen.


Swipe Up



    When you swipe up, your OXY will start the integrated Phone application.
    This app allows you to keep track of your call history, grants access to your phone's contacts and also lets you start and accept phone calls.


Swipe Down



    Swiping down on your OXY display activates the Device Summary and the Quick Access function.
    These two applications are used to grant you a quick, easy-to-find overview of your OXY's and your phone's status.
    You can use this overview, for example, to interact with your favorite media player, change the luminosity of your phone and your watch, access your most recent notifications and monitor the battery status of both of your devices.


Long Tap



    A long tap (holding) on the display of your OXY, while the current WatchFace is visible, will activate the WatchFace manager.
    With this integrated application you can easily swap different WatchFaces and access the specific settings of each one of them!


Holding the Power Button



    Holding down the Power Button of your OXY will activate the main menu.
    Through OXY's menu, you can access your installed applications or change important settings of your watch, such as brightness, vibration, volume, WiFi, Bluetooth and many more.


Apps


    The OXY SmartWatch is powered by the custom operating system Android Lollipop 5.1.1 ELF OS.
    This will enable you to install any application developed for Android Lollipop by default.
    All you have to do, in case you backed the round version, is make sure that the application's user interface also supports a round display.


Check out this video of our Round prototype executing the famous Doodle Jump apps:










    The OXY SmartWatch was created with our developers' needs and preferences in mind.
    We wanted to create a SmartWatch that truly represents the open source ideology and makes it easy to develop applications and WatchFaces.
    This is why OXY is IDE (Integrated Development Environment) friendly and comes with the full source code of our Android ROM, available for download on BitBucket.
    You can use either Eclipse or Android Studio to create custom WatchFaces and applications - OXY supports both!



    Thanks to our extensive collaboration with Ingenic Semiconductors, we could release a fully descriptive, free-to-download API documentation.
    We want everybody to be able to create their own WatchFaces and apps, which is why we are working on providing tutorials and articles explaining how to code for OXY.



    In addition to the API documentation, we created an XDA community where you can discuss your results, get advice and feedback, or download all available materials, such as sample apps, to speed up your learning process.



    However, we did not just want to improve the way you can develop your own apps for OXY, we also wanted to limit the effort of sharing your apps and WatchFaces with the OXY community! 
    This is why we created a marketplace, where you can easily upload your software and download the ones other developers provided for free.




    Every donation gets us closer to bringing the OXY SmartWatch to life!
    We are grateful for every pledge and appreciate all the support we have received through our community so far. 
    You are the best!

    This package also includes an additional magnetic charger and is exclusive to this Indiegogo campaign.

    Can I change OXY's wristband?


    Yes! Because OXY is equipped with a standard 20/22mm LUG (depending on the model), you can use any standardized wristband with your OXY! You can order a selection of custom high quality wristbands from us, but it is compatible with most other available models as well. You can make OXY look any way you want!


    How can I charge my OXY?


    You can charge OXY using the custom magnetic charger. Simply attach it to the back of your OXY and plug the USB-side of your cable into your computer - or directly into the wall using the A/C adapter. If you are a developer, or if you just want to have a specific place to charge your OXY at, you can also use the specially designed OXY Dock. This way you can use the screen of your OXY while it is charging. Oh, and it also looks pretty good!


    Can I answers calls or text messages using OXY?


    Yes! You can reply to text messages using applications for SMS, Whatsapp, Hangouts and Facebook Messenger. We are also working on adding additional messaging platforms to ELF OS in the future. 
    When it comes to phone calls, you have two options: You can either use your OXY just like a traditional Bluetooth headset (using the integrated microphone and speakers), or you can answer using a configurable list of answers that will be sent to your caller as a text. You could, for example, send ‘I am in a meeting right now. I will call you back after‘ or ‘I am currently not available. Please try again tomorrow’. Of course, you can also just decline the call directly through your OXY.


    Which fitness app can I use with OXY?


    OXY has an integrated fitness application! However, we are also working in integrating popular health tracking apps like Google Fit, MyFitnessPal and RunKeeper.


    Do I need to add shipping costs to my pledge?


    When you select your region, Indiegogo will automatically add the corresponding shipping costs to your pledge.
    You can find the respective shipping costs in the table below.
    Before being sent to you, every package will be re-checked manually, and then provided with a tracking number and insurance from our courier DHL.
    We will start shipping your OXYs in June 2016.



    Do other costs apply to my pledge?


    OXY is classified as an electronic device. Some countries have import taxes for electronics, which are unfortunately not under our control. If you are not aware of the current legislation in your country, check out  this website to find the import tax for your country.
    Note that you’ll be importing from the United Kingdom and that the amount you have to declare is your total pledge, minus the shipping costs for your region.


    Is there a manufacturer warranty for OXY?


    Our manufacturer offers a one-year limited warranty on all hardware related issues. Every defective product will be analyzed by our Quality Assurance department and replaced with a new OXY, in case of any hardware defect.


    How can I choose which OXY I want?


After the campaign, we will send out a backer survey. In this survey you will be able to indicate whether you want the OXY Round, or the OXY Square. You can also choose the color of your OXY then.


    What if my question was not answered here?


    If you have any questions that were not answered in our FAQs or on our page, make sure to contact us through our social media channels or directly via email. You can reach us at support@oxytechs.com. We’re looking forward to hearing from you!


    Follow us to be among the first to receive exclusive updates and exciting news!



Our Website


Facebook


Google+


Twitter


Instagram

story:
We all dream of a smart socket that does not need installation.

What is this charger panel?

The charger is a panel that covers the standard home socket; this panel comes with USB ports for charging electronic devices at home and does not catch the original power point- its solving us many problems with its greats abilities.



Why do you need that?

·  No installation required.

  • The charging panel covers the socket.
  •  You can take it everywhere.
  •  2 USB power -Charging devices world standards
  •  2 USB AC adapter, charge two USB devices simultaneously
  •  Looks clean and Aesthetic.
  •  Safer than all the existed connections.
  •  Possible to upgrade every socket at home even

   if it's only ugly or old.



so you do not feels its there rented apartment,hotel etc.

In fact we took the original splitter plus two chargers and combined them together. Then we made it the thickest we could.


Do you want to upgrade your home? We suggest you to buy our product cheaply at the presale in very good prices. Buy now and pay less.



Help us to make it happend  

in order to be able to produce a state of the art device that will be at the best quality and design we will need 40K$

with your support we will hire the best talents in the field to help us to make our dream realistic.

we believe that with the innovative Smart Charger devices you will no more need to run after a USB slot, every power socket in your wall will become a much safer and elegant way to charge your devices.


The other important part of yours in this partnership is to give us indication about the future demand to this item, so we will evaluate the future success of this product and if It's right to start producing it. 

Right, the raising money won't be enough to cover completely all the expenses but it will be fine for start produce it and it will be ok even if we'll need to spend more money from our pockets for that.  

Other Ways You Can Help

We'll be happy to hear from you about your ideas, such as tips or improvement suggestions for our products in order to improve it even more, the tip that will have the highest number of likes and shares and will be found possible will buy to its inventor the first model that will go out…

If you would like to contribute to the advancement of the patent otherwise you are welcome to contact us

ran azoulay-Co-founder, Business Development

graduate a law degree from the collage of law and business, An Entrepreneur and an inventor. A year and a half ago  invented "gamesitter" app for android, to keep children safe in this technological devises, free of charge app with no advertising or profit, and today facing a new challenge. 

Our supporting wall

 We would like to thank all our supporters who help the project go a few steps further. Supported the project and enter our supporting wall.






First place-Valery Azoulay‎‏

story:
Wifi signal amplifier, fast speed and high efficiency, the shell is made of engineering ABS+PC material, it is resistant to fall, mini-carrying belt, simple operation! Two working modes of the repeater: Relay mode: wireless to wireless: After receiving the wireless signal of the original wireless router, the repeater re-transmits the new wireless signal, so as to achieve the effect of amplifying and extending the coverage. Compatible with all wireless routers (need to know the user name and password of the wireless signal), the setting is very simple. The product comes with instructions. Mobile phones, computers, tablets can be set, only need to set up once all wireless devices can be used. AP mode: Wired to wireless: When the network cable is connected to the computer, you can directly access the Internet without dialing, such as hotels, apartments, rental houses, offices, sharing broadband with neighbors, etc., just plug the network cable that has been connected to the repeater The network port can convert wired to wireless use. No need to set up plug and play. 【Features】

1. Two working modes of relay and AP, mobile phone/tablet/computer can be set, only need to set once, all wireless devices can be used;

2. Wireless standard IEEE802.11 b/g/n

3. Transmission frequency: 2.4GHz~2.4835GHz

4. Support WPA2, WPA and WEP9 (128/64)

5. Simple setting wizard software interface

6. WPS one-key encryption, effective anti rubbing network Package weight: 198g Carton size: 118x68x178mm 【Packing accessories】 WIFI wireless repeater x1 English manual x 1 RJ45 network cable x 1

PHONE CASE.NO!EMOJIS.YES!

About our product:

I've had enough of boring iPhone cases. I hope this emoticon case can bring some fun to you and the person sitting across from you.

Please feel free to cover your face and play with your phone. Don't worry about being impolite. Your phone case will help you greet others.

Obviously, our product is more attractive and interesting. I hope you like it.

About logistics:

We will use DHL to send the product of your choice, you just need to join and wait for good news!

story:
Why do you need it ?

Has your LCD display been damaged by dropping your precious smartphone ?

Everyone should have experienced the LCD display damage of smartphone at least once.

So, the screen protector has been used for a long time in order to save LCD display repair cost and time. 

I can not be an exception either.

 

Our story begins !!

   1.  Our first 2D screen protector in clear type

   

It was really the protector that we used in the early day, and it became the problem of the edge of screen protector in the shape smaller than LCD display of smartphone.

Due to the edges of the protector, which is smaller than LCD display, I often get a typo in the edge of the smartphone with distortion of the LCD display. Also I had to take risk of damage to the end of the smartphone.

 

   2.  second screen protector - 3D Bezel Printed type

 

                            

Although it can protect much more than the conventional 2D screen protector, the width of the Bezel of the protector is wider than the Bezel of the smartphone, and the LCD display becomes smaller.

These was an inconvenience that the hand was caught in use due to lifting of the protector. Finally, depending on the Bezel print quality of the protector, there was a lot of parts that impaired the appearance of the original smartphone.

 

What about the next generation Omni-guard ?

      

              

It is a clear protector that considering interference of protective Back Case and breakage of the edge without inconvenience of usage covering the whole along the curvature of smartphone.

Omni-guard is a glass 3D full curved clear screen protector that completely complements the two products mentioned above and fully protects the edge of the smartphone while keeping the original luxury of smartphone.

 

How do you wear the Omni-guard ?

 

Omni-guard Lamination Manual !!

1. Align with speaker hole and press with thumb finger.

2.  Please match and press the home button, while pressing the speaker hole.

※ Caution:  If the alignment between the speaker hole and the home button  is not matched, it may occur due to the glass curvature difference.  It would happen to vapors or match the glass on your phone

 

Features

Clear 3D full curved:  Provide real full display without missing a bit of screen and protect the edge of touchscreen. It can be solved the problem of weak sensitivity of iPhone's side end touch panel.

Scattering proof: You can be more safer from scattered particles using impact resistant layer.

   

Smudge proof: Phone's display is free from fingerprints or other pollutants by easy cleaning &  anti-fouling effect.

   

Surface hardness: Surface hardness of 9H is realized by chemically strengthened glass.

     

 

Soft feeling touch: Its soft feeling touch offer much more easier touch control.

      

 

Package includes

Omni-guard for iPhone 7 / 6S / 6     1 pcs

Alcohol cleaning wiper                          1 pcs

Micro-fiber cleaning wiper                   1 pcs

Dust Remover                                          1 set

 

Challenges and We ?

Initially, we were merely consumers of protector that protected LCD display of expensive smartphone. Recently the type of protector have also diversified, it is 2D and 3D in form, PET and PC materials including Glass are applied, and it seems that the printed 3D type protector is consumed.

However, we have been waiting for the protector of glass 3D full curved screen protector, and eventually it started to develop itself. Creating a protector similar to the curvature of a smart phone was a real challenge and we understood that these full cover was not easily produced during development.

Our start is now !!

The glass 3D full curved clear screen protector is call Omni-guard.

Everyone, please use our newly born Omni-guard to make many reviews and comments. Empowered by your encouragement, we will build a mass production system and offer Omni-guard to many consumer who love smartphone.

With the future trend of smartphone without a Bezel as the only tool for LCD display protection, Omni-guard protects your valuable and advanced smartphone in the luxurious from the outside harmful environment.

Remark) These photos used in this page are based on actual protectors.

 

Where ? & Members ?

Our team was a small  company specializing in the development of the Republic of Korea founded in 2012. It seems that it took more than a year to introduce Omni-guard. Our team will do our best to make consumers satisfied with better protections from now on.

Please keep a close eye on us.

 

Shipping & Delivery ?

Omni-guard can be shipped worldwide and will be dispatched late-June.

 

Other questions or inquiries

Contact: omniguard@gaonnuri.biz

 

Thanks for supporting Omni-guard

story:
We have worked a long time to create the first most stable, reliable phone holder for your laptop,
after months of long and hard work we are really proud to present PHOLDER to the world.

We're an American company based on New York and we've designed the first support for all smartphones and all laptops with DIFFERENT SCREEN THICKNESS on the market.

Pholder is an innovative product that allows you to stay more concentrated and productive, ensuring the use of two devices at the same time.

.

 

 

Pholder is compatible with all models of the most famous brands on the market for both laptops and smartphones! The thickness of the laptop display can vary from 0.2 mm to 11mm  and holds phone with more than 6' inches.

 

 

First, we have created a series of prototypes thanks to 3D printers.

 

 

Pholder is the first product of its kind in the world! 

 

            

 

 

Using two devices at the same time and at the same height as the eye, it ensures better efficiency! 

It is also perfect in those situations where you do not have as much space as traveling by train, plane or even in the car.


 

EASY TO INSTALL 

 

                 

 

 

EXTREME VIBRATIONS RESISTANCE

 

                 

 

 

 

 

To make Pholder a reality and reach the laptops of all of you, we need your HELP & Contribution! We need about 6000$ for the finalization of the mould and to start a small production! 

 

FOR THE FIRST 200 BACKERS WE OFFER SPECIAL SUPER EARLY BIRD! 
YOU CAN GET 1x PHOLDER WITH SPECIAL PRICE AND

WORLDWIDE FREE SHIPPING .

 

 


 

WHY DO WE OFFER THIS PERK?

 

Our reality deals with providing solutions, from conception, to technical design, and to production. We do not yet have a structure that can guarantee us the coverage of all the phases of placing on the market our products. For this reason we are looking for a partner who wants to sign an exclusivity agreement with us. Today our company has produced only "ad-hoc" solutions for our customers, remaining always external. 

PHOLDER is our first project we want to share with the market in the Whole World. 

THANKS TO OUR PATENTED DESIGN, PHOLDER IS THE FIRST UNIQUE PRODUCT OF ITS KIND

 

WHAT ARE THE ADVANTAGES OF SIGNING AN EXCLUSIVE AGREEMENT WITH US?

 

1. FIRSTLY you help us to reach the GOAL IMMEDIATELY AND MAKE PHOLDER MORE VISIBLE IN ALL PARTS OF THE WORLD. Thanks this pledge we can START IMMEDIATELY with the FINALIZATION OF THE MOLD SAVING A LOT OF TIME. 

2. Share and launch the next models together that will be suitable for all desktop computers.

3. Share production costs with you for better market entry.

4. Be the first and the only one to have something like this in the whole world.

5. Show PHOLDER your existing customer to get their feedback and do always better in the future.

6. SHARE WITH YOU THIS CROWDFUNDING CAMPAIGN.

 

 

Make PHOLDER a Hit with Family & Friends and share to the whole world!

We are working hard to get our project out there but if you can help us share it could make all the difference in bringing PHOLDER to life.

 

 

 

Risks and challenges

It has taken us nearly 6 months to get where we are today, and it has been an incredible challenge to design and develop the best performing phone screen holder with glamorous design. We had to test a lot of times especially for the magnetics that hold your phones to give you the chance to pre-order the first & the best product in the market. 

We also had time to apply patent all over the world.
We have partnered with a world-leading manufacturer of cables and phone accessories in China (15 years experience) and they just wait for a successfull INDIEGOGO CROWDFUNDING Campaign from us.

story:
Neodymium Energy is a small company that is inventing transformative intellectual property by researching ways that magnets can benefit industry by supplementing power requirements for motors, generators and pressure systems.  Our ultimate goal is to build a highly valuable portfolio of technologies that increase energy efficiencies and thus reduce the amount of fossil fuels used. The final placement of the technology will allow home owners, remote villages and communities around the world isolated from electricity to benefit from modern technology. 

This campaign is intended to fund the final stage of development of our technology. To assist us in getting our technology into the mainstream, we are focusing this campaign on a small unit that can fit on your office desk, kitchen counter or in a kid’s room to charge your cell phone.  The unit is a solar mechanical hybrid that stores a portion of the solar energy for use after sun goes down.  A motor generator is pulsed to charge your phone with our technology using a small percent of the solar energy captured during the day. After there is no longer a solar input, the battery charges your phone after hours.  The pulsing of the motor allows our magnetic technology to supplement the output for the period of time the motor is disengaged. 

While there are plenty of cheap solar chargers on the market to charge your phone, this desktop unit will charge your phone with method of energy supplementation that is green and unique to the world.  Please remember  the goal here is to build the larger units for the home, developing world and the grid to reduce green house gases.


Our Goal is to raise ($100,000) thousand dollars to build 500 units. We plan to limit production to a low number to give this unique product a high value. The units will be sold for $199 dollars each.

Here is a use of funds breakdown for 500 units:

  • $70 dollars for engineering modifications per unit, totaling $35,000

  • $30 dollars for shipping and handling per unit, totaling $15,000

  • $100 dollars for parts and production per unit, totaling $50,000

    Post funding, we envision the company getting a boost in the media and interest from larger corporate partners. We hope that a Google type company, or a Bill Gates would want to assist in the final development of a Micro Solar power plant for the home and or developing world.


The Impact

We believe that individual green power stations for home or business is a significant development in getting the world away from an electrical grid that still uses a large percent of fossil fuels to deliver our electricity.  The significance and peace of mind of powering your home in the event of emergencies, as well as reducing the world’s dependency on fossil fuels is very impactful to the human race.

The other significance of the technology is its ability to provide power to remote locations in various parts of the world. 

It is our intention to work with a group or foundation that wants to bring green energy to remote towns and villages around the world and give the gift of electricity. With electricity, we can power laptops and computers, water purification systems, and shine the light in their corner of the world.  You can give this gift!


Risks & Challenges

Currently, our prototype used for bench testing is approximately twenty four inches in diameter.  Theoretically, the design changes involve scaling down the technology to approximately eight inches in diameter.  The challenge will be in engineering the current magnet interface to behave the same way it currently does on our full size test bench unit.  Our magnetic experts believe that we can accomplish this with a 99% success rate; therefore we expect to have a working unit ready for production.

We will be utilizing the same companies that have assisted us from the beginning, each with long track records of technological contribution to various industries. Aiello Design will consult on the mechanical engineering and Magnaworks Technology will consult for the magnetic interface.

We have decided to reach a pledge goal and not keep the money if we don’t succeed in reaching that goal.  There are enough projects that have had good intentions and have not fulfilled the promise of delivering a product.  Perhaps they were overly ambitious, or did not calculate the amount of funding needed to research and manufacture their idea.  We do not want to be thought of as the company that is out to make these mistakes and have a negative stigma attached to the project.


Other Ways You Can Help

Times are tough, and as a small company we can relate.

Please, if you cannot help with a pledge it does not mean you cannot help.  We need you to spread the word to your friends, relatives and coworkers who can assist us in our funding goal. Please use your social media contacts, friends and family to get the word out.

Thank you.


Company and partner website links below:

NEODYMIUM ENERGY LLc. http://www.neodymiumenergy.com

MAGNAWORKS TECHNOLOGY INC. http://magnaworkstechnology.com

AIELLO DESIGN LLc. http://www.aiellodesign.com

Neodymium Energy is a small company that is inventing
transformative intellectual property by researching ways that magnets can
benefit industry by supplementing power requirements for motors, generators and
pressure systems.  Our ultimate goal is
to build a highly valuable portfolio of technologies that increase energy
efficiencies and thus reduce the amount of fossil fuels used. The final
placement of the technology will allow home owners, remote villages and
communities around the world isolated from electricity to benefit from modern
technology. 


This campaign is intended to fund the final stage of
development of our technology. To assist us in getting our technology into the
mainstream, we are focusing this campaign on a small unit that can fit on your
office desk, kitchen counter or in a kid’s room to charge your cell phone.  The unit is a solar mechanical hybrid that
stores a portion of the solar energy for use after sun goes down.  A motor generator is pulsed to charge your
phone with our technology using a small percent of the solar energy captured during the day. After there is no longer a solar input, the battery charges your phone after hours.  The pulsing of the motor allows
our magnetic technology to supplement the output for the period of time the
motor is disengaged. 
While there are plenty of cheap solar chargers on the market to charge your phone, this desktop unit will charge your phone with method of energy supplementation
that is green and unique to the world.  Please remember  the goal here is to build the larger units for the home, developing world and the grid to reduce green house gases. 
   Our Goal is to raise ($100,000) thousand dollars to build
500 units. We plan to limit production to a low number to give this unique
product a high value. The units will be sold for $199 dollars each.

story:
Ready to discover something innovative and unique? Then please spare a few moments of your precious time to check out our exciting new product.

Fans of the soon to be launched Apple Watch will be thrilled to own a similarly stylish gadget for the convenient docking and charging of both their iPhone and Apple watch.


IWDock offers the most sophisticated solution.




Why  ?

We acknowledge current consumer frustration with existing iPhone docking devices. Which is precisely why we’ve designed our very own, highly advanced solution. Unlike existing products, our indispensible gadget boasts a wealth of unrivalled benefits, including:

  • Ease of operation
  • Rapid undocking
  • Suitability for use with both cased or uncased devices

But wait – that's not all! Our ground-breaking product also boasts the exclusive ‘Apple Watch Stand’ feature.





Why is this so important?

No-one likes to leave their prized accessories charging lifeless on the table. And repeated rest on a nightstand results in unwelcome scratches over time.




IWDock is the ideal solution because it:

  • Provides dedicated storage and effortless charging for your shiny new gadget.
  • Enables you to express your ‘gear-lust’ in style.
  • Allows you to activate and de-activate alarm function with ease.
  • Prevents charging cables from becoming detached or tangled.



Its unique features include:

  • Precision cut timber.
  • Premium aluminum finish.
  • Compatibility with all strap designs and both watch models.
  • Hidden wire routing for neatly organized cables.
  • Weighted base for easy, one-hand lift-off.



Summary:

Apple Watch and iPhone devices require frequent charging  - IWDock is the answer as it offers:

  • One docking station for both devices.
  • Exclusive functionality and stylish design
  • Ease of use – which is just as important as function and design!
  • Flexibility – can be used with both cased and uncased devices and is compatible with all watch face sizes and watchbands 
  • Eliminates cable confusion and the need for multiple chargers


Our team:

We are young and dynamic company. We enjoy a deserved reputation as industry leaders in the field of cutting-edge technology and design. With an impressive range of ground-breaking products already successfully brought to market, including state-of-the-art 3D printers, a unique water bottle filling machine, and even an innovative control system for trains, we specialize in providing simple, yet smart solutions for today’s complex and challenging world. 


Every great idea requires resources to unlock its full potential. Which is why we need your help!

Order   Today!

story:
Dear Friends,

We are a group of inventors who have developed and patented the System for search and rescue of people that does not depend on third-party signals, such as satellite systems (GPS, GLONASS), mobile networks, etc.

This System will be used to find casualties in case of accidents, earthquakes, landslides, avalanches and other disasters, where it will be necessary to determine the location under rubble and debris in the shortest possible time.

    

How does it work?

This is a small beacon built into your mobile device (phone, smart watch, etc.), which is always with you.

<

Herewith, the beacon is in a sleep mode and does not consume additional energy. In case of accident, a search and rescue officer with the same beacon on his mobile device will be able to determine your location as soon as possible: one beacon (search and rescue officer) sends a forced search request, and the second beacon (casualty) automatically activates upon receiving a search request and emits a response signal, which in turn received by the first beacon. By the time difference, the distance between the beacons is calculated, and after a short series of request-responses, the direction can be computed.

Even if your mobile device is turned off or broken, the SAR beacon will work.

This project is aimed at the manufacture of the SAR Beacon prototype, testing and certification, followed by integration into mobile devices.

The integration of the SAR Beacon into mobile devices will revolutionize the efficiency and rate of search and rescue operations.

The capabilities of this system in the search and rescue of human life are invaluable.

We need your support to save precious human life and only together we will succeed!

FAQ

Q: For what the SAR Beacon is invented?

A: The SAR Beacon is developed to facilitate Search and Rescue operations, to give extra chances to be save to those, who got into disaster, and thus to save precious human lives.

 

Q: How does our system work?

A: Everything is simple: one beacon in a "search" mode emits request signal and the second beacon in a "sleeping" mode catch the request signal and emits respond signal. This respond signal is caught by the first beacon in turn. Then the first beacon calculates distance between beacons.

 

Q: Is it necessary to have special equipment to locate the SAR Beacon enabled device?

A: No, the SAR Beacon is developed to be self-sufficient, meaning one beacon can be found using another one. Only difference is that one device to be used in "search" mode.

 

Q: Who will be able to use the SAR Beacon?

A: The SAR Beacon has two modes: "search" and "sleeping". The "Search" mode can be activated only by Search and Rescue specialist, the "sleeping" mode is routine mode, which is ON all the time.

 

Q: How to activate "search" mode of the SAR Beacon?

A: A special software which will be available only for Search and Rescue specialists will change modes of the SAR Beacon.

 

Q: What electronic devices will be compatible with the SAR Beacon?

A: In short – any! It is useful to have the SAR Beacon built in devices people carry all time like smartphone, smart watch, fitness bracelets. 

 

Q: How small is the SAR Beacon?

A: Nowadays technological level makes possible to produce microcircuits and electronic chips as small as needle's eye, so biggest part of the SAR Beacon will be its battery. In any case it will be small enough to fit unoccupied space inside mobile device. Also the SAR Beacon can be manufactured in any shape and form-factor.

 

Q: Where the SAR Beacon can be used?

A: The SAR Beacon is to be used exclusively in case of emergencies to find and recover victims of disasters in a shortest possible time. It may be floods, earthquakes, landslides, avalanches, etc.

 

Q: How big distance of detecting the SAR Beacon?

A: Distance will be up to 100 meters, it is sufficient for the rescuers to make a precision search.

 

Q: How the SAR Beacon is protected?

A: The SAR Beacon is developed as self-sufficient module. It has own antenna, battery, processor. All parts are collected in small hard shell. It will be made impossible to accidently fracture physically or change any of its parts. Also it will be impossible to interfere with software tools.

 

Q: What information will be sent by the SAR Beacon in respond signal?

A: Only relevant information like ID/IMEI will be sent and it is sufficient for search and rescue purpose. No personal data will be used in signals. However, if mobile device has possibility to determine its position then the SAR Beacon can send coordinates.

 

Q: Will the SAR Beacon use power from device?

A: The SAR Beacon has own power supply which is used in "sleeping" mode. When device is charging the SAR Beacon will be charging too.

 

Q: Will the SAR Beacon work even in broken device?

A: Yes, the SAR Beacon is self-sufficient and it will functioning if the device is switched off or battery of the device is exhausted, even if the device broken.

 

Q: Why do we need your support?

A: We need your support for the manufacture of the SAR Beacon prototype, testing and certification, followed by integration into mobile devices. And show that people care about their own safety and the safety of others.

 

Q: Is the system innovative?

A: Yes, this system was recently patented by us and has never been used by anyone before for the specified purposes.

story:
A better cover for your phone.
 

My name is Andrea, I am a 26 year old man from Italy with a passion for mechanical engineering and craftsmanship in general.

When looking to buy a cover for my phone I realized there wasn't something that appealed to me, the most common "protective" covers being rather plasticky, the ones that were built around leather often had fake leather or a very, very thin layer of real leather applied on it and the few covers actually built with premium materials cost a fortune without a real reason.
 
Being dissatisfied with what the market had to offer I started thinking about making my own cover myself, soon realizing that the only way to do that was through selling it to other people to cover the costs, and so what started as a personal thought became an effort at starting a little enterprise with you.

The E-1 Titan is built out of three key materials: 

* Titanium (grade 1) making up the frame and the holes outlines. Lightweight, tough enough but also very good at impact absorbtion, taking the hit without deforming permanently
* Genuine Leather (deer in my prototype as it was easier to get, kangaroo in the production model) for wear resistance and good hand feel
* Visco-Elastic rubber a soft material that stiffens up immediately when struck violently, dissipating the energy over a much larger area (across the titanium frame) 

I devised an efficient way of manufacturing the E-1 Titan on a decent scale by using a powerful press for all of the most difficult steps (those that involve shaping/perforating the titanium and attaching the leather to the frame) with the aid of custom-made molds and punches. I require a relatively modest sum of 5000 euro to get going, including the money for a good batch of materials needed for production and a few month's rent for a place to set up business into.


For a much more in-depth story of what I did so far, including the (rather rough, not representative of the finished product) prototype I made to test materials, thicknesses, impact absorption and some production processes you can visit our website at http://www.eligeredesign.com where you can also get in touch with me personally.

Thank you!
