story:
Imagine being able to charge your smartphone at any bar or restaurant?   

Meet the NapkinHub: a napkin dispenser that also serves a USB charger for your gadgets. It has a 24000 mAh battery to charge your iPhone 6 or Samsung 6 up to 10 times. You get 2 USB ports to charge 2 gadgets simultaneously. It can charge compatible devices up to 75% faster.


With Napkinhub any bar, cafe or restaurant will serves gadgets charger in an innovative way where you can charge any type of gadgets, smartphone, tablets, cameras, music players, etc... 




FEATURES


FREE USB CABLE

Only for this campaing  we give two  free USB cables with length of 6.6 (1m each) for Iphone and Android so you can charge two differents gadgets at the same time. 



OUR TEAM
We firmly believe that this is part of the future, a free energy as a service. 

We´re a young start-up passionate for our vision.  we believe that soon any bar, coffee shop or restaurants will offer free energy for they customers where people woulb be able to charge their gadgets. 

We have spent close to one years in research and development to deliver the best product out in the market. 

Our main challenge is quality control we have gone through great choose our manufacturing and supply partners very carefully 
To ensure they are well equipped to handle this project in time.

Our goal is to make our idea reality.  




 TIMELINE

story:
Tailor Your Phone to Your Lifestyle

Interchange the cases of NEO [Reloaded] to make it as unique as you. 

 

TWOTONE: Mix and Match

TWOTONE covers are interchangeable by rearranging each panel freely, you can create your own TWOTONE variation! The simple panel design allows users to interchange each panel, providing more than 600 cover combinations. Along with a variety of colors and material no other phone can provide this much customization. 

In addition to changing covers, the TWOTONE case comes with a slot for credit cards behind the back panel. Simply remove the back panel and slide your credit card in for a night on the town!

 

FLIP: Elevate the Appearance.

The FLIP hides the presence of your device with the capability to store multiple cards with it. Cases with card slots are usually unreliable and bulky, but the FLIP case attaches directly to the NuAns NEO  [Reloaded]  blending in perfectly to the CORE. The self-standing FLIP was designed to feel as if it was part of the phone to begin with.

We know it’s important to you to always bring your important cards and not to forget them. Based on our extensive experience in designing smartphone accessories, we noticed that most consumers prefer the flip-type case. So we came up with an unconventional exterior design called FLIP that has two card pockets and a large storage pocket, apart from the backside IC card storage space. It even doubles up as a hands-free stand ideal for watching movies. Aside from that, the smartphone automatically turns on when the FLIP lid is opened and goes to sleep mode when closed. 

 

CORE: Styled by You.

The CORE, the center of NuAns NEO, was designed on the concept that it can be integrated with the exterior of the phone. The CORE represents everything we wanted in a smartphone device while allowing you to personalize your device around the CORE. Hence, a little bit of us and a little bit of you!

Just like changing into clothes every day, you can change the exterior depending on the application of the phone and style you desire. The exteriors are two separate panels that are artfully designed using different textures; seamlessly unifying the exterior to the body of the phone.

 

Battery: Quick Charge Port with USB Type-C.

The inner battery of the NuAns NEO [Reloaded] has a 3,540mAh capacity, which is approx.2 times larger capacity than iPhone (iPhone 7: 1,960mAh). Talk Time: 23 hrs approx. Standby time: 335 hrs approx. It is compatible with the newest quick charging technology “Quick Charge 3.0” from Qualcomm. The external battery charger can charge up to 70% within one hour. 

 

Memory: Abundant Data Capacity.

The basic specification of NEO matches up to the high-end devices. Main memory carries 3GB so that it can work smoothly using multiple Apps at the same time. The Inner Flash Memory has 32GB of storage. With up to 1TB MicroSD Card of extra storage, so there is no need to worry about taking too many pictures or long videos.  

 

Awards: Recognition and Honors.

The Nuans NEO's design was the recipient of the Good Design Award 2016 Best 100 and the iF Design Award 2017 Gold Award.

 

Camera: Professional Grade Camera.

The reputed Sony backside illuminated CMOS sensors is used for both the front and rear cameras of the NuAns NEO [Reloaded]. 

The rear camera combines a bright lens of F2.0 with a field angle equivalent to 28 mm which is easy to handle and a 13 megapixels sensor. By using the distance measurement of the Phase Detection Autofocus and the contrast detection function to high-speed contrast detection autofocus, it is possible to achieve high-speed and accurate autofocus and enjoy photography comfortably at any time. 

We combined an 8 megapixels sensor and a super wide angle lens of 24 mm / F2.2 which is optimum for selfies with the front camera. There is no doubt that it will be useful not only for pictures of yourself with a beautiful background but also for the group selfies with friends and family. 

 

Durable: Water, Weather, Whatever. 

You may want to use NuAns NEO [Reloaded] when it starts to rain while you are out, while you’re cooking in the kitchen so you can look at a recipe, take pictures when you play the kids in a sandbox, or even just taking pictures near water. To fit these various kinds of life situations, NuAns NEO [Reloaded] has been developed to be Dust-Proof and Water-Resistant up to a IP54 standard. 

  

 

BANDs

NuAns NEO [Reloaded] Bands

4G LTE: 1, 3, 4, 5, 7, 8, 9, 12, 17, 18, 19, 26, 28

3G: 1, 3, 5, 6, 8, 9, 19

2G: Quad Band (850/900/1800/1900) 

*This is for your reference only. Please confirm the bands with your carrier.
Source: https://www.frequencycheck.com/countries

 

Security: Fingerprint Sensor.

Various kind of information gathers on smartphones in this modern society. For both security control of information and safety when you use the device, the unlocking function of the biosensor is indispensable. In NuAns NEO [Reloaded], has adopted a fingerprint sensor to eliminate the inconvenience of entering a security passcode every time to make it easy to use. 

  

Design: Structure is Key.

Most of the manufacturing companies are pursuing the world's thinnest and lightest devices. However, those attributes are not the single answer to the "greatest smartphone every made".  NuAns NEO [Reloaded] has our favorite attributes of a smartphone woven deeply in its CORE, proposing a change to the new digital lifestyle.

Q. Does the thinnest phone make it easier to handle and to perform daily functions?

A. Not always.

We wanted a device that had advanced tech in its CORE, yet provided convenient functionality when held in your hand. In lieu of seeking out the thinnest possible device, we substituted it with installing the latest technological advancements. We found that the NuAns NEO [Reloaded]'s 5.29 ounces was the perfect weight to its key attributes: comfortable handling, visually stunning, and functionally sound.

 

Display: Crystal Clear Display.

The display has a very narrow frame giving it a 5.2 inch full HD display from Sharp. The enlarged display area expands to the full width of the front cover glass, It is almost frameless. Corresponding to a wide color range, the high-definition and beautiful display reaches 428 ppi pixel density and 1920 x 1080 pixels, that has improved not just by specs, but also by using the best quality display.

*iPhone 7:  Screen size 4.7 inches, Resolution 750 x 1334 pixels (~326 ppi pixel density)

 

Screen: Indestructible Glass.

NuAns NEO [Reloaded] adopted the latest model of Asahi Glass "Dragontrail Pro". Making it the first model in the world to tackle strengthening the cover glass while making full use of its characteristic rounded shape. Furthermore, the surface of the cover glass has an anti-fingerprint coating that helps suppress the reflection of light with high transparency. 

 

The Word on NuAns NEO [Reloaded].

"The NuAns NEO [Reloaded] is solid without feeling overly dense, and though it will stretch your pockets more than the average smartphone, you can...make it double as a wallet." - Engadget

"A welcome respite from the familiar-looking smartphones we have grown accustomed to over the years.." - Digital Trends

"What distinguishes NuAns NEO [Reloaded] from other smartphones on the market are the possibilities for customization..." - Web News

 

Concept: What is it?

Using textures and colors, while maintaining basic functionality and looks, we reviewed current smart phone lifestyles to understand what obstacles prohibit the euphoria that we call “comfort” in everyday technology. The NuAns NEO [Reloaded]'s sole mission is to seek that solution to comfort; with the new answer. The more we can blend the digital life into the comfort of our space, the easier it is to find that new answer.

 

What is a Comfortable Digital Life?

Comfort is something everyone can relate to. We strive for comfort in what we wear, where we sleep, and how we live. We asked ourselves, how do we find comfort in our smart phone devices? To find the answer we had to dissect what turns people off of current smartphones.

  • The panic during the loss of battery life.
  • The bulky design making smart phones hard to handle.
  • The cold, metallic, slippery texture.

 

Concept: Altering The Look.

For a tool that becomes the basis of your daily routine, you want a device that would perfectly integrate with your life – both at work and at home. A device that can naturally fit in your hands; flawlessly connected to you forming an emotional attachment to it.  Every day,  you bring things such as a bag, watch, stationery, or wallet with you. It’s the same with a smartphone, you carry it with you all the time. Wouldn’t it be nice to customize the “texture” of your smartphone so that it fits naturally in your hand and match it with a color that suits your taste? We analyzed a person’s lifestyle and redesigned the smartphone from scratch while considering every detail such as color, material, texture and shape.  

We sought out to design a device that blends into our hands and lifestyles by using natural materials which bring immediate comfort. In this new era, we have brought nuance to digital devices with new answers for our lifestyles.

 

Texture: The Ultimate Feels.

We wanted our main focus to be on the appearance and texture of the device. In addition to the daily functions of the device, we find ourselves simply holding it more often than not. For that reason, we decided that NuAns and the NuAns NEO series were going to bring aesthetics and texture to life.

Aside from existing materials such as tennâge, clarino, and ultrasuede, we added four additional materials: cork, denim, dotted ultrasuede, and stone to complement to your "texture" sensation. This is our concept for NuAns NEO [Reloaded], to deliver genuine touch, texture, and color to your everyday hand-held device. 


 

Software: Enhance Your Experience.

NuAns NEO [Reloaded] adopted the newest Android 7.1 (Nougat). Using the Google Play Store you can make the most of all the different Android Apps. The Android system dominates the large market share all over the world, opening up a multitude of possibilities.  

 

The Qualcomm newest chipset “Snapdragon 625” was adopted to the core. By combining this chipset with the inner battery of the NuAns NEO [Reloaded], it doubles the capacity of the iPhone and can run efficiently for long hours. Also, high-speed communication was achieved by the USB 3.0. 

 

Specifications: The Nitty Gritty.

  • Size (L x W x H): Approx. 141 x 74 x 11 (mm) / Approx. 5.5 x 2.9 x 0.4 (inch)
  • Unit Weight: Approx. 150g
  • Memory / Storage: Internal: 3GB RAM / 32GB flash, External: Micro SD (Max. 1TB (UHS-I 3.0))
  • SIM Card: Compatible with micro-SIM (nano-SIM adapter included)
  • Bands: 2G (Quad band): 850/900/1800/1900, 3G (W-CDMA): 1/3/5/6/8/9/19 42Mbps/5.76Mbps, 4G LTE: 1/3/4/5/7/8/9/12/17/18/19/26/28 Cat.4
  • Display: Size 5.2 inches, Pixcels 1920 x 1080, Pixel Density 428 ppi
  • Main Camera: 13 Megapixels, F2.0, CMOS (Back-illuminated sensor), Auto-focus, 28mm wide-angle lens
  • In-camera: 8 Megapixels, F2.2, CMOS (Back-illuminated sensor), Auto-focus, 24mm wide-angle lens
  • Dust / Water-proof: Dust-proof and Drip-proof standard：IP54（Dust-proof (IP5X), Drip-proof (IPX4) ）
  • Battery Capacity: 3,450mAh
  • Talk Time: TBA (More than 23 hours), Standby Time: TBA (More than 335 hours)
  • Bluetooth/WiFi/GPS: Compatible (check the full spec list)
  • Ports: USB Type-C (USB 3.0 / OTG, Quick Charge 3.0), 4 Pin Headset Jack (CTIA)
  • Accessories: USB 2.0 A-C cable 1m, nano-SIM adapter, Cleaning Card, Users’ Guide

Message from Hossy from Trinity, Inc. 

Watch the video message from the NuAns NEO [Reloaded] producer. 

 

 

Message from NuAns NEO [Reloaded] Designers!

Check out the message from TENT, creative unit from Japan.
They are the designers of NuAns series Including NuAns NEO and NuAns NEO [Reloaded]. 

Touch and Try! NuAns NEO!

 

About TENT 
TENT is a creative unit formed by Masayuki Haruta and Ryosaku Aoki in 2011. “Pleasing the eyes and the more you use, the more you love.” is the basic theme and based on this concept, TENT provides variety of product designs from tableware, home electronics to interior goods. TENT offers superb designs from concept making to holistic all-up product creation. Some of our work are; web, application UI, producing event/exhibition booth design and much more.

 

Create: Print 3D Cases at Home!

Don't like any of our pre-designed cases? Have access to a 3D printer?

You can now download 3D data for the TWOTONE when you purchase the NuAns NEO [Reloaded] and create your own TWOTONE covers or FLIP case! 3D data is provided for free. You can now create your own one-of-a-kind case or give them to your friends as gifts!

You can download 3D data from here: https://neo.nuans.jp/reloaded/about/?lang=en#c03

 

Come Join the NEO Family!

Facebook / Instagram / Webpage

 

FAQs

1. If project is unsuccessful, can you still purchase it? Where?

At the moment, we are only focusing on making this crowdfunding project successful and we have not decided other options yet. We are hoping everyone to support us on this project so that we can take next step and make NuAns NEO [Reloaded] available in many countries!

 

2. What carriers will support it? What countries will support it?

It is depending on which carrier you use. Please check your carrier’s BAND frequency and NuAns NEO [Reloaded]’s supported BAND frequency.  

 

3. Is there a warranty or maintenance support system?

Warranty is for 12 month from the purchase date. Maintenance Support is available mainly by emails.

 

4. Is there a return policy? How many days?

We accept return and exchange of the device only for initial failure (e.g. cannot turn on power, cannot charge the device). Please check your device within 3 days from receipt.

 

5. Is it possible to listen to FM radio?

Yes, FM Radio is available however, you need to use earphone to listen to the radio

 

6. Will there be a screen protector released, or hard case?

Yes, there is a screen protector available for purchase. No there is no alternative hard case for Neo [Reloaded] at this time but you can create one for yourself with 3D data.

 

7. Is this a GSM phone?

Yes, NuAns NEO Reloaded is GSM / W-CDMA phone

 

8. Is the battery removable?

No, it is not removable.

 

9. When will it be shipped out?

Projected shipping or the phone is between August and September. After the initial shipment it will be available for purchase.

 

10. Can I buy more than one extra case/screen protector?

Yes, this option will be available at the completion of the campaign.

 

11. Is Dual Sims available?

No, it’s not.

 

12. Is there a micro USB slot? 

Yes, one slot with a maximum storage of 1TB. 

 

13. Does it support wireless (iQ) charging?

No, it does not.

 

14. Can you add more RAM?

No, you cannot.

 

15. Will there be GPS/A-GPS for Sat Navi?

Yes.

 

16. Which Languages does it support?

Over 100 languages are available however, please note some of the apps is not supported for certain language. For more detailed information, please contact us.

 

17. Is it waterproof?

It is Water Resistant and Dust Proof.

 

18. Will the NuAns NEO [Reloaded] be certified for use with Voice over LTE (VoLTE) and Wi-Fi Calling?

Apart from NTT docomo and au in Japan, VoLTE is not available at the moment.

 

19. Which countries have distributors or retail shops?

At this moment, it is only available online in Japan.

 

20. Does it support 4K video recording?

No, it does not.

 

21. Will it support mirror casting?

Yes, it does.

 Message from NuAns NEO [Reloaded] Designers!Check out the message from TENT, creative unit from Japan.They are the designers of NuAns series Including NuAns NEO and NuAns NEO [Reloaded]. Touch and Try! NuAns NEO! About TENT TENT is a creative unit formed by Masayuki Haruta and Ryosaku Aoki in 2011. “Pleasing the eyes and the more you use, the more you love.” is the basic theme and based on this concept, TENT provides variety of product designs from tableware, home electronics to interior goods. TENT offers superb designs from concept making to holistic all-up product creation. Some of our work are; web, application UI, producing event/exhibition booth design and much more. Create: Print 3D Cases at Home!Don't like any of our pre-designed cases? Have access to a 3D printer?You can now download 3D data for the TWOTONE when you purchase the NuAns NEO [Reloaded] and create your own TWOTONE covers or FLIP case! 3D data is provided for free. You can now create your own one-of-a-kind case or give them to your friends as gifts!You can download 3D data from here: https://neo.nuans.jp/reloaded/about/?lang=en#c03 Come Join the NEO Family!Facebook / Instagram / Webpage FAQs1. If project is unsuccessful, can you still purchase it? Where?At the moment, we are only focusing on making this crowdfunding project successful and we have not decided other options yet. We are hoping everyone to support us on this project so that we can take next step and make NuAns NEO [Reloaded] available in many countries! 2. What carriers will support it? What countries will support it?It is depending on which carrier you use. Please check your carrier’s BAND frequency and NuAns NEO [Reloaded]’s supported BAND frequency.   3. Is there a warranty or maintenance support system?Warranty is for 12 month from the purchase date. Maintenance Support is available mainly by emails. 4. Is there a return policy? How many days?We accept return and exchange of the device only for initial failure (e.g. cannot turn on power, cannot charge the device). Please check your device within 3 days from receipt. 5. Is it possible to listen to FM radio?Yes, FM Radio is available however, you need to use earphone to listen to the radio 6. Will there be a screen protector released, or hard case?Yes, there is a screen protector available for purchase. No there is no alternative hard case for Neo [Reloaded] at this time but you can create one for yourself with 3D data. 7. Is this a GSM phone?Yes, NuAns NEO Reloaded is GSM / W-CDMA phone 8. Is the battery removable?No, it is not removable. 9. When will it be shipped out?Projected shipping or the phone is between August and September. After the initial shipment it will be available for purchase. 10. Can I buy more than one extra case/screen protector?Yes, this option will be available at the completion of the campaign. 11. Is Dual Sims available?No, it’s not. 12. Is there a micro USB slot? Yes, one slot with a maximum storage of 1TB.  13. Does it support wireless (iQ) charging?No, it does not. 14. Can you add more RAM?No, you cannot. 15. Will there be GPS/A-GPS for Sat Navi?Yes. 16. Which Languages does it support?Over 100 languages are available however, please note some of the apps is not supported for certain language. For more detailed information, please contact us. 17. Is it waterproof?It is Water Resistant and Dust Proof. 18. Will the NuAns NEO [Reloaded] be certified for use with Voice over LTE (VoLTE) and Wi-Fi Calling?Apart from NTT docomo and au in Japan, VoLTE is not available at the moment. 19. Which countries have distributors or retail shops?At this moment, it is only available online in Japan. 20. Does it support 4K video recording?No, it does not. 21. Will it support mirror casting?Yes, it does.
